Ŋii nɛ Piita kɔ Yesu teeŋ a piɛsu a bul, “Mi Tiina, di mi naaŋbie nɛ ŋaa wii a cheimi lɛ, naaŋsiiŋ buŋmɛɛ nɛ mi jaŋ joŋo chɛu? Mi joŋo chɛu naaŋsiiŋ bulipɛ koo?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bul, “Ai, naaŋsiiŋ bulipɛ duŋduŋa dee. Joŋo chɛu naaŋsiiŋ mahiŋ batori ari fii leree bulipɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu magɛ namaga a kɛŋ Wia kuorii-la a kaa mimagisɛ kuoro ari u tiŋtinnaa a bul, “Kuoru kubala nɛ sie a chichɛ duu piɛsɛ u tiŋtinnaa u chiŋŋaa.
U si suomo duu piɛsɛ, ba kɛŋ u tiŋtinna dɔŋɔ kɔ u teeŋ. U dii u chimiŋ siidi bui bui bui nɛ.
U bi wuo ti̱ŋ. Ŋii nɛ u kuhiaŋ-la bul di ba kɛnu ari u haala ari u biiriŋ ari kialiŋ kala u si kɛnɛ a kaa mu yallɛ a ti̱ŋ chiŋ-la bua lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ tiŋtinni-la tuu kpirimi u naadusuŋ nyuŋ a sulu, ‘Mi kuhiaŋ, ŋaa kenyiri. Mi jaŋ ti̱ŋ ŋ chimiŋ kala.’
U kuhiaŋ-la fáu nisusuŋ woruŋ a joŋ chiŋ-la chɛu a ŋaa u mu.
Ŋii nɛ chiŋ tiina-la kuoru-la si joŋ chiŋ-la chɛu, u lii a ma na u tiŋtinni dɔŋɔ tiina si dii u chimiŋ siidi bui. U kɛŋ u gɛriŋ baŋŋa lɛ a bul duu ti̱ŋ u chimiŋ.
U tiŋtinni-dɔŋ-la ma tuu kpirimi u naadusuŋ nyuŋ a sulu a bul, ‘Ŋaa kenyiri, mi jaŋ ti̱miŋ.’
U via aŋ kɛnu mu tɔ dia, aŋ bul see duu ti̱ŋ chiŋ-la.
U tiŋtinni-dɔŋsuŋ si na wii-la u si ŋaa, ba tuɔŋ kala chei. Ba mu bula pi ba kuhiaŋ wii-la kala si ŋaa.
Ŋii nɛ kuoru-la yiru a piɛsu a bul, ‘Ŋ-na tiŋtinna deeŋ, ŋ ŋaa ni-bɔŋ nɛ. Ŋ si sulmi, mi joŋ chiŋ-la kala ŋ si die a chɛŋ nɛ.
Bɛɛ nɛ tii ŋ-na bi wuo fá ŋ dɔŋɔ tiina-la nennige ari mi si fáŋ nennige ŋii?’
Kuoru-la na baaniŋ woruŋ u nyuŋ a ŋaa ba kɛnu tɔ dia see duu ti̱ŋ chiŋ-la kala.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu si, “Di ma bi sɛi di ma joŋ ma dɔŋsuŋ tiŋŋaa haachɛba chɛba ari ma tuɔŋ kala, mi Nyimma Wia si hɛ Wia-jaŋ lɛ ma jaŋ dɔgisɛma ŋii.”
Yesu si bul wiaa deeŋba dɛrɛ, u lii Galilii tiŋteeŋ a mu Judiya tiŋteeŋ a chol Jɔɔdaŋ fuo-la.
Ni-daŋ bira to u hariŋ. Ŋii nɛ u vaarɛ nialiŋ síi wiilu dimɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Farisii tiŋŋaa dɔŋsuŋ ma sii kɔ u teeŋ a chichɛ di ba magisu a piɛsu a bul, “Di ŋ kɛŋ wii a tigɛ ŋ haala lɛ a chichɛ ŋ viau, u kɛŋ woŋbii nɛɛ?”
Yesu miira piɛsɛba, “Ma bi karima ari bua-la lɛ Wia si bugumo ŋaa dunia, nialiŋ u si ŋaa, ba fa ŋaa baal ari haal nɛɛ?”
Yesu bira si, “Ŋii nɛ tii baal-la jaŋ leŋ u nyimma ari u naaŋ dia aŋ ka ba di u haala mɛrɛ dɔŋɔ lɛ. Niaa deeŋba balia jaŋ kɛŋ chal-bala.
Ba bira bi jaŋ ŋaa niaa balia, see kubala. Nialiŋ saa Wia si kaa mɛrɛ dɔŋɔ lɛ, u bi maga di nuhuobiine kɛŋba pɔrɛ dɔŋɔ lɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ u haritooro-la bira piɛsu wiiŋ deeŋ a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii saa Moosis fa si di baala níi chɛ u via u haala, duu laa sipaaŋ a ŋmuŋsɛ teniŋ a pi haal-la aŋ-na viau?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bula piba a bul, “Ma tuɔŋ dolie. Ŋii nɛ tii Moosis fa sɛi di ma via ma haalaa. Ama dunia di-suomuŋ, ba fa bi ŋii ŋaa.
Mi bulaa pima, baala-na kala si via u haala aŋ bira jaa dɔŋɔ, u tiina juu haal-la haachɛ lɛ nɛ, see di haal-la ka ŋaa ha-chɔruŋ wu-ŋaalaa.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu haritooro-la bula pu ari ŋii-na nɛ hɛ dimɛ, u bi maga di nuu jaa haal.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu miira bula piba a bul, “Wiiŋ deeŋ bi naga ari nuu-kala jaŋ wuo ŋaa. Nialiŋ Wia si joŋ doluŋ pa, ba duŋduŋa nɛ jaŋ wuo ŋaa ŋii.

Wii-la si tii baalaa bi haalaa ka jaa, ba yuga nɛ. Ba lul dɔŋsuŋ, ba paala bi haalaa wuo piŋ. Dɔŋsuŋ ma, nuhuobiinee nɛ ŋaaba ŋii, dɔŋsuŋ ma bi haalaa jaa a tiŋ Wia kuorii-la wiaa. Nii-la si jaŋ wuo laa wiiŋ deeŋ dii, u sɛi.”
Ŋii nɛ niaa sii kɔ Yesu teeŋ a kɛŋ ba haŋbiisiŋ kaa kɔ duu joŋ u nisiŋ daŋba lɛ a chuɔlɛ Wia piba. Ŋii nɛ u haritooro-la kpiaba lɛ.
Yesu si na ŋii, u bula piba a bul, “Má leŋ di haŋbiisi-la kɔ mi teeŋ. Ma síba kiru! Niaa deeŋba yiri nɛ hɛ Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ u joŋ u nisiŋ daŋba lɛ aŋ viiri.
Baal kubala nɛ ma sie a kɔ Yesu teeŋ. Baal-la kɛŋ kiaa kiŋkɛŋ. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Mi kuhiaŋ, wu-zɔŋ bɛɛ nɛ mi jaŋ ŋaa a kɛŋ miisi-la si bi dɛrɛ?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsu a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii ŋ piɛsɛmi wu-zɔmɔ-la ŋ si jaŋ ŋiŋaa wiaa? Ni-bala duŋduŋa nɛ zɔmɔ. Di ŋ níi chɛ di ŋ kɛŋ miisi-la si bi dɛrɛ, tuto wialiŋ Wia si leŋe ba ŋmuŋsa bil di maa to.”
Ŋii nɛ baal-la piɛsu, “Wu-bɛɛba nɛ?” Ŋii nɛ Yesu si, “Sí niaa kpu, sí ŋ dɔŋɔ tiina haala chɛ, sí gaa, di ŋ ŋaa daŋsia wii lɛ, sí wiaa nyia pɛ.
Fifá ŋ nyimma ari ŋ naaŋ, a cho ŋ dɔŋɔ tiina ari ŋ si cho ŋ titia ŋii.”
Ŋii nɛ baal-la bula pi Yesu, “Mi kuhiaŋ, mi to wiaa deeŋba kala nɛ. Bɛɛ nɛ saa ka?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu, “Di ŋ níi chɛ ŋ ŋaa ni-zɔŋ a sí wii-kala kɛŋ, joŋ ŋ kiaa kala yallɛ a joŋ moribie-la a pi summoo aŋ ku tomi. Ŋ nɛ ŋaa ŋii, ŋ jaŋ kɛŋ kiaa Wia-jaŋ lɛ.”
Yesu si bul ŋii, baal-la tuɔŋ chei, u sii viiri, bɛɛ wiaa u kɛŋ kiaa nɛ woruŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi u haritooro-la a bul, “Wutitii, mi bulaa pima, u ŋaa wu-duo nɛ ari nii-la si kɛŋ kiaa si jaŋ wuo juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.
Mi bira bulaa pima, u bi hɛi ari buŋtaŋŋa si jaŋ wuo to gɛri-hɛmiŋ buɔŋ lii ari u si hɛyɛ ŋii nii-la si kɛŋ kiaa si jaŋ wuo juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.”
U haritooro-la si nii wiaa deeŋba, ba faasa hiriki a piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “U nɛ nagɛ ŋii, kubɛɛ nɛ saa Wia jaŋ laa ta?”
Yesu miira beŋba aŋ bul, “Wii-la si jaŋ kperi nuhuobiine, u bi Wia wuo kperi. Wia wuo wii-kala ŋaa nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita bula pu a bul, “Na, la-na leŋ la kuŋ-kala nɛ aŋ tuto ŋ hariŋ. Bɛɛ nɛ saa la jaŋ na?”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi u haritooro-la a bul, “Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, di dunia falii-la nɛ yie, mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie jaŋ hɔŋ mi kuori-kpasa nyuŋ Wia pulumuŋ tuɔŋ. Bua-la lɛ, ma haritooro-la fii ari balia-la si to mi hariŋ, ma ma jaŋ hɔŋ kuori-kpasinniŋ fii ari balia nyuŋ a bibeŋ Iziral ta-geŋtisiŋ fii ari balia-la a dii ba sariya.
Bira nii-la kala si leŋ u diisiŋ koo u naaŋbiiriŋ koo u nyimma koo u naaŋ koo u biiriŋ koo u bagisiŋ a tiŋ mi wiaa, u tiina jaŋ bira na kiaa deeŋba naaŋsiiŋ zɔlɔ aŋ pɛ kɛŋ miisi-la si bi dɛrɛ.
Ama kuhiasiŋ yuga si jaŋ birimɛ haŋbiisiŋ. Haŋbiisiŋ ma yuga si jaŋ birimɛ kuhiasiŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira magɛ namaga a piba a bul di Wia kuorii-la nagɛ baal kubala si kɛŋ u baga nɛ chichuɔ-fiɛla. U lii chichɛ niaa di ba mu pɛrɛ u baga-la lɛ.
Ba sɛi ari ba jaŋ mu pɛrɛ, ka u ti̱ŋba chɛ-bala time. Ŋii nɛ u leŋ ba mu u baga-la pipɛrɛ.
U ku magɛ kerifi nibi, u bira lii a na niaa dɔŋsuŋ di ba chiŋ yɔbɔ tuɔŋ pɛi. Ba bi tiŋtimii kala ka tiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ u bula piba di ba ma mu a pɛrɛ u baga-la lɛ, ka di u ti̱ŋba, duu jaŋ piba ŋii kala si maga. Ŋii nɛ ba ma mu.
Kerifi fii ari balia yi, u bira lii a na niaa dɔŋsuŋ a ŋaa ba ma mu u baga-la. U bira lii kerifi batori bua-la lɛ a bira na niaa dɔŋsuŋ a ŋaa ba ma mu u baga-la.
U bira ku kpagɛ kerifi banɔŋ, u bira lii yɔbɔ tuɔŋ a na niaa dɔŋsuŋ ma di ba ha chiŋ dimɛ. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii ma chiŋ daha pɛi chichuɔŋ ari wiihɛyɛ kala, ma bi tiŋtimii kala ka tiŋ?”
Ŋii nɛ ba bula pu ari ba bi tiŋtiŋŋaa na di ba tiŋ. Ŋii nɛ u bula piba di ba ma mu a tiŋ u baga lɛ. Ba ma mu.

Didaaniŋ si yie, ŋii nɛ baga-la tiina yirɛ nii-la síi beŋ u baga-la duu yirɛ nialiŋ si tiŋ u baga-la lɛ a ti̱ŋba, duu suomi nialiŋ si to hariŋ mu baga-la a ti̱ŋba aŋ-na mu yi nialiŋ si laa sipaaŋ mu baga-la.
Nialiŋ si to hariŋ mu baga-la, u ti̱ŋba chɛ-bala time.
Ŋii nɛ u si, ka nialiŋ si laa sipaaŋ mu baga-la, di ba ku laa ba time. Ba fa biina ari ba jaŋ laa kii haritooro-la, ama ba ti̱ŋba ma magɛ ŋii nɛ.
Ba ma laa moribie-la aŋ gugurimɛ wiaa nii-la baga-la lɛ ba si pɛrɛ teeŋ.
Ŋii nɛ ba bula pu a bul, “Niaa deeŋba si to hariŋ kɔ, ba tiŋ hawa kubala duŋduŋ nɛ, aŋ ka la-na tiŋ chichuɔŋ ari wiihɛyɛ kala, aŋ ka ŋ ti̱ŋla kala maga dɔŋɔ.”
Ŋii nɛ baga-la tiina bula pi ba dɔŋɔ a bul, “Jegile nii, mi bima gura. Ma sɛyɛ ari ma jaŋ tiŋ di wia juu nɛ aŋ laa chɛ-bala time.
Má laa ma moribiee a viiri. Mii chɛ di mi ti̱ŋ baalaa deeŋba si to hariŋ kɔ ŋii titia mi si ti̱ŋma nɛ.
Mi bi woŋbiiŋ kɛnɛ di mi kɛŋ mi moribiee ti̱ŋ mi tuɔtɔrɛ wiaa? Koo ma yaraa bieru a tiŋ mi si kɛŋ zile wiaa nɛɛ?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula dɛrɛ, “Kuhiasiŋ jaŋ birimɛ haŋbiisiŋ, haŋbiisiŋ ma jaŋ birimɛ kuhiasiŋ.”
Yesu si bul ŋii di ba hɛ woŋbiiŋ lɛ nɛ aa mu Jerusalɛm. Ŋii nɛ u kɛŋ u haritooroo fii ari balia duŋduŋa a suusa lii a bula piba woŋbiiŋ lɛ,

“Má jegili mi teeŋ. Laa mu Jerusalɛm nɛ. Di la nɛ yi dimɛ, ba jaŋ kɛŋ mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie a kaa mu pi nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba. Ba jaŋ dii mi sariya a ŋaa di ba kpumi
aŋ kɛŋmi kaa mu hɛ nialiŋ si bi Ju̱u tiŋŋaa ŋaa nisiŋ lɛ. Ba jaŋ mɔŋmi. Ba jaŋ viirɛmi maa aŋ kpaasɛmi mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ, ka di mi sii suuŋ lɛ tapulaa batori chɛɛŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Zɛbidii haala kɛŋ u biiriŋ balia kɔ Yesu teeŋ a kpirimi u sipaaŋ aŋ sulu duu pɛu lɛ.

Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsu, “Wu-bɛɛ nɛ ŋŋ chɛ di mi ŋaa piŋ?” Ŋii nɛ u bul, “Ŋ si jaŋ dii Wia kuorii-la a hɔŋ ŋ kuori-kpasa nyuŋ, leŋ di mi biiriŋ balia ŋaa ŋ bubuɔŋ huhɔnnɔɔ, di dɔŋɔ hɔŋ ŋ na-diiŋ, di dɔŋɔ ma hɔŋ ŋ na-gua.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi u biiriŋ a bul, “Ma bi jiŋ ku-la ma síi chɛ. Ma jaŋ wuo nyalima na hɛɛ-la mi si jaŋ na? Ma jaŋ wuo fo Wii-chuɔlɛ liiŋ ari ba si jaŋ fomi ŋii, koo?” Ba si, “Oo, la jaŋ wuo.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Wutitii nɛ ma bul. Hɛɛ-la mi si jaŋ na, u-na ma ma jaŋ na. Ama mi na-diiŋ ari mi na-gua huhɔnnɔ-la, mi dee bi jaŋ tuɔsɛba. Wia nɛ jaŋ liisɛba di ba hɔŋ dimɛ.”
Yesu haritooroo fii-la si nii Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ si bul wii-la, ba na baaniŋ ba nyuŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu yirɛ u haritooroo kala. Ba mu u teeŋ. U bula piba a bul, “Ma jiŋ nialiŋ si bi Ju̱u tiŋŋaa ŋaa, ba hɔŋ niaa nyuŋ nɛ. Ba kuhiasiŋ ma kɛŋba doluŋ.
Ama u bi maga di ma ŋiŋaa ŋii. Ma tuɔŋ nii-la síi chɛ u ŋaa ma kuhiaŋ, u maga duu nɛ tiŋ tiŋtiŋŋaa pipima.
Ma tuɔŋ nii-la ma síi chɛ u ŋaa ma tuɔŋ kuoro, u maga duu nɛ ŋaa ma tuɔŋ yomo.
Mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie, mi bi kɔ di mi chɛ niaa di ba tima pimi, mi kɔ di mi-na tima piba nɛ a suu a laa niaa miisaa yugɛ ta a piba.”
Yesu ari u haritooroo si lii Jɛrikɔ lɛ, ni-daŋ nɛ to ba hariŋ.
Di nyulimaa balia hɔŋ woŋbiiŋ niiŋ a nii di Yesu níi bal. Ŋii nɛ ba faasa yirɛ a bula pu a bul, “Yesu, Devit nihii, fála nennige.”
Ŋii nɛ ni-daŋ-la kpiaba lɛ di ba kɛŋ goŋ. Ama ba faasa yirɛ a kii ŋii a bul, “La Tiina, Devit nihii, fála nennige.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu chiŋ aŋ yirɛba a piɛsɛba, “Bɛɛ kuŋ nɛ ma chɛ mi ŋaa pima?”
Ŋii nɛ ba bul, “La Tiina, laa chɛ di ŋ suri la siaa nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu fába nennige a digi ba siaa lɛ. Ba siaa guu suri, ba tuto u hariŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu ari u haritooroo sii mu Jerusalɛm. Ba ku yi Bɛtifagi a ku yi peel kubala baa yirɛ Oliv. Ŋii nɛ Yesu liisɛ u haritooroo balia a tiŋba a bula piba a bul, “Má mu taŋ-la si hɛ ma sipaaŋ.
Di ma nɛ mua, ma jaŋ na kakumo ari u bie di ba vɔbɔ a kii. Má puri a kaa kɔ pimi.
Di nuu nɛ piɛsɛma, má bula pu ari ma Tiina níi chɛ. U jaŋ leŋ di ma kaa kɔ lima.”
Wiiŋ deeŋ ŋaa di wii-la nii-la fa síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ ku ŋaa wutitii nɛ.
U fa si,
“Má bulaa pi Zaayɔŋ niaa
di ba bee na, di ba kuoro níi kɔ ba teeŋ.
U kɛŋ u titia muuri nɛ a jil kakumo
a bira jil kakumo bie.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu haritooro-la mu a ŋaa wii-la Yesu si bula piba di ba ŋaa.
Ba kɛŋ kakumo-la ari u bie kaa kɔ a joŋ ba gɛnniŋ daŋ kakumo-la ari u bie nyuŋ, Yesu jil.
Ni-daŋ-la jesiŋ joŋ ba gɛnniŋ a jɛrɛ woŋbiiŋ lɛ, ka dɔŋsuŋ ma keri pipaariŋ a ma kaa jɛrɛ woŋbiiŋ lɛ.
Ni-daŋ-la si laa Yesu sipaaŋ ari nialiŋ síi to u hariŋ suomo ŋiŋaa goŋ a bul, “Tabarikala Devit nihiŋ! Wia jaŋ pɛ nii-la síi kɔ la Tiina doluŋ lɛ. Má leŋ di la dɛnnɛ Wia!”
Yesu si muu juu Jerusalɛm, taŋ-la kala zigili. Ŋii nɛ niaa piɛsɛ a bul, “Kubɛɛ nɛ ŋla?”
Ŋii nɛ ni-daŋ-la bul, “Yesu si lii Nazarɛt si hɛ Galilii tiŋteeŋ lɛ, nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, u nɛ ŋii.”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu juu Wia-dia. Nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ hɛ dimɛ a yiyallɛ kiaa, dɔŋsuŋ ma yuyɔɔ kiaa. Yesu kiriba kala ta ba lii. Baalaa ma hɛ dimɛ a yiyɛrɛ moribiee. Yesu ŋmoo ba teebulba lo. Baalaa dɔŋsuŋ ma yallɛ kokosuŋ. U ŋmoo ba ma kpasinniŋ a lo.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ba ŋmuŋsa di Wia si, u dia jaŋ ŋaa lee-la niaa si jaŋ chuchuɔlɛ Wia, aŋ ka ma-na miira kaa birimɛ gaari-dia.”
Ŋii nɛ nyulimaa ari gbegisiŋ kɔ Yesu teeŋ Wia-dia lɛ. U vaarɛba.

Ama nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba si na wu-magila-la u síi ŋaa a bira na haŋbiisiŋ síi ŋaa goŋ ŋii Wia-dia lɛ, ba na baaniŋ. Haŋbiisi-la fa yirɛ, “Tabarikala Devit nihiŋ.”

Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Ŋ nii wialiŋ ba síi bul nɛɛ?” Yesu bul, “Mi nia nɛ.” Ŋii nɛ Yesu ma piɛsɛba, “Ma bi Wia teniŋ karimaa? Ba ŋmuŋsɛ Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ a bul,
‘Wia jaŋ leŋ di bii-mulluŋ didɛnnɛ Wia.’ ”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu leŋba aŋ sii mu Bɛtani a chua dimɛ.
Taŋ si pula, Yesu miira mu Jerusalɛm. U síi mu, losuŋ kɛnu woŋbiiŋ lɛ.
U na tutogo duu chiŋ u sipaaŋ woŋbiiŋ niiŋ. U mu yi tutogo-la bubuɔŋ a wula beŋ di nɛnɛɛ tuo, see pipaariŋ. Ŋii nɛ u bul tia-la lɛ a bul, “A lii jiniŋ a kaa mumu, ŋ bira bi jaŋ nɛŋ.” Tia-la guu suu.
U haritooroo si na wiiŋ deeŋ, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere. Ba pipiɛsɛ dɔŋɔ a bul, “Ɛɛ nɛ tia-la guu suu lima ŋii?”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, di ma nɛ kɛŋ yarida a bi tuɔsaa balia kɛnɛ, ma ma jaŋ wuo ŋaa wii-la si ŋaa tutogo-la lɛ. Ŋla ma duŋduŋa dee, ama ma jaŋ wuo paala bul peeliŋ deeŋ lɛ duu sii a mu tel muga tuɔŋ. U jaŋ ŋaa pima.
Kialiŋ-na kala ma si chuɔlɛ Wia a susul, di ma nɛ kɛŋ yarida, ma jaŋ naba.”

Ba si mu Jerusalɛm, Yesu mu juu Wia-dia. U si juu Wia-dia-la ŋii a didagɛ niaa, nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasiŋ, ba kala sii kɔ u teeŋ a piɛsu a bul, “Dol bɛɛ nɛ ŋ kɛŋ a ŋiŋaa wiaa deeŋba? Kubɛɛ nɛ piŋ doluŋ ŋ kaa ŋiŋaa ŋii?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Mi ma jaŋ piɛsɛma wu-bala. Di ma nɛ dagɛmi u bubuɔŋ, mi ma jaŋ dagɛma dol-la mi si kɛnɛ bubuɔŋ.”

Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba a bul, “Jɔɔŋ, Wia lii-foori-la doluŋ, u lii nii nɛ? U lii Wia teeŋ nɛɛ koo u lii nuhuobiine teeŋ nɛɛ? Má dagɛmi.” Ba suomo kɛŋ wii-la lilɛrɛ dɔŋɔ lɛ aa bul, “Wu-bɛɛ nɛ laa chɛ di la bul? Di la nɛ bula pu a bul di Wia teeŋ nɛ u lii, u jaŋ piɛsɛla a bul, ‘Bɛɛ nɛ saa tii ma bi wialiŋ u si bula laa dii?’
Di la nɛ saa si u lii nuhuobiine teeŋ nɛ, fawulluŋ jaŋ kɛŋla a tiŋ ni-daŋ-la si chiŋ dimɛ wiaa. Niaa bula ari Jɔɔŋ fa sɛnɛ ŋaa nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ dɔŋɔ nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba bula pi Yesu a bul, “La bi jiŋ.” Ŋii nɛ Yesu ma bula piba a bul, “Tɔɔ, mi ma bi jaŋ dagɛma dol-la mi si kɛnɛ bubuɔŋ.”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu magɛ namaga a pi nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa a bul, “Baal kubala nɛ hɛ dimɛ a kɛŋ haŋbolibiisiŋ balia. U sii mu u bii-hiaŋ teeŋ a bula pu a bul, ‘Mi bii, mu baga jiniŋ a tiŋ.’

Ŋii nɛ bile bul, ‘Mi bi jaŋ mu baga jiniŋ.’ U ŋii hariŋ lɛ, u tuɔŋ chei wii-la u si bula pi u nyimma lɛ aŋ sii mu baga-la. Ŋii nɛ ba nyimma bira mu a bul u bii-bie-la ma lɛ a bul duu mu baga. Ŋii nɛ bile bul duu jaŋ mu aŋ via.

Haŋbiisiŋ deeŋba balia tuɔŋ, kubɛɛ nɛ to ba nyimma niiŋ lɛ? Bɛɛ nɛ ma biinɛ?” Ŋii nɛ ba bula pu di u bii-hiaŋ-la nɛ. Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Wutitii, mi bulaa pima ari laŋpoo lilaaraa ari jagumuloba jaŋ laa sipaaŋ ma lɛ a juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.

Haŋbiisiŋ deeŋba balia tuɔŋ, kubɛɛ nɛ to ba nyimma niiŋ lɛ? Bɛɛ nɛ ma biinɛ?” Ŋii nɛ ba bula pu di u bii-hiaŋ-la nɛ. Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Wutitii, mi bulaa pima ari laŋpoo lilaaraa ari jagumuloba jaŋ laa sipaaŋ ma lɛ a juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.

Bɛɛ wiaa Jɔɔŋ Wia lii-foori-la kɔ a dagɛma woŋbii-titii-la nɛ ma si jaŋ to, aŋ ka ma bi u wiaa laa dii, ama laŋpoo lilaaraa ari jagumuloba, ba laa u wiaa dii. Ma si paala na ba si laa u wiaa dii ŋii, aŋ ka ma ha bi birima di ma laa u wiaa dii.”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira magɛ namaga dɔŋɔ a bul, “Baal kubala nɛ bil baga a chɔŋsɛ kiaa si kɛŋ nɛnɛɛ yugɛ a nagɛ chichuɛŋ. Ba yiyirɛ gireps. U saa ligɛ baga-la golli nɛ. U lu bua baga-la tuɔŋ di ba chagɛ tii-nɛnɛ-la liiŋ hihɛ. U ma saa lusuŋ nyuŋ dia a hɔnɔ pɔ. Ŋii nɛ u paa niaa a hɛ u baga-la tuɔŋ di ba titiŋ. Ka u mu taŋ dɔŋ.
Tii-nɛnɛ-la biiniŋ si yie, u tiŋ u dia tiŋtinnaa di ba mu tiŋtinna-la teeŋ di ba mu laa tii-nɛnɛ-la kaa kɔ. Ba mu.
Ba kɛŋ dɔŋɔ a ŋmobu, a kpu dɔŋɔ, a yagɛ dɔŋɔ ari tabiaa a kpuu.
Ŋii nɛ u tiŋ niaa dɔŋsuŋ a wasa kii buŋbuŋ-la. Ba ŋaa ŋii titia nialiŋ ma lɛ.
Ŋii hariŋ lɛ nɛ u tiŋ u bie. U biina duu bie nɛ mua, ba jaŋ zilu. U ma bira mu.
Tiŋtinna-la si na bile, ba bula pi dɔŋɔ a bul, ‘Di baga-la tiina nɛ suba, bie deeŋ nɛ jaŋ dii u kiaa. Má kɔ di la kpuu. Di la nɛ kpuu, la nɛ jaŋ miira tii u kialiŋ.’
Ba kɛŋ bile a joŋu yuo ta baga-la hariŋ a kpuu.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛba, “Di baga-la tiina nɛ kɔ, ɛɛ nɛ u jaŋ ŋaa baga tiŋtinna-la lɛ?”
Ŋii nɛ ba bula pu a bul, “U jaŋ kɔ a kpu ni-bɔmɔ-la aŋ joŋ baga-la a pi ni-tania. Di tii-nɛnɛɛ-la biiniŋ nɛ yi, ba jaŋ kɛŋ tii-nɛnɛ-la kaa mu pu.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛ nialiŋ si nii namaga-la, “Ma bi Wia teŋ-la karimaa? a mu yi lee-la ba si bul ŋla:
‘Tiebii-la dii-saaraa si via,
u nɛ miira ku ŋaa tiebii-duoŋ ba si joŋo bil dia geŋtine.
La Tiina Wia tiŋtiŋŋaa nɛ ŋii.
U ŋaala wu-kpuŋkpere nɛ.’ ”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi nialiŋ a bul, “Wia jaŋ kɛŋ u kuorii-la laa ma teeŋ, a joŋo pi nialiŋ si jaŋ to Wia niiŋ woruŋ a ŋiŋaa wialiŋ si jaŋ dagɛ ari ba birima lii ba haachɛba lɛ nɛ. [
Nii-la si tel tiebii-la nyuŋ, u tiina jaŋ yɛrɛ muno muno. Di tiebii-la ma nɛ tel nuu-kala nyuŋ, u jaŋ yɛrɛ u tiina muno muno.]”
Nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Farisii tiŋŋaa nii Yesu si magɛ namaga-la a jiŋ ari ba wiaa nɛ u bubul ŋii.
Ŋii nɛ ba wiwalimɛ di ba kɛnu kaa mu tɔ dia. Ama ba faa fá ni-daŋ-la si hɛ dimɛ, bɛɛ wiaa ni-daŋ-la joŋ Yesu ari u ŋaa nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ dɔŋɔ nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira magɛ namaga dɔŋɔ a didagɛ niaa.
U si, “Wia kuorii-la nagɛ kuoru kubala nɛ. U bie jaa haala. Ŋii nɛ u ŋaa ba gbigbieli ha-jaari gbiele a ŋaa ba yirɛ niaa di ba kɔ gbiele-la.
Ba si ŋaa kudiile-la dɛrɛ, u tiŋ u tiŋtinnaa di ba mu yirɛ nialiŋ u si yira, ari ba ŋaa siri di ba gbieli gbiele-la nɛ. Ba si mu yirɛba, ba via.
Ŋii nɛ u bira tiŋ u tiŋtinnaa dɔŋsuŋ di ba mu bula pi nialiŋ u si yira di ba kpu nɛ-belliŋ ari nɛ-niiniŋ kala nɛ a ŋaa kudiile-la dɛrɛ, di ba kɔ ha-jaari gbiele-la.
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ u si yira bira via di ba mu aŋ titiŋ ba tiŋtiŋŋaa. Dɔŋɔ sii mu u baga, dɔŋɔ ma sii mu u kiaa di-yalliŋ.
Ka dɔŋsuŋ ma kɛsɛ kuoro dia tiŋtinna-la a ŋmooba aŋ kpuba.
Ŋii nɛ kuoru-la na baaniŋ a ta u laali-yuoroo. Ba mu kpu nialiŋ si kpu u dia tiŋtinna-la aŋ nyigɛ ba taŋ kala.
Ŋii nɛ u yirɛ u tiŋtinnaa dɔŋsuŋ a bira bula piba, ‘Mi gbiele kudiile-la ŋaa siri nɛ, ama nialiŋ mi si yira bi maga di ba kɔ gbiele-la.
Má saa lii mu woŋbii-porunuŋ a yirɛ nialiŋ kala ma si na dimɛ a bula piba di ba kɔ a dii kudiile-la.’
Ŋii nɛ tiŋtinna-la lii woŋbii-porunu-la a yirɛ nialiŋ kala ba si na lee-la, ni-zɔŋŋɔɔ ari ni-bɔŋŋɔɔ kala. Ŋii nɛ ba kala ku juu su̱ dia-la lɛ ba fa síi gbieli gbiele-la.
Ŋii nɛ kuoru-la juu duu na nialiŋ si kɔ a na baal kubala duu bi ha-jaari gbiele gɛriŋ laala.
U piɛsu a bul, ‘Mi naŋdɔŋ, ɛɛ nɛ ŋ ŋaa ku juu daha aŋ bi ha-jaari gbiele gɛriŋ laala?’ Baal-la tɔrɛ u niiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ kuoru-la bula pi u tiŋtinnaa a bul, ‘Má kɛŋ baala deeŋ a vɔɔ u nisaa ari u naasiŋ a joŋu yuo ta jeeŋ hariŋ birimiŋ tuɔŋ duu pina yiyel aŋ didiŋ u nyilaa.’ ”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula dɛrɛ aŋ bul, “Ba yie yirɛ niaa yugɛ nɛ, ama ba tuɔŋ ba yie tuɔsɛ niaa baŋmɛnɛ nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Farisii tiŋŋaa sii lii a vuurɛ ŋii ba si jaŋ magisɛ Yesu a bɛrɛ kɛnu ari wu-piɛsaa. Ŋii nɛ ba tiŋ ba haritooroo dɔŋsuŋ ari Hɛrɔd ma haritooroo dɔŋsuŋ di ba mu Yesu teeŋ.
Ŋii nɛ ba kɔ u teeŋ a piɛsu a bul, “La kuhiaŋ, la jima di ŋ kɛŋ wutitii nɛ a didagɛ Wia tonuŋ woŋbii-titii-la. Ŋ sipaaŋ tuo nuu lɛ. Ŋ bi ni-bal síi ka fá.
Saa bula pila ari u ŋaa woŋbii nɛɛ di la ti̱ŋ laŋpoo a pi Rom tiŋteeŋ kuori-baliŋ ba síi yirɛ Siiza? Ɛɛ nɛ ŋ ma biinɛ?”
Yesu fa jiŋ ba tuɔbiiŋ-bɔmɔ-la nɛ a bula piba a bul, “Ma kaŋfugi timma! Bɛɛ nɛ tii maa magisɛmi?
Má kɛŋ ma laŋpo-la moribiiŋ kaa kɔ di mi bee na.”
Ba kɛŋ dɔŋɔ kaa kɔ. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba, “Kubɛɛ nyuŋ nɛ hɛ dimɛ? Kubɛɛ yiriŋ ma nɛ ba tuuro hɛ moribii-la lɛ?”
Ŋii nɛ ba bul di Siiza yiriŋ nɛ. U bula piba a bul, “Tɔɔ, má joŋ Rom tiŋteeŋ kuori-bal-la kiaa pu aŋ joŋ Wia ma kiaa pu.”
Yesu si bul ŋii, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere ba sii viiri.
Chɛɛ-la titia nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ ba síi yirɛ Sadusii tiŋŋaa, ba kɔ u teeŋ. Sadusii tiŋŋaa yie si di nuu nɛ suba, u bira bi sii. Ba piɛsu wiaa a bul,

“La kuhiaŋ, Moosis fa si di baala nɛ jaa haala, di haal-la ari baal-la nɛ bi bii lula, aŋ ka di baal-la suu, u maga di u ŋaana joŋ yo-haal-la jaa nɛ. Di u lul biiriŋ pi u maala-la si suba, biiri-la jaŋ chiŋ u nyuŋ lɛ.
Naaŋbiiriŋ balipɛ nɛ fa hɛ dimɛ. Ba kala ŋaa baalaa. Ba naaŋ kubala, ba nyimma kubala. Ba kuhiaŋ jaa haala. Ba di haal-la bi bii lula, aŋ ka u suu. U si suba, u ka haal-la a pi u ŋaana dɔŋɔ nɛ.
Liamiŋ ma suu. Torimuŋ tiina ma joŋ haal-la jaa. U ma ŋii titia nɛ. Naaŋbiiri-la balipɛ kala nɛ jaa haal-la. U bi lula.
Ŋii hariŋ lɛ nɛ haal-la ma titia suu.
Tapulii-la niaa si jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ, baalaa deeŋba balipɛ tuɔŋ, kubɛɛ nɛ jaŋ tii haal-la? Ba kala balipɛ nɛ jaau.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ma bi Wia teniŋ jiŋ. Ma ma bi Wia doluŋ jiŋ. Ŋii nɛ tii ma yeŋŋi.
Tapulii-la niaa si jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ, baalaa bira bi jaŋ jaa haalaa, haalaa ma bira bi jaŋ jaa balaba. Ba kala jaŋ nagɛ Wia tiŋdaaraa si hɛ Wia-jaŋ lɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Na ma piɛsɛmi nialiŋ si jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ wiaa nɛ. Ma bi karimɛ wialiŋ Wia fa si bula pi niaa u teniŋ lɛɛ?

U fa si duu nɛ ŋaa Abiraham Wia ari Aizik Wia ari Jekɔb kala Wia. (Bua-la lɛ u si bul ŋii di Abiraham ari Aizik ari Jekɔb fa suba nɛ.) Wiaa deeŋba u si bula, ba bubuɔŋ nɛ di Abiraham ari Aizik ari Jekɔb bira sii suuŋ lɛ nɛ a hɛ Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ. Wia bi jaŋ wuo ŋaa nialiŋ si suba Wia, u ŋaa ni-weyee Wia nɛ.”
Ni-daŋ-la si nii ŋii u síi dagɛ niaa, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere.
Farisii tiŋŋaa si nia ari Yesu bul wiaa lo Sadusii tiŋŋaa ba ŋaa fuii, ba kala ku pɛ dɔŋɔ lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Wia teniŋ kerichiba dɔŋɔ wiwalimɛ duu magisɛ Yesu a pipiɛsu wiaa.
U piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Kuhiaŋ, wialiŋ Wia si dagɛ niaa baa to, kubɛɛ nɛ ŋaa ba tuɔŋ siifiaŋ wiiŋ?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bul, “‘Kɛŋ ŋ tuɔŋ kala ari ŋ tuɔbiinaa kala ari ŋ wii-wii-kala a cho ŋ Tiina Wia.’
Wialiŋ Wia si dagɛ niaa baa to, ba tuɔŋ wu-baliŋ ari ba tuɔŋ buŋbuŋ nɛ ŋii ari ba tuɔŋ siifiaŋ wiiŋ nɛ ŋii.
Wu-liamiŋ ma nɛ ŋla: ‘Cho ŋ dɔŋɔ tiina ari ŋ si cho ŋ titia ŋii.’
Wialiŋ Moosis fa si ŋmuŋsa bil di niaa tuto ari wialiŋ kala nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, ba kala lii wiaa deeŋba baliamiŋ tuɔŋ nɛ.”
Farisii tiŋŋaa ha si hilimi ŋii, Yesu ma piɛsɛba a bul,
“Bɛɛ nɛ ma biinɛ Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisa wiaa? Kubɛɛ doho nuu nɛ u ŋaa?” Ŋii nɛ ba bul duu ŋaa Devit doho nuu nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira piɛsɛba a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ saa tii Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la fa dagɛ Devit duu kɛnu yirɛ u Tiina?
Ŋla nɛ u bul:
‘Mi Tiina Wia bula pi mi Tiina
duu hɔŋ u sɛmɛ, ni-duoŋ di-hɔnuŋ,
see duu yuo dii u diŋdɔŋŋɔɔ kala dɛrɛ.’
Devit titia si yirɛ nia deeŋ u Tiina, ɛɛ nɛ saa u jaŋ wuo ŋaa u nihiŋ duŋduŋa?”
Yesu si bul ŋii, nuu-kala bira bi wii wuo bul. A chiŋ tapulii-la kala a kaa mu, nuu-kala ma bira bi nyu-duoŋ kɛnɛ duu piɛsu wii-kala.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi ni-daŋ-la ari u haritooroo a bul,
“Wia teniŋ kerichiba-la ari Farisii timma-la, ba nɛ ŋaa nialiŋ síi dagɛ wialiŋ Moosis fa si bile di niaa tuto.
Ŋii wiaa ma maga di ma to wialiŋ kala ba si bula pima di ma ŋaa, ama ma sí ba wu-ŋaalaa chesu, bɛɛ wiaa ba titia bi wialiŋ ba síi dagu ka to.
Ba yie vɔɔ chugi-yuŋoo nɛ a kaa chuŋ niaa, ama ba titia bi chɛ di ba pɛba lɛ a laa chuga-la.
Ba yie ŋaa wii-kala di niaa naba nɛ. Ba yie ŋmuŋsɛ Wia niiŋ wiaa a hɛ teŋ-jalaa lɛ a kaa vuvɔɔ ba gɛnniŋ nisaa lɛ ari ba nyuŋ-chuuluŋ lɛ aŋ leŋ ba gɛnniŋ juɔsaa ma duomi duomi.
Di niaa nɛ yirɛba di ba ku dii kiaa, ba cho di ba hɔŋ ni-balaa di-hɔnɔɔ. Ba nɛ juu Wii-chuɔlɛ diisiŋ maa, ba cho di ba hɔŋ ni-balaa di-hɔnɔɔ.
Ba yie chichɛ di niaa chuchuɔlɛba aŋ jujoŋba jirima niaa tuɔŋ aŋ yiyirɛba kerichiba.
Ama ma-na sí leŋe di niaa kɛŋma kaa yirɛ kerichiba. Ma kala ŋaa naaŋbiiriŋ nɛ. Ma kala kerichi ŋaa kubala nɛ.
U saa bi maga di ma yirɛ nuu-kala ma nyimma dunia deeŋ lɛ, bɛɛ wiaa ma Nyimma ŋaa kubala nɛ a hɛ Wia-jaŋ.
Ma bira sí nuu-kala yirɛ ma kuhiaŋ, bɛɛ wiaa ma kuhiaŋ nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisa.
U maga di ma tuɔŋ kuhiaŋ nɛ birimɛ haŋbie a tiŋ tiŋtiŋŋaa pipima.
Nii-la kala síi bigisi u titia lɛ, Wia jaŋ kɛnu muuri, ka nii-la ma si kɛŋ u titia muuri, Wia jaŋ ŋaa duu yugɛ.

Ma Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ma Farisii tiŋŋaa, ma kaŋfugi timma-la, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma kɛŋ Wia kuorii-la dia-boro yagɛ nɛ di niaa sí juu, bɛɛ wiaa ma titia bi chɛ di ma juu, aŋ bira pɔ di nialiŋ síi walimɛ di ba juu, di ba ma sí juu. [

Ma Wia teniŋ kerichiba-la ari ma Farisii timma-la, ma kaŋfugi timma-la, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma yie kɛŋ yo-haalaa kiaa laa didii a yie fugo chuɔlɛ Wia didieni. Bua-la lɛ Wia si jaŋ dii ma sariya, ma nɛ jaŋ na hɛɛŋ a kii nuu-kala.]

Ma Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ma Farisii tiŋŋaa, ma kaŋfugi timma-la, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma yie sii a duori liiŋ a mu tiŋteyee dɔŋsuŋ a bul Wia wiaa dimɛ. Di ni-bala nɛ laa dii, ma yie leŋ u wasa bɔŋ a nagɛ ma si nagɛ ŋii nɛ. Wia ma jaŋ joŋu hɛ nyiniŋ lɛ ari u si jaŋ joŋma hɛ ŋii. Ma nyuluŋ sipaa-laaraa, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma yie bul, ‘Di nuu nɛ ŋmiɛsɛ Wia-dia, u bi ŋmiaŋ ŋaa, ama duu nɛ ŋmiɛsɛ sɛlimɛ kialiŋ si hɛ Wia-dia tuɔŋ, u chaasa ŋmiɛsɛ ŋmiaŋ nɛ.’

Ma Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ma Farisii tiŋŋaa, ma kaŋfugi timma-la, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma yie sii a duori liiŋ a mu tiŋteyee dɔŋsuŋ a bul Wia wiaa dimɛ. Di ni-bala nɛ laa dii, ma yie leŋ u wasa bɔŋ a nagɛ ma si nagɛ ŋii nɛ. Wia ma jaŋ joŋu hɛ nyiniŋ lɛ ari u si jaŋ joŋma hɛ ŋii. Ma nyuluŋ sipaa-laaraa, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma yie bul, ‘Di nuu nɛ ŋmiɛsɛ Wia-dia, u bi ŋmiaŋ ŋaa, ama duu nɛ ŋmiɛsɛ sɛlimɛ kialiŋ si hɛ Wia-dia tuɔŋ, u chaasa ŋmiɛsɛ ŋmiaŋ nɛ.’
Ma nyuluŋ-tɔɔ nɛ! Sɛlimɛ kialiŋ si hɛ Wia-dia tuɔŋ ari dia-la si ŋaa sɛlimɛ-la bi disinniŋ kɛnɛ, deeŋba balia tuɔŋ kubɛɛ nɛ yuga?
Ma bira bula di nuu nɛ ŋmiɛsɛ koru-la lɛ ba si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia, u bi chaasa ŋmiɛsɛ ŋmiaŋ, ama duu nɛ ŋmiɛsɛ ku-la ba si yie joŋo daŋ koru-la nyuŋ a pi Wia, u chaasa ŋmiɛsɛ ŋmiaŋ nɛ.
Ma nyulimaa, ku-la ba si yie joŋo daŋ koru-la nyuŋ ari koru-la si ŋaa di ku-la bi disinniŋ kɛnɛ, kiaa deeŋba balia tuɔŋ kubɛɛ nɛ yuga?
Ŋii wiaa di nuu nɛ ŋmiɛsɛ koru-la lɛ ba si yie kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia, u yie ŋmiɛsɛ ba di ku-la kala nɛ ba si yie joŋo daŋ u nyuŋ a pi Wia.
Di nuu nɛ bira ŋmiɛsɛ Wia-dia, u ŋmiɛsɛ Wia dia-la ari Wia kala nɛ, bɛɛ wiaa Wia hɛ dia-la lɛ nɛ.
Di nuu nɛ bira ŋmiɛsɛ Wia-jaŋ, u ŋmiɛsɛ Wia kuori-kpasa-la ari nii-la si hɔŋ u lɛ ma nɛ.

Ma Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ma Farisii tiŋŋaa, ma kaŋfugi timma-la, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Di ma jaa pipaari-la suɔra si sima, ari pipaari-la si hɛyɛ, ari pipaa-diilee, ma yie kɛŋba kala kaa kpaa leree fii fii a joŋ ba kuŋ-kala leriŋ dɔŋɔ a pi Wia aŋ via di ma to siifiaŋ wialiŋ Moosis fa si bile pima di ma tuto. Ba nɛ ŋla: Má to wutitii woŋbiiŋ a fá niaa nennige a laa Wia dii. U maga di ma kpaa ma kialiŋ leree fii fii nɛ a joŋ kubala pi Wia, ama u bi maga di ma via wutitii woŋbiiŋ.
Ma nyuluŋ sipaa-laaraa! Ma yie chuori ma siniŋ a liisɛ naŋchuɔsuŋ kala ta aŋ bi buŋtaŋŋaba na aŋ liliŋ.

Ma Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ma Farisii tiŋŋaa, ma kaŋfugi timma-la, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma yie chɛsɛ ma nyunyualusuŋ ari ma gbaŋsiŋ hariŋ woruŋ di ba zɔŋ aŋ bi ba tuɔŋ ka tiisi, ka ba tuɔŋ kala birisi. Ma nagɛ nyunyualuŋ ari gbaŋsiŋ deeŋba nɛ. Ma yaraa nɛ zɔmɔ, ama ma tuɔŋ lɛ ma to ma tuɔtɔruŋ lɛ a gigaa niaa kiaa.
Ma nyuluŋ Farisii tiŋŋaa, má laa sipaaŋ tiisi ma nyunyualuŋ tuɔŋ aŋ-na tiisi hariŋ ma duu zɔŋ.
Ma Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ma Farisii tiŋŋaa, ma kaŋfugi timma-la, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma nagɛ vaamaa ba si kɛŋ tuɔruŋ bugɛ nɛ. Ba hariŋ zɔŋ, aŋ ka ba tuɔŋ kala su̱ ari haŋgbelee ari ni-suunuŋ.
Ŋii titia nɛ ma ma nagɛ niaa teeŋ. Di ba nama, ba yie biinɛ di ma ŋaa ni-zɔmɔ nɛ, ka ma tuɔŋ su̱ ari wu-bɔŋŋɔɔ ari kaŋfugi wu-ŋaalaa.
Ma Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ma Farisii tiŋŋaa, ma jaŋ na hɛɛŋ. Ma kpu nialiŋ fa síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, aŋ ka ma saa ba vaamaa.
Ma si, ‘Di la nɛ fa hɛ dimɛ bua-la lɛ la naabalimaba fa si hɛ ba miisiŋ lɛ, la fa bi jaŋ ŋaa ŋii ba si ŋaa a kpu nialiŋ.’
Ama ma si yirɛba ma naabalimaba ŋii, ma sɛnɛ sɛi ari ma ŋaa nialiŋ si kpu nialiŋ fa síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, ba doho niaa nɛ.
Má saa mu a dɛrɛ wialiŋ ma naabalimaba fa si suomo a ŋiŋaa.
Ma ni-bɔŋŋɔɔ ari ma ni-bɔŋŋɔɔ biiriŋ, ma biina ari ma jaŋ wuo fá kagɛ Wia nyiŋ-la lɛɛ? Ai.

Ŋii wiaa, mi jaŋ bira tiŋ nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ ari wu-jinnaa ari kerichiba. Ma jaŋ kpu dɔŋsuŋ a kɛŋ dɔŋsuŋ kpaasa mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ, a viirɛ dɔŋsuŋ maa, ma Wii-chuɔlɛ diisiŋ lɛ, a to naasiŋ dɔgisɛ dɔŋsuŋ maa tasiŋ dɔŋsuŋ lɛ.

Wia jaŋ dɔgisɛ jiniŋ niaa a tiŋ ba si kpu niaa, a chiŋ bua-la lɛ ba si kpu nialiŋ si bi wii cheye, a suomi Ebil lɛ a kaa kɔ bua-la lɛ ba si kpu Zekaraya, Berakia bie. Ba kpuu Wia-dia tuɔŋ a kpagɛ koru-la nyuŋ ba si yie nyigɛ pusuŋ pipi Wia nɛ. Ba cheeriŋ jaŋ hɛ ba nyuŋ.
Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, dɔgisunu-la Wia si jaŋ dɔgisɛ ni-kpuuraa deeŋba, u jaŋ joŋo dɔgisɛ jiniŋ niaa.

Ma Jerusalɛm niaa, ma kpu nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ a joŋ tabiaa a yagɛ tiŋdaara-la Wia si tima di ba kɔ ma teeŋ. Naaŋsiiŋ yuga nɛ mi fa cho di mi chu tɔ ma niaa kala ari ji̱miŋ si yie chu tɔ u biiriŋ ŋii, ka ma bi sɛyɛ.
Bee na, Wia jaŋ leŋ ma taŋ pima.
Ma bira bi jaŋ nami see bua-la lɛ ma si jaŋ chuɔlɛmi a bul, ‘Wia jaŋ pɛ nii-la síi kɔ la Tiina Wia doluŋ lɛ.’ ”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu sii lii Wia-dia-la lɛ a viiri. Ŋii nɛ u haritooroo kɔ a bula pu duu bee na Wia-dia-la si zɔmɔ ŋii, u jáŋ kala ma saa zɔmɔ ŋii nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu si, “Oo, ma bee na u si zɔmɔ ŋii nɛ. Wutitii, mi bulaa pima, ba jaŋ ŋmoo jaŋ-la kala lo. Ba bi jaŋ leŋ di tiebii-bala ma ka daŋ u dɔŋɔ lɛ.”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu mu hɔŋ Oliv peel-la nyuŋ. U haritooroo luɔra kɔ u teeŋ a bira piɛsu a bul, “Bua bɛɛ lɛ nɛ wiaa deeŋba jaŋ ŋaa? Bɛɛ kiaa nɛ la jaŋ na a jiŋ bua-la lɛ ŋ si jaŋ kɔ, ari bua-la lɛ dunia si jaŋ dɛrɛ?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Má kɛŋ ma titia woruŋ di nuu-kala síma nyisu.
Niaa jaŋ yugɛ a kɔ a joŋ mi yiriŋ hɛ ari ba nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, a nyisɛ niaa yugɛ.
Ma jaŋ nii ari laaliŋ hɛ daha a hɛ di-bolii. Di ma nɛ ku nii ŋii, ma sí leŋe di ma bɔyɛ joŋ. Wiaa deeŋba kala jaŋ ŋaa bal, ama dunia didɛriŋ ha dee ŋii.
Tiŋteeŋ dɔŋɔ niaa jaŋ sii a mu a yuo tiŋteeŋ dɔŋɔ niaa. Taŋ kuoro ari u niaa jaŋ sii giri a mu yuo kuoro dɔŋɔ ari u niaa. Losuŋ ma jaŋ juu. Tiŋteeŋ jaŋ zigili leree yugɛ.
Hɛɛŋ di-suomuŋ nɛ ŋla.
Ba jaŋ kɛsɛma a joŋma hɛ niaa nisiŋ lɛ di ba dɔgisɛma aŋ kpu ma dɔŋsuŋ.
Tiŋtee dɔŋsuŋ niaa kala jaŋ bɛrɛma a tiŋ mi wiaa. Bua-la lɛ niaa jaŋ yugɛ a joŋ ba yarida ta, ba jaŋ joŋ dɔŋɔ yiyallɛ, a bɛrɛ dɔŋɔ maa.
Nialiŋ si nyia wiaa a bul di baa bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, ba jaŋ yugɛ a kɔ a nyisɛ niaa yugɛ.
Wu-bɔŋŋɔɔ jaŋ purikɛ. A tiŋ ŋii wiaa niaa fa si cho niaa ŋii, ba chonu-la jaŋ dɛrɛ.
Ama nii-la kala si nyalimɛ a mu dɛrɛ, Wia jaŋ laau ta.
Ba jaŋ laa sipaaŋ bul Wia wu-zɔmɔ-la a tigɛ Wia kuorii-la lɛ lee-na kala di dunia nuu-kala nii, ka di dunia didɛriŋ-na yi.

Ma jaŋ na ku-lɔru-la, u wiaa Daniɛl fa si bula. Daniɛl fa ŋaa nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ. Ba jaŋ joŋ ku-la bil Wia-dia lɛ, lee-la si bi disinniŋ kɛnɛ (lee-la nii-la si kɛŋ disinniŋ si bi maga duu mu). Ma nialiŋ si karimɛ wiaa deeŋba, ma jaŋ jiŋ ba bubuɔsaa.
Di ma na ŋii, má leŋ di nialiŋ si hɛ Judiya lɛ, di ba fá jil peelee nyuŋ a faa.
Di nuu nɛ hɛ u lusuŋ nyuŋ a nii wiaa deeŋba, di u nɛ ku tuu, duu sí u dia juu a chichɛ duu paa u kiaa dia lɛ.
Di nuu-kala nɛ hɛ u baga lɛ a nii wiaa deeŋba, duu sí miira mu dia a chichɛ duu paa u gɛnniŋ.
Nialiŋ si kɛŋ luoroo ari nialiŋ si nɔgɛ biiriŋ, oi, ba jaŋ na hɛɛŋ woruŋ.
Má sul Wia di wiiŋ deeŋ sí yibiiniŋ koo chɛ-wiesiŋ ŋaa.
Wia si ŋaa dunia a kuu lii jiniŋ, nuu-kala ha bi hɛɛ-yiri deeŋ na a nagɛ ŋii, ba bira bi jaŋ na hɛɛŋ ŋii a kaa mu wuu.
Di Wia fa bi tapulia-la kere ta, ni-bala ma fa bi jaŋ ka. Ama nialiŋ Wia si liisa di baa tou, ba wiaa nɛ tii u keri tapulia-la ta.
Di nuu-kala nɛ bula piŋ di ŋ beŋ daha a na Kirisito-la, koo di ŋ beŋ dimɛ a nau, síu yarida ŋaa.

Niaa dɔŋsuŋ jaŋ sii fugo bul di ba nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisa. Dɔŋsuŋ ma jaŋ sii fugo bul di ba ŋaa nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ. Ba jaŋ ŋaa wu-magilaa ari wu-kpuŋkperisiŋ kala a chichɛ di ba nyisɛ nialiŋ Wia si liisa di baa toba.
Wiaa deeŋba kala mi laa sipaaŋ bula pima nɛ, ka di bua-la-na yi.
Má bee na, di niaa nɛ bula pima ari nii-la Wia si liisa nɛ hɛ giri-bine tuɔŋ, ma sí dimɛ mu, koo di ba nɛ bula pima ari u nɛ faa daha, ma sí laa dii,
bɛɛ wiaa bua-la lɛ mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie si jaŋ miira kɔ, u jaŋ nagɛ duonuŋ si ligisa, pulumuŋ chaanɛ wia nyuŋ ŋii a lii wii-pɔsuŋ a tuu wii-juuluŋ.
Lee-la kala ku-pua si pina, duunoo ma yie hihilimi nɛ.”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bula piba a bul, “Tapulia-la hɛɛŋ deeŋ si jaŋ dɛrɛ, u bira bi jaŋ dieni, di taŋ nɛ pula maa, leriŋ jaŋ biri, chɛnɛ ma bira bi jaŋ pɔsɛ. Chɛŋwulaa jaŋ lii wia nyuŋ ku tuu titel. Ba jaŋ kiri wia nyuŋ kialiŋ kala si kɛŋ doluŋ di ba lii ba leree.

Ŋii nɛ ma jaŋ na mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie magiliŋ wia nyuŋ. Di dunia niaa nɛ nau, ba kala jaŋ yel. Ŋii lɛ nɛ ma jaŋ na mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie, di mi to duoŋbiliŋbaanaa tuɔŋ ku tuu. Mi jaŋ kɛŋ doluŋ yugɛ a chaanɛ.
Ŋii nɛ ba jaŋ ŋmuu nyil-baliŋ, a tiŋ Wia tiŋdaaraa di ba mu dunia sɛmɛ-na kala a kɛŋ nialiŋ kala Wia si liisa di baa tou a hilimi.
Di ma na sɔjaamiŋ nɛ kuu tɔsɛ, ma jima ari liŋbaŋa yie nɛ.
Namaga deeŋ dagɛma wu-jimiŋ nɛ. Di ma na wiaa deeŋba kala di baa ŋaa, ma jiŋ di mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie kpaga nɛ.
Wutitii mi bulaa pima, ma lɛɛlɛ niaa deeŋba si hɛ miisiŋ lɛ bi jaŋ suu, ka wiaa deeŋba ŋaa bal.
Wia nyuŋ ari tiŋteeŋ kala jaŋ dɛrɛ, ama wialiŋ mi si bula bi jaŋ lɛl.
Ama nuu-kala bi jaŋ jiŋ chɛɛ-la wiaa deeŋba si jaŋ ŋaa. Wia tiŋdaaraa si hɛ Wia-jaŋ ma paala bi jaŋ jiŋ, see mi Nyimma duŋduŋa.
Bua-la lɛ mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie si jaŋ miira kɔ, u jaŋ nagɛ bua-la lɛ Nowa fa si hɛ u miisiŋ lɛ nɛ.
Ka di duonuŋ nii a su̱ dunia, nialiŋ dii kudiilee a nyunyua siniŋ. Baalaa ari haalaa ma jijaa dɔŋɔ a mu yi tapulii-la Nowa fa si juu liiŋ daboro-la tuɔŋ.
Ba fa bi jiŋ wii-la kala si ŋaa see bua-la lɛ lii-la si ku pɛllɛ paa ba kala, ba suu. Ŋii titia nɛ jaŋ ŋaa bua-la lɛ mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie si jaŋ kɔ.
Bua-la lɛ baalaa balia jaŋ pipɛrɛ baga lɛ. Wia jaŋ joŋ dɔŋɔ aŋ leŋ dɔŋɔ ta.
Haalaa balia ma jaŋ nunɔŋ munuŋ nɔmuŋ lɛ. Wia jaŋ joŋ dɔŋɔ aŋ leŋ dɔŋɔ ta.
Má saa kɛŋ ma titia woruŋ, bɛɛ wiaa ma bi jiŋ tapulii-la ma Tiina si jaŋ kɔ.
Di nuu nɛ fa jiŋ bua-la lɛ gaara si jaŋ ku gaa u kiaa u dia lɛ, u fa jaŋ hɔnɔ pɔ u dia. U fa bi jaŋ piŋ doŋ. U jaŋ wei a pɔ di gaaru-la sí ku juu a gaa u kiaa.
Má ma saa ŋaa siri, bɛɛ wiaa mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie jaŋ kɔ bua-la lɛ ma si buu yiɛlɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ la Tiina Yesu miira piɛsɛba a bul, “Kubɛɛ nɛ saa ŋaa tiŋtinni-titii-la si jiŋ wiaa? U nɛ nii-la u kuhiaŋ si yie liisɛ duu bibeŋ u dia, aŋ pɛ pipi u tiŋtinni-dɔŋsuŋ ma kudiilee.
Di tiŋtinni-la ŋaa wialiŋ u kuhiaŋ si dagu duu ŋaa, u tuɔŋ jaŋ tɔrɛ bua-la lɛ u kuhiaŋ-la si jaŋ miira kɔ.
Wutitii, mi bulaa pima, u kuhiaŋ-la jaŋ joŋ u kiaa kala hɛ tiŋtinna deeŋ nisiŋ lɛ duu bibeŋ.
Ama di tiŋtinni-bɔmɔ-la nɛ bula pi u titia ari u kuhiaŋ-la jaŋ dieni
aŋ suomo ŋmuŋmoo u tiŋtinni-dɔŋsu-la, baalaa ari haalaa, aŋ faasa didii kudiilee a nyua siniŋ bubugi,
duu ŋaa ŋii, u bi siri ŋaa gbɛrɛ u kuhiaŋ-la. U kuhiaŋ-la jaŋ kɔ tapulii-la lɛ u si bi yiɛla.
U jaŋ dɔgisu woruŋ aŋ kɛnu kaa mu hɛ lee-la kaŋfugi timma-la si hɛ. Lee-la nɛ niaa jaŋ yel aŋ didiŋ ba nyilaa.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira magɛ namaga. U si, “Bua kubala lɛ Wia kuorii-la jaŋ nagɛ ŋla: Haalaa fii nɛ fa hɛ dimɛ. Ba sii a paa ba chaanaa a mu di ba cheŋ ha-faliŋ bala, ha-jaari gbiele-la lɛ.
Haala-la deeŋba tuɔŋ banɔŋ yaarɛ, ka banɔŋ ma kɛŋ wu-jimiŋ.
Banɔŋ-la si yaara, ba bi nuuŋ lɔgɔ kori, di ba chaanaa nɛ disa, di ba joŋo hɛ.
Ama banɔŋ-la si kɛŋ wu-jimiŋ, ba lɔgɛ nuuŋ kori.
Ha-faliŋ bala-la bi lima kɔ. Ba gbɛrɛ gbɛrɛ lɔl aŋ joŋo piŋ doŋ.
Tita-siesee niaa yirɛ, ‘Má bee na baal-la níi kɔ, má ku lii chemu.’
Ŋii nɛ haala-la kala sii a kɛŋ ba chaanaa milima ta di ba jil.
Ŋii nɛ ni-yaara-la bula pi wu-jinna-la a bul, ‘La chaanaa chɛ di ba disɛ nɛ, má pila nuuŋ mua.’
Ŋii nɛ wu-jinna-la bula piba a bul, ‘Ai, ŋ bi pɔɔ nuu-la bi jaŋ yi la kala. Má mu yɔɔ ma titia nuuŋ.’
Ŋii nɛ ba mu di ba yɔɔ. Ba si mua di ba yɔɔ nuu-la, ha-faliŋ bala-la kɔ. Haala-la banɔŋ fa si ŋaa siri, ba to u hariŋ a juu ha-jaari gbiele-la leriŋ, ka ba kɛŋ boiŋ tɔ.
U ŋii hariŋ lɛ haalaa banɔŋ-la ku-kaanaa ma kɔ a bul, ‘La Tiina, la Tiina, kɛŋ boro suro pila.’
Ŋii nɛ u bul, ‘Wutitii, mi bulaa pima, mi bima jiŋ.’
Ŋii wiaa má pɔ ma titia lɛ woruŋ. Ma bi jiŋ tapulii-la la Tiina Yesu si jaŋ kɔ.”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira magɛ namaga a tigɛ Wia kuorii-la lɛ. U si, “Bua kubala lɛ Wia kuorii-la jaŋ nagɛ baal kubala si kɛŋ u tiŋtinnaa nɛ. Tapulii kubala u sii duu vɛŋ woŋbiiŋ. Ŋii nɛ u yirɛ u tiŋtinna-la ba kɔ. U joŋ u kiaa hɛ ba nisiŋ lɛ di ba bibeŋ.

U kɛŋ kialiŋ kaa kpaaba ŋii nuu-kala si wuo bibeŋ. U joŋ siidi bui zɔ-balia a pi dɔŋɔ duu bibeŋ, a joŋ siidi bui mahiŋ banɛsɛ a pi dɔŋɔ maa aŋ joŋ siidi bui mahiŋ balia a pi dɔŋɔ-la maa. Ŋii nɛ ka u vɛŋ u woŋbii-la.
Tiŋtinni-la si laa siidi bui zɔ-balia-la, u kaa mu a yɔɔ kiaa a yallɛ a na siidi bui zɔ-balia nyuuruŋ.
Tiŋtinni-la ma si laa siidi bui mahiŋ banɛsɛ-la, u ma kɛŋ u kiaa bibirimɛ, a ma na siidi bui mahiŋ banɛsɛ nyuuruŋ.
Ama tiŋtinni-la si laa siidi bui mahiŋ balia-la, u-na kaa mu lu bua a joŋ moribie-la a hugi.
U diene woruŋ, ka tiŋtinna-la batori kuhiaŋ-la kɔ a yirɛba duu na ba kuŋ-kala si na nyuuruŋ magɛ ŋii.
Tiŋtinni-la si laa siidi bui zɔ-balia-la kɛŋ u kiaa ku juu aŋ bula pi u kuhiaŋ a bul, ‘Ŋ pimi siidi bui zɔ-balia nɛ, mi ma na siidi bui zɔ-balia nɛ pɛ.’
Ŋii nɛ u kuhiaŋ-la bula pu a bul, ‘Ŋ ŋaa tiŋtinni-titii nɛ. Ŋ hɛ doluŋ nɛ a wuo beŋ kubii-bie-la nyuŋ woruŋ, mi jaŋ leŋ di ŋ bibeŋ ku-kɛnɛɛ. Ku juu di la di ŋ kala ninii sima.’
Ŋii nɛ tiŋtinni-la ma si laa siidi bui mahiŋ banɛsɛ-la ma kɛŋ u kiaa kaa ku juu a bula pi u kuhiaŋ a bul, ‘Ŋ pimi siidi bui mahiŋ banɛsɛ nɛ. Mi ma na siidi bui mahiŋ banɛsɛ nɛ a pɛ.’
Ŋii nɛ u bula pu maa, ‘Ŋ ma ŋaa tiŋtinni-titii nɛ, ŋ ma hɛ doluŋ nɛ a wuo beŋ kubii-bie-la nyuŋ woruŋ, mi ma jaŋ leŋ di ŋ bibeŋ ku-kɛnɛɛ. Ku juu di la di ŋ kala nii sima.’
Ŋii nɛ tiŋtinni-la u si joŋ siidi bui mahiŋ balia pa, u ma ku juu a bul, ‘Mi kuhiaŋ, mi jima ari ŋ ŋaa ni-tɛrɛ nɛ, ŋ yie kukuŋ kialiŋ ŋ si bi duo nɛ aŋ pipaa kialiŋ lee-la ŋ si bi tima.
Ŋii nɛ tii mi fifáŋ a joŋ moribie-la a hugi tiŋteeŋ di ŋ kɔ. Laa ŋ moribiee.’
Ŋii nɛ u kuhiaŋ-la bula pu a bul, ‘Ŋ ŋaa tiŋtinni-bɔŋ nɛ a kɛŋ yariwiiŋ. Ŋ jima ari mi yie kukuŋ kialiŋ mi si bi duo nɛ a paa kiaa lee-la mi si bi tima.
Ŋ si jiŋ ŋla lɛ, u fa maga di ŋ joŋ mi moribiee bil lee-la ba síi bil moribiee nɛ. Mi fa si miira kɔ ŋla, mi fa jaŋ laa moribie-la ari mi nyuuruŋ kala.
Ŋii-na má laa moribie-la u teeŋ a joŋo pi nii-la si kɛŋ siidi bui zɔ-banɛsɛ-la.’ ”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Nii-la si paala kɛŋ kiaa yugɛ nɛ, Wia jaŋ wasa chɛ a pɛ pu duu kaa yugɛ kiŋkɛŋ, ama nii-la si bi faasa kɛŋ kiaa yugɛ, muapilii-la ma u si kɛnɛ, Wia jaŋ kaa laa u teeŋ.
Má kɛŋ tiŋtinni-bɔmɔ-la a joŋu yuo ta birimiŋ tuɔŋ. Lee-la nɛ nialiŋ jaŋ yel aŋ didiŋ ba nyilaa.
Di mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie nɛ dii mi kuoruŋ a kɔ, mi di Wia tiŋdaaraa kala jaŋ kɔ. Ŋii nɛ mi jaŋ hɔŋ mi kuori-kpasa nyuŋ a chaanɛ.
Dunia nuu-kala jaŋ ku hilimi mi sipaaŋ. Mi jaŋ kɛŋba kaa kpaa leree balia, ari pie-daara si yie kɛŋ u piesee pɔrɛ buunaa lɛ ŋii.
Mi jaŋ leŋ di tuɔ-pul tiŋŋaa chiŋ mi na-diiŋ, ka di tuɔ-bɔŋ tiŋŋaa ma chiŋ mi na-gua.
Ŋii nɛ kuoro jaŋ bula pi nialiŋ si chiŋ u na-diiŋ a bul, ‘Má kɔ. Mi Nyimma Wia nɛ pɛma lɛ. Má ku dii Wia kuorii-la ba si wasa bilma lɛ dunia di-suomuŋ.
Bɛɛ wiaa, bua-la lɛ losuŋ fa si kɛŋmi, ma ŋaa kudiilee pimi mi dii, bua-la lɛ lii-nyuasuŋ ma fa si kɛŋmi, ma ŋaa liiŋ pimi mi nyua nɛ. Bua-la lɛ mi fa si ŋaa nuhuɔru, ma kɛŋmi woruŋ nɛ.
Bua-la lɛ mi fa kɛŋ yaribiree nɛ, ma joŋ gɛriŋ laalɛmi. Bua-la lɛ mi fa síi wiilu, ma beŋ mi nyuŋ nɛ, bua-la lɛ ba si kɛŋmi tɔ dia, ma ku nami nɛ.’
Tuɔ-pul timma-la jaŋ piɛsɛmi a bul, ‘La Tiina, chɛ bɛɛ nɛ la naŋ di losuŋ kɛniŋ la joŋ kudiilee piŋ, chɛ bɛɛ nɛ lii-nyuasuŋ kɛniŋ la ŋaa liiŋ piŋ?
Chɛ bɛɛ nɛ la naŋ di ŋ ŋaa nuhuɔru la kɛniŋ woruŋ, koo chɛ bɛɛ nɛ la ma naŋ di ŋ kɛŋ yaribiree la joŋ gɛriŋ laaliŋ?
Chɛ bɛɛ ma nɛ la naŋ di ŋ wiilu, koo di ba kɛniŋ tɔ dia la ku naŋ?’
Kuoru-la jaŋ bula piba a bul, ‘Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, bua-la kala lɛ ma si ŋaa wu-zɔmuŋ a pi mi naaŋbiiriŋ deeŋba tuɔŋ nii-la si bi lee kɛnɛ, ma ŋaa ŋii pimi nɛ.’
Ŋii nɛ u jaŋ bula pi nialiŋ si hɛ u na-gua a bul, ‘Má surisɛ mi sɛmɛ, Wia via ma wiaa nɛ. Má mu a juu nyiŋ-la si bi disɛ. Wia hɛ nyiŋ-la bil Sitaani ari u tiŋdaara-la nɛ di ba ku juu.
Bɛɛ wiaa bua-la lɛ losuŋ fa si kɛŋmi, ma bi kudiilee ŋaa pimi, bua-la lii-nyuasuŋ fa si kɛŋmi, ma bi liiŋ ŋaa pimi.

Bua-la lɛ mi fa si ŋaa nuhuɔru, ma bimi kɛnɛ woruŋ. Bua-la lɛ mi fa si kɛŋ yaribiree maa, ma bi gɛriŋ joŋo laalɛmi. Bua-la lɛ mi fa síi wiilu maa, ma bi ku nami. Bua-la lɛ ba si kɛŋmi tɔ dia maa, ma bi ku nami.’
Ŋii nɛ ba jaŋ piɛsɛ kuoru-la a bul, ‘La Tiina, chɛ bɛɛ nɛ losuŋ kɛniŋ koo lii-nyuasuŋ kɛniŋ koo ŋ fa ŋaa nuhuɔru koo, ŋ fa kɛŋ yaribiree koo, ŋ fa wiilu koo, ba kɛniŋ tɔ dia aŋ ka la bi ŋ lɛ pɛ?’
Kuoru-la jaŋ bul, ‘Wutitii nɛ, bua-la kala lɛ ma si via di ma pɛ nii-la si bi lee kɛnɛ mi niaa tuɔŋ, ma via di ma pɛmi ma lɛ nɛ ŋii.’
Ŋii nɛ ba jaŋ juu lee-la hɛɛ-la si bi dɛrɛ, aŋ ka di tuɔ-pul tiŋŋaa ma juu lee-la miisi-la si bi dɛrɛ.”
Yesu si dagɛ niaa dɛrɛ, u bula pi u haritooroo a bul, “Ma jima,
tapulaa balia nɛ ka, ka di diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele-la yi. Bua-la lɛ ba jaŋ kɛŋ mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie a joŋmi hɛ niaa nisiŋ lɛ di ba kpaasɛmi daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasiŋ, ba hilimi Kayafas dia lɛ. Bua-la lɛ u fa ŋaa nii-la si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ nɛ.
Ba hilimi a vuvuurɛ ba si jaŋ to woŋbii-la a luɔra kɛŋ Yesu a kpu.
Ama ba bul di ba síu kɛŋ ba chɛ-bal-la, di ba nɛ ŋaa ŋii, niaa jaŋ ŋaa taawɛi.
Yesu fa si hɛ Bɛtani lɛ ŋii, u mu hɔŋ baal kubala dia lɛ baa yirɛ Saamɔŋ. Saamɔŋ fa ŋaa gbege nɛ aŋ duori.
Yesu fa si dii kiaa Saamɔŋ dia lɛ, haal kubala kɔ u teeŋ a kɛŋ tulaali ari loŋ a joŋo bisɛ hɛ u nyuŋ lɛ. Tulaalii-la yalliŋ hɛyɛ.
U haritooro-la si na ŋii, ba baaniŋ sii. Ba gurima pipiɛsɛ dɔŋɔ a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii haala deeŋ kɛŋ nuu-la kaa chei ŋla?
Ba fa jaŋ wuo joŋ tulaalii-la a yallɛ a na moribiee yugɛ a joŋo pi summoo.”
Ama Yesu fa jiŋ wii-la ba síi bul. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii ma wiwalimɛ haala deeŋ? Wu-zɔŋ nɛ u ŋaami lɛ.
Ma di summoo jaŋ hɛ dimɛ bua-na kala lɛ, ama la di ma bi jaŋ hɛ dimɛ deeŋ deeŋ.
U bisɛ tulaalii-la hɛmi lɛ a ŋaa siri di mi nɛ suba, di ba joŋmi hugi.
Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, dunia sɛmɛ-na kala ba si jaŋ wuo mu a bul Wia wu-zɔmɔ-la, ba jaŋ liisi haala deeŋ ma wiaa a bul.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu haritooro-la fii ari balia dɔŋɔ mu nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ teeŋ. U yiriŋ nɛ fa Judas Isikarɔt. U piɛsɛba a bul,
“Di mi nɛ kɛŋ Yesu yallɛ a pima, bɛɛ nɛ ma jaŋ pimi?” Ŋii nɛ ba diisɛ moribii-biiŋ mara ari fii a joŋo pu.
A chiŋ bua-la lɛ Judas suomo chichɛ woŋbii-la u si jaŋ to a kɛŋ Yesu yallɛ a piba.
Gbiele-la lɛ ba si yie dii boroboro-la si bi si-buruŋ kɛnɛ, ba chɛ-buŋbuŋ, Yesu haritooroo kɔ u teeŋ a piɛsu a bul, “Nii nɛ ŋ cho di la mu ŋaa diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele-la kudiilee di ŋ ku dii?”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Má mu juu taŋ-la tuɔŋ. Má mu baal kubala teeŋ. Má mu bula pu a bul, ‘La kuhiaŋ si, bua-la lɛ u síi chɛ di ba di u haritooroo dii diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele-la kudiilee yie nɛ, laa chɛ di la dii kia-la ŋ dia lɛ nɛ.’ ”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu haritooro-la ŋaa ŋii ari Yesu si dagɛba a ŋaa diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele-la kudiilee ba dii.
Wia si jua, Yesu ari u haritooro-la fii ari balia-la ku juu hɔŋ a didii kudiile-la.
Ba síi dii kiaa ŋii, ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, ma dɔŋɔ jaŋ joŋmi yallɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ u haritooro-la tuɔŋ chei. Ba suomo pipiɛsu, kuŋ kuŋ. Dɔŋɔ yie piɛsɛ, “Mi Tiina, mi nɛɛ?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “La di nii-la si chala kɛŋ boroboro tuu yuu gbaŋa tuɔŋ nɛ jaŋ joŋmi yallɛ.
Mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie jaŋ suu ari ba si ŋmuŋsɛ ŋii a tigɛmi lɛ. Ama nii-la si jaŋ joŋ mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie yallɛ, aa, u jaŋ na hɛɛŋ yugɛ. Ba fa si buu lula nɛ kpia.”
Ŋii nɛ Judas zɛŋbɛ tiina-la piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Mi nɛ ŋ didagɛɛ?” Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Oo, ŋ nɛ.”
Ba si hɔnɔ didii kiaa, ŋii nɛ Yesu sii a joŋ boroboro a lɔllɛ Wia aŋ kaa chɔgɛ chɔgɛ a joŋo pi u haritooroo a bula piba a bul, “Má laa. Mi yaraa namia nɛ ŋii.”
Ŋii nɛ u bira joŋ nyunyuala maa ari siniŋ. U lɔllɛ Wia aŋ joŋo piba a bul, “Má kala nyua nyunyual-bala-la tuɔŋ,
bɛɛ wiaa mi chaliŋ nɛ ŋii. Chaliŋ deeŋ wiaa nɛ tii Wia ta niiŋ ma teeŋ. Mi chaliŋ jaŋ jaasɛ ni-kɛnɛ wiaa, di Wia joŋ ba haachɛba chɛba.
Mi bulaa pima, mi bira bi jaŋ kɔ di mi nyua siniŋ deeŋ, see tapulii-la mi si jaŋ kɔ, ŋii nɛ mi jaŋ nyua si-faliŋ mi Nyimma Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba yii Wii-chuɔlɛ yiiliŋ aŋ sii lii a mu peel kubala baa yirɛ Oliv.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Titaŋiŋ deeŋ titia ma kala jaŋ fá viiri a tiŋ mi wiaa. Ba ŋmuŋsɛ Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ di ba jaŋ kpu pie-daara aŋ ka piesee fá pisɛ.
Ama Wia jaŋ chisɛmi suuŋ lɛ. U nɛ chisɛmi, mi jaŋ laa ma sipaaŋ a mu Galilii.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita bula pi Yesu a bul, “Di ba kala fá maa aŋ leŋiŋ, mi-na bi jaŋ miirɛ ŋ hariŋ da.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Wutitii nɛ, jiniŋ titaŋiŋ deeŋ ŋ-na Piita, ŋ jaŋ bul naaŋsiiŋ butori ari ŋ bimi jiŋ, ka di ji-bele-na yel.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita bula pu a bul, “La diŋ paala susuu maa, mi bi jaŋ bul ari mi biŋ jiŋ.” Ku-kaana-la ma kala bul ŋii.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu ari u haritooroo mu juu lee kubala baa yirɛ Gɛtisɛmani. Yesu bula pi u haritooroo di ba hɔŋ daha, ka u mu chuɔlɛ Wia aŋ kɔ.
U kɛŋ Piita ari Zɛbidii biiriŋ balia a kaa mu dimɛ. U tuɔŋ faasa chei woruŋ. U tuɔŋ bi pina.
U bula pi u haritooroo a bul, “Mi tuɔŋ kala nɛ cheye a magɛ di mi suu. Má hɔŋ di la kala pɔ na.”

Ba hɔŋ. Ka u surisa mu sipaaŋ mua a tuu pina chigi tiŋteeŋ a sul Wia a bul duu nɛ kɛŋ woŋbiiŋ, duu sí leŋe di wii-la juu-u lɛ a bira bul, “Mi Nyimma, di ŋ níi chɛ, liisɛ hɛɛ-la síi kɔ mi lɛ. Ama mi-na ŋla tuɔtɔruŋ lɛ dee, ŋ-na tuɔtɔruŋ lɛ nɛ.”
U chuɔla dɛrɛ aŋ sii kɔ u haritooroo teeŋ di ba piŋ doŋ. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛ Piita a bul, “Ŋ pina nɛɛ? Ŋ bi doŋ muapilii ma wuo bɛrɛɛ a diene yi hawa kubalaa?
Má chuɔlɛ Wia a pupɔ di Sitaani sí wuo nyisɛma. Ma tuɔŋ lɛ ma cho di ma ŋaa wu-zɔŋŋɔɔ, aŋ ka ma bi doluŋ kɛnɛ.”
U bira mu a chuɔlɛ Wia liamiŋ lɛ a bira bul,
“Mi Nyimma, di ŋ nɛ bi sɛi di ŋ laa hɛɛŋ deeŋ mi nisiŋ lɛ, leŋ di wii-la ŋ síi chɛ, duu ŋaa.” U miira kɔ di ba bira piŋ doŋ, bɛɛ wiaa doŋ kɛŋba nɛ woruŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu mu chuɔlɛ Wia torimuŋ lɛ a bira bul ŋii titia.
Ŋii nɛ u miira kɔ u haritooroo teeŋ a piɛsɛba, “Ma ha pinaa wiesi nɛɛ? Má bee na, bua-la yie nɛ. Ba jaŋ kɛŋ mi-na, Nuhuobiine Bie a pi haachɛ diiree.
Má sii la mu. Nii-la si jaŋ joŋmi yallɛ ka kɔ nɛ.”

Yesu ha bi wiaa bula dɛrɛ, di Judas níi kɔ ŋii. U fa ŋaa Yesu haritooro-la fii ari balia dɔŋɔ nɛ. Niaa yugɛ a tuto u hariŋ. Dɔŋsuŋ kori tokobiee ari taŋguloo. Nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari ba taŋ kuhiasiŋ nɛ tiŋba, ba kɔ.
Zɛŋbɛ tiina-la fa pi nialiŋ magil nɛ a bul, “Nii-la mi si mu guori, u nɛ ŋii. Má kɛnu.”
Ŋii nɛ Judas vɛŋ tegi a mu Yesu teeŋ a bula pu, “Mi kuhiaŋ, mii chuɔluŋ”, aŋ guoru.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Mi naŋdɔŋɔ, bɛɛ nɛ tii ŋ hɛ daha?” Ŋii nɛ ba kala guriku a kɛnu.
Yesu haritooro-la dɔŋɔ liisɛ u tokobii a ta nuu digiliŋ keri. Nii-la fa ŋaa nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ dia-yomo nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Joŋ ŋ tokobii a hɛ u di-hɛɛliŋ. Nii-la si liisɛ tokobii, tokobii nɛ ba jaŋ kaa kpuu.
Ŋ bi jiŋ ari mi fa jaŋ wuo yirɛ mi Nyimma duu pɛmi lɛɛ? Di mi nɛ fa yiru, u fa jaŋ ta u tiŋdaaraa bui buiba di ba ku pɛmi lɛ.
Ama duu nɛ fa saa ŋaa ŋii, ɛɛ nɛ wialiŋ ba fa si ŋmuŋsa Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ jaŋ ku ŋaa wutitiiba?”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛ ni-daŋ-la a bul, “Mi ŋaa gaaru nɛɛ? Ma si kɛŋ tokobiee ari taŋguloo a kukɔ di ma kɛŋmii? Ma na tapulii-na kala la di ma nɛ yie hɔŋ Wia-dia lɛ mi didagɛ wiaa a pipima. Aŋ ka ma bi walima di ma kɛŋmi dimɛ.
Ama wiiŋ deeŋ kala ŋaa di wialiŋ nialiŋ fa si bula, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ ku ŋaa wutitii.” Ŋii nɛ Yesu haritooro-la kala viau aŋ fá.
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kɛŋ Yesu, ba kɛnu kaa mu Kayafas dia. U nɛ fa ŋaa nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ. Di Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ba taŋ kuhiasiŋ kala hilimi dimɛ.
Piita daa tuto ba hariŋ a to juu nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ kaala. U juu kaala-la a mu hɔŋ nialiŋ síi pɔ kaala-la teeŋ duu na wii-la si jaŋ ŋaa Yesu lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari nialiŋ kala si yie hilime vuvuurɛ wiaa chichɛ di ba nyia wiaa a tigɛ Yesu lɛ di ba kpuu. Ba chɛ chɛ wii ka.
Niaa paala yugɛ nɛ a ku nyia wiaa pu, ama ba fa bi wuo na wii-kala u si ŋaa chei.
Ŋii nɛ niaa balia ku lii a bul, “Baala deeŋ, u si u jaŋ wuo ŋmoo Wia-dia-la lo aŋ bira saau tapulaa batori pɛgɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ sii chiŋ a piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Ŋ bi nia niaa deeŋba si bul wialiŋ a tigɛŋ lɛɛ? Ŋ-na bi wii kɛnɛ ŋ si jaŋ bul?”
Yesu tɔrɛ u niiŋ. Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ bula pu a bul, “Wia-la si weye yiriŋ lɛ, bula pila, ŋ nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisaa? Ŋ nɛ Wia Biee?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Mi-na nɛ, ama mi bulaa pima kala, a lii bua deeŋ lɛ a kaa mu, ma jaŋ na mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie di mi hɔŋ Wia sɛmɛ, ni-duoŋ di-hɔnuŋ a to duoŋbiliŋbaanaa tuɔŋ ku tuu.”
Yesu si bul ŋii, nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ kɛŋ u gɛnniŋ kiɛsɛ aŋ bul, “Ŋ chei Wia yiriŋ. U bi maga di la bira chɛ daŋsiaba. Ma kala bi nia u si chei Wia yiriŋ ŋii?
Bɛɛ nɛ ma biinɛ?” Ŋii nɛ ba bul, “U cheye nɛ. U maga di ba kpuu nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba tu naŋtuɔruŋ hɛ u siaa lɛ a ŋmobu. Nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ síi ŋmobu ŋla nɛ, ba bula pu a bul,
“Ŋ-na Kirisito, nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, dagɛ nii-la si ŋmobuŋ.”
Piita si hɔŋ kaala-la lɛ, ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ dia tiŋtinni-tolo kubala ku lii a bul, “Ŋ ma faa to Yesu hariŋ nɛ, baal-la si lii Galilii.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita nyia wiaa a bul ba kala nii, “Mi bi Yesu jiŋ. Mi bi wii-la ŋ si paala bubul jiŋ,” aŋ sii lii chiŋ zawura tuɔŋ.
Piita si chiŋ dimɛ, ŋii nɛ tiŋtinni-tolo dɔŋɔ ma bira nau a bula pi nialiŋ si china kpagu a bul, “Baala deeŋ ma ŋaa Yesu si lii Nazarɛt haritooro-la dɔŋɔ nɛ.”
Piita bira nyia wiaa aŋ ŋmiɛsa bul duu dee.
Muasuaa nialiŋ si chiŋ dimɛ ma bula pu a bul, “Wutitii nɛ, ŋ ma ŋaa ba dɔŋɔ nɛ, ŋ yiikoro nɛ dagɛ ŋii.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita ŋmiɛsɛ a bul, “Mi bi baala deeŋ jiŋ.” U si bul ŋii dɛrɛ di ji-bele yele.
Ŋii nɛ Piita liisi wii-la Yesu si bula pu ari u jaŋ nyia wiaa a pu naaŋsiiŋ butori, ŋii nɛ u lii a faasa yel.
Taŋ-pul nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ kala ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasiŋ hilimi a vuurɛ. Ba kala vuura di ba kpu Yesu.
Ba kɛnu a vɔbu a kɛnu kaa mu Paalit teeŋ. U nɛ fa hɔŋ Rom kuori-baliŋ nyuŋ Judiya tiŋteeŋ lɛ.

Judas zɛŋbɛ tiina-la si nia di baa chɛ di ba kpu Yesu nɛ, u tuɔŋ chei ari u si yallɛ Yesu ŋii. U miira kɛŋ moribii-biiŋ mara ari fii a kaa mu nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasi-la teeŋ a bul,
“Mi ŋaa haachɛ nɛ. Mi joŋ nii-la si bi wii cheye yallɛ di ba kpuu.” Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ bul di ba sipaa kala tuo dimɛ. Di u wii nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Judas joŋ moribie-la a yuo ta Wia-dia tiŋteeŋ aŋ lii a mu yuo ŋmɛniŋ.
Nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ paa moribie-la aŋ bul, “Chaliŋ moribiee nɛ ŋla. La kisiŋ nɛ la joŋba hɛ Wia-dia moribiee lɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba vuurɛ di ba jiŋ wii-la ba si jaŋ joŋ moribie-la a ŋaa. Ba joŋ moribie-la yɔɔ tiŋteeŋ. Lee-la nɛ ba huhugi nuhuɔraa. Ba laa tiŋtee-la yɔɔ pupoi-mɛɛrɛ teeŋ nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ ba kɛŋ lee-la yiyirɛ chaliŋ tiŋteeŋ ari jiniŋ kala.
Ba si ŋaa ŋii, wialiŋ Jɛrimaya fa si bul, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ ku ŋaa wutitii. U fa si,
“Iziral doho niaa dɔŋsuŋ sɛi di ba ti̱ŋ moribii-biiŋ mara ari fii
aŋ kɛŋ Wia Tuɔ-pul Tiina-la.
Ba joŋ moribie-la ba si miira laa
a yɔɔ tiŋteeŋ pupoi-mɛɛrɛ teeŋ.
Mi Tiina Wia nɛ fa bula di mi ŋaa ŋii.”
Yesu si chiŋ nii-la si hɔŋ kuori-baliŋ nyuŋ sipaaŋ Judiya tiŋteeŋ lɛ, ŋii nɛ kuoru-la piɛsu a bul, “Ŋ nɛ ŋaa Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro koo?” Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Oo, mi nɛ.”
Ama nialiŋ fa si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasiŋ si joŋ cheeriŋ pu ŋii, u bi wii bula.
Ŋii nɛ Paalit piɛsu, “Ŋ bi wiaa deeŋba kala nia ba si bula a tigɛŋ lɛɛ?”
Ama Yesu bi u niiŋ suro, u bi wu-bala ma bula. Wii-la kperi Paalit woruŋ.
Di diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele nɛ yie-na kala, Paalit fa yie leŋ ba liisɛ nialiŋ ba si kaa tɔ dia dɔŋɔ nɛ, nii-la niaa si cho.
Bua-la lɛ di ba kɛŋ baal kubala baa yirɛ Barabas a tɔ dia.
Ni-daŋ-la si hilime, ŋii nɛ Paalit piɛsɛba, “Ni-bɛɛ nɛ ma cho di mi liisa pima? Barabas koo Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisaa?”
Paalit fa jima woruŋ ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasiŋ yaraa faa bieru nɛ, ŋii nɛ tii ba kɛŋ Yesu kaa kɔ u teeŋ.

Paalit fa si hɔŋ sariya didiiliŋ ŋii, u haala tiŋ tiŋdaariŋ a leŋ di ba bula pu a bul, “Sí baala deeŋ wii-kala ŋaa. U ŋaa tuɔ-pul tiina nɛ. Diamiŋ titaŋiŋ mi duosi wiaa a tigɛu lɛ nɛ. U wiaa wiimi woruŋ nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasi-la nyisɛ ni-daŋ-la hɛ di ba bul di Paalit liisɛ Barabas ta aŋ ka di ba kpu Yesu.
Ŋii nɛ Paalit piɛsɛ ni-daŋ-la a bul, “Niaa deeŋba baliamiŋ tuɔŋ, kubɛɛ nɛ ma chɛ di mi liisa pima?” Ŋii nɛ ba bul, “Barabas!”
Ŋii nɛ Paalit piɛsɛ nialiŋ a bul, “Aŋ ka Yesu ba síi yiru Kirisito, bɛɛ nɛ ma si mi kɛnu kaa ŋaa?” Ŋii nɛ ba kala bul, “Leŋ di ba kɛnu kpaasa mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Paalit piɛsɛba a bul, “Wu-bɔŋ bɛɛ nɛ u ŋaa?” Ŋii nɛ ba kpia a kii buŋbuŋ-la a bul, “Leŋ di ba kɛnu kpaasɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.”

Ŋii nɛ Paalit na ari goŋ-la yuga kiŋkɛŋ, ari yuosuŋ jaŋ juu. Ŋii wiaa u bi wii-kala wuo ŋaa. Di liiŋ chiŋ u sɛmɛ. U ŋaa a sɔŋ u nisaa nialiŋ sipaaŋ aŋ bul, “Mi sipaa tuo baala deeŋ suunuŋ lɛ. U hɛ ma teeŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ ni-daŋ-la kala bul, “Di la nɛ cheye wiiŋ deeŋ lɛ, leŋ di Wia dɔgisɛla ari la biiriŋ a tiŋ la si kpuu.”
Ŋii nɛ Paalit liisɛ Barabas ta a piba aŋ ŋaa ba viirɛ Yesu aŋ joŋu piba di ba kaa mu kpaasa mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Paalit laali-yuoroo dɔŋsuŋ kɛŋ Yesu kaa juu Paalit dia kaala tuɔŋ. Laali-yuoro-la ku-kaanaa kala ma ku pɛba lɛ a hilimi.
Ba wuri Yesu gɛnniŋ kala aŋ joŋ gɛri-fiaŋ laalu
a chɛ sɔsuŋ a kaa sua nyuŋ-chuulo a nagɛ kuoro nyuŋ-chuulo a joŋo chuu a joŋ daaŋtiga hɛ u na-diiŋ lɛ aŋ tuu kpirimi u sipaaŋ a mɔmu lɛ a bul, “Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro, laa chuɔluŋ.”
Ba tu naŋtuɔruŋ a hɛu lɛ a laa daa-la a ŋmoo u nyuŋ lɛ.
Ba si mɔmu lɛ dɛrɛ, ba wuri gɛri-fiaŋ-la aŋ paa u titia gɛnniŋ a laalu aŋ kɛnu kaa lii woŋbiiŋ di ba kpaasu mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.
Ba si kɛnu kaa lilii di ba kpaasu daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ ŋii, ba cheŋ baal kubala baa yiru Saamɔŋ. U jáŋ yiriŋ nɛ Sariini. Ŋii nɛ laali-yuoro-la fugu u laa Yesu daa-gɛsɛ-la a baasɛ.
Ŋii nɛ ba ku yi lee kubala baa yirɛ Gɔligɔta. Yiri-la bubuɔŋ nɛ nyu-kuŋkogulo.
Ba si yi dimɛ, ba joŋ siniŋ a guoli ku-haariŋ lɛ a joŋo pi Yesu duu nyua. U si lenne di u hɛyɛ, u via.
Ŋii nɛ ba kpaasu mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ aŋ tɔŋsɛ Yesu gɛnniŋ wiaa, di ba paa kpaa dɔŋɔ a jiŋ gɛri bɛɛ nɛ nuu-kala jaŋ laa.
Ŋii nɛ ba hɔŋ dimɛ a bibenu.
Ba si si Yesu ŋaa wialiŋ chei, ba ŋmuŋsa hɛ daa-gɛsɛ-la lɛ a bul, “Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro Yesu nɛ ŋla.”
Ŋii nɛ ba kpaasɛ gaaraa balia ma a pɛ Yesu lɛ. Dɔŋɔ hɛ u na-diiŋ, dɔŋɔ ma hɛ u na-gua.
Ba si kpaasu mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛ-la nyuŋ ŋii, nialiŋ si to dimɛ bibal, ba tutuusu aŋ kɛŋ ba nyuŋ chuchugisi
a bul, “Oi, ŋ nɛ ŋaa nii-la si si ŋ jaŋ ŋmoo la Wia-dia lo aŋ bira wuo saau tapulaa batori pɛgɛ. Ŋ si ŋaa Wia Bie, lii daa-gɛsɛ-la nyuŋ a laa ŋ titia ta.”
Nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasi-la ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari taŋ-la kuhiasiŋ ma sisieri Yesu lɛ a bula pipi dɔŋɔ,
“U wuo niaa laa tita nɛ aŋ bi u titia wuo laa ta. U si si u nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro, leŋ duu lii daa-gɛsɛ-la nyuŋ ku tuu di la na a laa u wiaa dii.
U laa Wia dii nɛ a bula duu ŋaa Wia Bie nɛ. Tɔɔ, má leŋ di la na di Wia nɛ jaŋ laau ta lɛɛlɛ.”
Gaara-la balia ma ba si kpaasa a pɛ Yesu lɛ, ba ma tuusu ŋii titia.
Wia ku magɛ nyu-gbaŋa, leriŋ kala biri lim a mu yi didaaniŋ, ka leriŋ bira pullɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu faasa yirɛ u yiikoro lɛ a bul, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani.” U bubuɔŋ nɛ: “Mi Tiina Wia, bɛɛ nɛ tii ŋ joŋmi ta?”
Di niaa dɔŋsuŋ chiŋ dimɛ a jegile nii wialiŋ u si bula. Ŋii nɛ ba bula pi dɔŋɔ a bul, “Ilaaja nɛ baal-la yiyirɛ ŋii.”
Nialiŋ dɔŋɔ fa si chiŋ dimɛ fá mu joŋ suosuo a kaa mu yuu siniŋ si nyala a joŋo tuu sakeliŋ lɛ a kaa mu hɛ u niiŋ lɛ duu nyua.
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ fa si hɛ dimɛ bul, “Má leŋ la gbɛrɛ a na ari Ilaaja jaŋ ku soru daa-gɛsɛ-la nyuŋ koo.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu faasa yel aŋ wiesi u wiesi kati.
Patiisa nɛ fa hɛ Wia-dia tuɔŋ. Ba kaa kɛrɛ. U kiɛsɛ balia a chiŋ nyu-gbaŋa a kiɛsa ku tuu. Ŋii nɛ tiŋteeŋ zigili, busuŋ ma yɛrɛ a kpaa kpaa.
Vaamaa ma suri suri. Nialiŋ Wia si liisa, ba yuga a sii suuŋ lɛ a lii vaama-la lɛ.
Yesu si sii suuŋ lɛ, ba mu Jerusalɛm. Niaa yuga a naba lee-la.
Laali-yuoroo zɔlɔ kuhiaŋ ari laali-yuoro-la fa si chiŋ dimɛ a bibeŋ Yesu a na tiŋteeŋ si zigili ŋii ari wialiŋ kala si ŋaa, fawulluŋ kɛŋba. Ŋii nɛ ba bul, “Wutitii, baala deeŋ sɛnɛ ŋaa Wia Bii nɛ.”
Haalaa yuga a ma fa chiŋ di-bolii a bibenu. Haala-la fa to Yesu hariŋ nɛ a lii Galilii tiŋteeŋ a pipɛu lɛ.
Ba tuɔŋ Mɛɛri Magidaliŋ ari Mɛɛri dɔŋɔ. U fa ŋaa Jeems ari Josɛf naaŋ nɛ. Zɛbidii haala ma pɛba lɛ.
Didaaniŋ si yie, baal kubala a lii taŋ kubala baa yirɛ Arimatiya ma kɔ. U fa ŋaa kiaa tiina nɛ. U yiriŋ nɛ fa Josɛf. U ma fa ŋaa Yesu haritooro-la dɔŋɔ nɛ.
U mu Paalit teeŋ a sul Yesu ku-suuŋ. Ŋii nɛ Paalit bul di ba mu joŋo pu.
Ŋii nɛ Josɛf laa a kɛŋ gɛripɛ-pul-faliŋ a bɛu
a joŋo hugi u titia bua falii-la lɛ u fa si lɔsɔ buŋ nyuŋ. U bilimi tabii-baliŋ kaa kɔ tɔ bua-la niiŋ aŋ viiri.
Ka Mɛɛri Magidaliŋ ari Mɛɛri dɔŋɔ-la faa hɔŋ a chaasɛ bua-la leriŋ.
U taŋ si pula, chɛ-wiesii-la chɛɛŋ, nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Farisii tiŋŋa-la, ba mu Paalit teeŋ a bula pu a bul,
“Kuhiaŋ, la liisi wii nɛ. Bua-la lɛ wu-nyiaru-la si hɛ u miisiŋ lɛ, u fa bula ari u nɛ suba, u jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ tapulaa batori chɛɛŋ.

Ŋii wiaa leŋ di niaa mu a pɔ u vaaŋ-la woruŋ di tapulaa batori-la yi, di u haritooroo sí wuo mu a gaa kuusi aŋ bula pi niaa ari u sii suuŋ lɛ nɛ. Di ba nɛ ŋaa wiiŋ deeŋ, u nɛ jaŋ paala kii wialiŋ kala u si nyia.”
Ŋii nɛ Paalit bula piba di ba kɛŋ laali-yuoroo mu di ba pɔ vaaŋ-la niiŋ woruŋ.
Ŋii nɛ ba laali-yuoro-la mu a joŋ buŋ a tɔ bua-la niiŋ aŋ leŋ niaa pɔ lee-la.
Ba chɛ-wiesii-la chɛɛŋ si dɛrɛ, Lahadi chɛɛŋ siipuuraa, Mɛɛri Magidaliŋ ari Mɛɛri-la dɔŋɔ mu bua-la niiŋ di ba na lee-la ba si hugi Yesu.
Ba si yi lee-la, muasuaa di leriŋ guu zigili. Di Wia tiŋdaara lii wia nyuŋ ku tuu a bilimi tabii-la ta aŋ hɔŋ u nyuŋ.
U siaa nagɛ duonuŋ si ligisa nɛ, aŋ ka u gɛnniŋ pullɛ kpul kpul.
Laali-yuoro-la fa si pɔ bua-la, fawulluŋ kɛŋba. Ba chichel a nagɛ di ba suba.
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bula pi haala-la si hɛ dimɛ a bul, “Ma sí fawulluŋ fá. Mi jima ari Yesu nɛ maa chɛ, nii-la ba si kpaasa mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.
U tuo daha, u sie nɛ ari u fa si bul ŋii pima. Má ku na lee-la ba fa si joŋu hugi.
Má mu lima lima a bula pi u haritooroo ari u sii suuŋ lɛ nɛ. Má bee na, u laa ma sipaaŋ a mu Galilii. Di ma nɛ mu dimɛ, ma jaŋ nau. Mi paala bula pima.”
Ŋii nɛ ba lii vaaŋ-la leriŋ aa tuosi. Fawulluŋ fa kɛŋba nɛ, ama ba tuɔŋ ma tɔrɛ. Ba fá mu di ba bula pi Yesu haritooroo wii-la si ŋaa.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu guu cheŋba a bula piba a bul, “Ma jaŋ hɔŋ ari yarifiɛlaa.” Ba mu u teeŋ a kɛŋ u naaŋ lɛ a chuɔlu.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ma sí leŋe di fawulluŋ kɛŋma. Má mu bula pi mi haritooroo di ba mu Galilii. Ba jaŋ nami dimɛ.”
Haala-la si miira viiri, laali-yuoro-la fa si pɔ bua-la, ba dɔŋsuŋ miira mu taŋ tuɔŋ a bula pi nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ wii-la si ŋaa.
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasiŋ hɔŋ a vuurɛ wii-la ba si jaŋ ŋaa. Ba vuura di ba jaŋ joŋ moribii-daŋ a kpal laali-yuoro-la fa si pɔ bua-la aŋ bula piba a bul,
“Má bula pi niaa ari ma piŋ doŋ nɛ, aŋ ka u haritooroo ku gaa a kuusi Yesu.
Di nii-la si hɔŋ kuori-baliŋ nyuŋ nɛ nii wiiŋ deeŋ, la jaŋ bula pɛma lɛ ari ma bi wii cheye. Wii-kala bi jaŋ walimɛma.”

Ŋii nɛ laali-yuoro-la fa si pɔ vaaŋ-la laa moribie-la aŋ nyia wiaa ari nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ fa si bula piba di ba ŋaa. Wii-la Ju̱u tiŋŋaa fa si nyia teeli leriŋ kala a kaa kɔ ari jiniŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu haritooro-la fii ari kubala-la mu Galilii tiŋteeŋ a jil peel-la nyuŋ, ari Yesu fa si bul ŋii piba.
Ŋii nɛ ba nau dimɛ a chuɔlu, ama dɔŋsuŋ bi laa dii.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu ku kpagɛba a bula piba a bul, “Wia joŋ doluŋ kala a pimi nɛ Wia-jaŋ ari dunia kala lɛ.
Má saa mu dunia sɛmɛ-na kala a bul mi wiaa pi niaa a leŋ di ba ŋaa mi haritooroo a foba Wii-chuɔlɛ liiŋ mi Nyimma ari u Bie ari u Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ.
Má dagɛba a leŋ di ba to wialiŋ kala mi si bula pima di ma to. Mi jaŋ hɛ ma teeŋ bua-na kala lɛ a kaa mumu dunia didɛriŋ.”
Mark: Wia wu-zɔŋŋɔɔ di-suomuŋ nɛ ŋla. Wiaa deeŋba ŋaa Wia Bie Yesu Kirisito wu-zɔŋŋɔɔ wiaa nɛ.
Nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ ba síi yirɛ Azaaya fa ŋmuŋsa ari Wia si,
“Bee na, mi jaŋ tiŋ mi tiŋdaara duu laa ŋ sipaaŋ mu
a wasɛ woŋbiiŋ biliŋ lɛ di ŋ kɔ.”
U bira si,
“Nuu nɛ chiŋ giri-bine tuɔŋ a heele bul,
‘Má kɔ a wasɛ woŋbiiŋ bil di ma Tiina kɔ a tuto.
Ma ŋaa ŋii, duu nɛ kɔ, u di-vɛniŋ jaŋ piŋ woruŋ.’ ”

Ŋii nɛ baala deeŋ sii. Baa yiru Jɔɔŋ, Wia lii-fooro. U sii ku lii giri-bine tuɔŋ a heele bul, “Má birimɛ a lii ma haachɛba lɛ, ka di mi foma Wii-chuɔlɛ liiŋ. Di ma nɛ ŋaa ŋii, Wia jaŋ joŋ ma haachɛba a chɛma.”
U si bul ŋii, Judiya tiŋŋaa ari Jerusalɛm tiŋŋaa kala lii a mu u teeŋ a dagɛ ba haachɛba aŋ tuu Jɔɔdaŋ fuo-la u foba Wii-chuɔlɛ liiŋ.
Buŋtaŋŋa puna gɛnniŋ nɛ Jɔɔŋ fa laalɛ a kɛŋ teŋbiiŋ vɔɔ u tiŋa. Nyaŋgirikɛba ari tuuŋ nɛ fa ŋaa u kudiilee.
U yie bul Wia wiaa pipi niaa a bul, “Nuu dɔŋ jaŋ to mi hariŋ kɔ. U nɛ jaŋ kiimi. Mi paala bi maga di mi kpagu a kɛŋ u nɛŋtɛŋŋɛɛ ŋmɛsiŋ ma kaa puri.
Liiŋ duŋduŋa nɛ mi-na kaa fufoma, ama u-na jaŋ joŋ Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la hɛma lɛ.”
Bua-la lɛ Yesu sii a lii taŋ-la ba síi yirɛ Nazarɛt a hɛ Galilii tiŋteeŋ lɛ a kɔ lee-la Jɔɔŋ fa si hɛ. U ku juu fuo-la. Jɔɔŋ fou Wii-chuɔlɛ liiŋ.
U miira lii fuo-la tuɔŋ ku lii a wula beŋ, di wia nyuŋ guu kpaa balia. Ŋii nɛ ka Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la ku tuu hɛu lɛ a nagɛ kokomo.
Ka u nii nuu yiikoro duu lii wia nyuŋ a bula pu a bul, “Mi Bii-chooluŋ nɛ ŋla. Mi tuɔŋ tɔrɛ ŋ nyuŋ.”
U bi diene ka Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la kɛnu juu giriŋ.
U hɛ dimɛ ŋii halii tapulaa mahiŋ balia, ba di giriŋ tuɔŋ kiaa duŋduŋa. Sitaani yie kɔ a magisu. Yesu bi sɛyɛ. Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaaraa ku tuu tima pu.
U bi diene, ka ba kɛŋ Jɔɔŋ tɔ dia. Ŋii nɛ Yesu sii a mu Galilii tiŋteeŋ a bubul Wia wu-zɔmɔ-la aa pi niaa
a bul, “Bua-la yie nɛ. Wia kuorii-la kɔ nɛ. Má birima lii ma haachɛba lɛ a laa Wia wu-zɔmɔ-la dii.”
Ŋii nɛ u yi Galilii muga a mu to muga-la niiŋ a na Saamɔŋ ari u ŋaana Aŋduru. Ba ŋaa cheŋfili-kpuuraa nɛ. Uu mu, di ba kɛŋ ba joŋba a kaa kikɛsɛ cheŋfilee.
U yirɛba a bul, “Má sii to mi hariŋ. Mi jaŋ ŋaa di ma kɛsɛ niaa pɛ ma titia lɛ ari ma síi kɛsɛ cheŋfilee ŋii.”
Ba sii a joŋ ba joŋba ta aŋ guu to u hariŋ.
U joŋ ŋii baa mu, di baalaa balia nɛ ŋii. Baa yirɛ Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ. Ba fa ŋaa Zɛbidii biiriŋ nɛ. Ba hɔŋ ba liiŋ daboro lɛ a tutɔ ba joŋba buasuŋ.
U si naba, u yirɛba. Ba leŋ ba nyimma ari nialiŋ kala ba fa si ŋaa ba tima pipiba aŋ lii liiŋ daboro-la tuɔŋ aŋ mu to u hariŋ.
Ba joŋ ŋii aa mu a ku yi Kapɛnam. Ŋii nɛ chɛ-wiesii-la chɛɛŋ, Yesu sii a mu juu Wii-chuɔlɛ dia a didagɛ niaa.
U síi dagɛba ŋii, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere. U bi baa daga ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba si yie didagɛba ŋii. U bul wiaa ari u nɛ kɛŋ wii-la doluŋ.
Ŋii nɛ di baal nɛ ŋii. Jiŋ-bɔmuŋ kɛnu. U ku juu aa chiirɛ,
“Yesu, ŋ si lii Nazarɛt, bɛɛ nɛ ŋ chichɛ ŋ ŋaala? Ŋ kɔ di ŋ kpula nɛɛ? Mi jimiŋ nɛ, ŋ nɛ ŋaa Wia Tuɔ-pul Tiina.”
Yesu si nii wialiŋ baal-la si bula, u kpia jiŋ-bɔŋ-la lɛ a bul, “Kɛŋ goŋ aŋ ku lii baal-la lɛ.”
Jiŋ-bɔŋ-la kɛŋ baal-la teriki aŋ faasa chiirɛ kiŋkɛŋ a lii baal-la lɛ.
Nialiŋ kala miira hiriki a pipiɛsɛ dɔŋɔ, “Bɛɛ nɛ ŋlaa? Wu-falii nɛ uu dagɛ. U paala kɛŋ doluŋ a wuo jiŋ-bɔŋŋɔɔ a bul wiaa piba, ba tuto u niiŋ.”
A lii ŋii lɛ nɛ, u yiriŋ guu teeli Galilii tiŋteeŋ kala.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu guu sii a lii Wii-chuɔlɛ dia-la lɛ, ba di Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ, a mu juu Saamɔŋ ari Aŋduru dia.
Ba mua di Saamɔŋ hiili-haala pina wiwiilɛ. U yaraa kala liŋ. Yesu si kɔ ŋii, ba bula pu.
Ŋii nɛ u ku juu a kɛŋ haal-la nisiŋ lɛ a kaa chuulɛ. U yaraa fa si lima ŋii, u fiɛlɛ. U sii ŋaa kudiilee piba ba dii.
U didaaniŋ si yie, ba kɛŋ nialiŋ kala síi wiilu ari jiŋsiŋ si kɛŋ nialiŋ kala a kaa kɔ Yesu teeŋ.
Taŋ tiŋŋaa kala gire kɔ a hilimi Saamɔŋ dia boiŋniiŋ.
Yesu vaarɛ nialiŋ yugɛ síi wiilu a kiri jiŋ-bɔmɔ-la ma a yugɛ a ta niaa lɛ. Jiŋsi-la jiŋ Yesu. Ŋii nɛ tii u biba woŋbiiŋ pa di ba bul wiaa.
Siipuuraa Yesu sii lii dia-la lɛ a mu lee-la niaa si tuo a chuchuɔlɛ Wia.
Ka Saamɔŋ ari u naŋdɔŋsuŋ ma sii kɔ a chichɛu.
Ba si nau, ba bula pu ari nuu-kala nɛ kɔ a chichɛu.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Má leŋ la mu tasiŋ dɔŋsuŋ di mi bul Wia wiaa dimɛ maa. Ŋii wiaa nɛ mi kɔ.”
U saa sii a mu duurɛ Galilii tiŋteeŋ kala a juu Wii-chuɔlɛ diisiŋ aa bul Wia wiaa aŋ pɛ kiri jiŋsiŋ ma niaa lɛ a ta.
Ŋii nɛ gbege kubala ma sii kɔ Yesu teeŋ a tuu kpirimi a sulu a bul, “Di ŋ nɛ cho, ŋ jaŋ wuo ŋaa di mi duori.”
Nisusuŋ kɛŋ Yesu. U liisɛ u nisiŋ a digu aŋ bul, “Mi cho nɛ, duori.”
Ŋii nɛ yawiil-la guu leŋ baal-la. U duori.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu ari siifiɛsiŋ a bul,

“Viiri aŋ sí wii bula pi nuu-kala. Ama kɛŋ ŋ titia kaa mu dagɛ nii-la si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia duu kpu pusuŋ pi Wia a piisɛ ŋ disinniŋ ta ari Moosis fa si dagɛma ŋii. Di ŋ nɛ ŋaa ŋii, niaa jaŋ na ari ŋ bira bi disinniŋ kɛnɛ.”
Ama baal-la kɛŋ wii-la kaa lii a bula gaarɛ leriŋ kala. Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bi wuo chaasa juu taŋ kala tuɔŋ, ama u yie hɔŋ giriŋ tuɔŋ nɛ, ka niaa lii lee-na kala a kukɔ u teeŋ.
Tapulaa baŋmɛnɛ, Yesu miira mu Kapɛnam. Niaa nii duu miira kɔ a hɛ dia lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ ba yugɛ a gire kɔ a tɔ lee-la kala a tɔ boiŋniiŋ maa. Ka u bul Wia wiaa pipiba.
Ŋii nɛ di niaa dɔŋsuŋ nɛ ŋii. Ba banɛsɛ joŋ gbɛriku kubala kaa kɔ. U piŋ u bɔsɔ lɛ.
Niaa si tɔ leriŋ kala ŋii, ba bi jiŋ lee-la ba si jaŋ to a juu. Ŋii nɛ ba jil lusuŋ nyuŋ a ta luri a joŋ bɔsɔ-la ari gbɛriku-la kala a to bua-la ta u tuu Yesu sipaaŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu jiŋ ari ba ŋaau yarida nɛ woruŋ a bul gbɛriku-la lɛ a bul, “Mi bii, mi joŋ ŋ haachɛba a chɛŋ nɛ.”
Di Wia teniŋ kerichiba dɔŋsuŋ ma hɔŋ dimɛ a kɛŋ ba tuɔsaa pipiɛsɛ ba titia,
“Bɛɛ nɛ tii baala deeŋ bubul ŋii? Uu tuusɛ Wia joŋŋoo ŋla. Kubɛɛ nɛ jaŋ wuo joŋ haachɛba chɛ nuu, di Wia duŋduŋa dee?”
Yesu wuo jiŋ ba tuɔbiinaa a pipiɛsɛba, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii ma bibiinɛ wiaa deeŋba?
Mi si jaŋ bul gbɛriku-la lɛ di mi joŋ u haachɛba chɛu nɛ, koo mi si jaŋ bul duu sii chuoli u bɔsɔ a viiri, ba tuɔŋ kubɛɛ nɛ ŋaa mɔli?
Mi jaŋ dagɛma ari mi-na, Nuhuobiine Bie, kɛŋ doluŋ dunia lɛ di mi joŋ haachɛba chɛ niaa.”
Ŋii nɛ u bula pi gbɛriku-la a bul, “Sii a joŋ ŋ bɔsɔ a mu dia.”
Baal-la guu sii a joŋ u bɔsɔ a vɛnɛ lii ba sipaaŋ. Ba kala hiriki a dɛnnɛ Wia yiriŋ a bul, “La ha bi wiiŋ deeŋ dɔŋɔ naa.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu sii dimɛ a miira tuu muga niiŋ. Niaa yugɛ a ku hilimi, u didagɛba.
U si kiele mu sipaaŋ, u na baal kubala baa yirɛ Liivai. U nyimma yiriŋ nɛ Alifiyas. U fa ŋaa laŋpoo lilaaru nɛ a hɔŋ u tiŋtiŋŋaa dia lɛ. Ŋii nɛ u yiru a bula pu duu sii a tuto u hariŋ. U sii to.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu mu juu Liivai dia, ba di u haritooroo kala, a hɔnɔ didii kiaa. Laŋpoo laara-la dɔŋsuŋ ari haachɛ diiree ma kɔ, ba kala didii kialiŋ. Ba fa yuga woruŋ a tuto Yesu hariŋ.
Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari Farisii tiŋŋaa naba a ku piɛsɛ Yesu haritooroo a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii Yesu ari haachɛ diiree ari laŋpoo laaraa, ba kala hɔnɔ didii kiaa?”

Yesu si nii wii-la ba síi bul, u bula piba a bul, “Nialiŋ si kɛŋ yarifiɛlaa, ba bi daaluŋ ŋiŋaaru ka chɛ, see nialiŋ síi wiilu. Mi kɔ di mi yirɛ haachɛ diiree nɛ di ba leŋ ba haachɛba. Nialiŋ si kɛŋ tuɔ-pula mi sipaaŋ dee mi kɔ di mi yirɛ.”

Chɛɛ dɔŋ Jɔɔŋ, Wia lii-foori-la haritooroo ari Farisii tiŋŋaa haritooroo, baa vɔɔ niiŋ. Ŋii nɛ niaa sii ku piɛsɛ Yesu, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii Jɔɔŋ haritooroo ari Farisii tiŋŋaa haritooro-naa vɔɔ niiŋ, aŋ ka ŋ haritooro-na bi niiŋ vɔɔ?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛba a bul, “Di nuu mu jaa haal kaa kɔ, ka ba duu naŋdɔŋsuŋ hɔŋ, u naŋdɔŋsu-la jaŋ vɔɔ niiŋ? Ai, di baal-la ari u naŋdɔŋsuŋ nɛ hɔnɔ, ba bi niiŋ ka vɔɔ.
Ama chɛɛ dɔŋ nɛ hɛ dimɛ, ba jaŋ kɛŋ baal-la kaa mu lee, aŋ ka di u naŋdɔŋsu-la vɔɔ niiŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ u bira bula piba a bul, “Di ŋ nɛ kɛŋ gɛri-biniŋ duu luri, ŋ jaŋ joŋ gɛripɛ-faliŋ a tɔɔ? Ai, ŋ ŋaa ŋii, ku-falii-la jaŋ kuurɛ di gɛri-la wasa kiɛsɛ kii ŋii.
Di ŋ nɛ kɛŋ pupoi-kpaaŋ, ŋ jaŋ ŋaa si-huoŋ a hɛ duu yel? Ai, ŋ nɛ ŋaa ŋii, pupoi-la jaŋ yɛrɛ, di siŋ-la kala ta. Ŋ yie joŋ si-huoŋ a hɛ pupoi-zɔmuŋ lɛ nɛ.”
Chɛ-wiesiŋ chɛɛ kubala Yesu ari u haritooroo sii a mu nyoŋso tuɔŋ. Baa mu ŋii, u haritooro-la kiilɛ nyoŋso-la a chichaŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Farisii tiŋŋaa piɛsu a bul, “Ŋ bi naa? Chɛ-wiesii-la chɛɛŋ kisiŋ nɛ ba chichei ŋii. Bɛɛ nɛ tii?”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu miira piɛsɛba a bul, “Ma ha bi wii-la Devit fa si ŋaa karimaa? Losuŋ fa si kɛnu ba di u hariŋ niaa, u mu juu Wia-dia a joŋ boroboroba-la ba fa si kaa ku bil Wia sipaaŋ a chɔgɔ dii aŋ joŋo pi u niaa maa, ba ma dii.
U fa ŋaa kisiŋ nɛ ari ni-wogo si jaŋ joŋ boroboro-la dii, see nii-la si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia duŋduŋa. Ka u joŋo dii ŋii. Bua-la lɛ Abiata nɛ fa ŋaa nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bula piba a bul, “Wia liisɛ chɛ-wiesii-la pi niaa nɛ di ba tiiu. U bi si di chɛ-wiesii-la nɛ tii niaa.
Mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie nɛ saa ŋaa chɛ-wiesii-la tiina ŋii.”
Yesu sii a miira mu juu Wii-chuɔlɛ dia, di baal kubala nɛ ŋii. U nisiŋ suu.
Ba si na Yesu duu jua, ba kala chaarɛ siaa bibenu di ba na ari u jaŋ vaarɛ baal-la chɛ-wiesii-la chɛɛŋ. Baa chɛ di ba na wii nɛ a to ŋii lɛ a kɛŋ Yesu a bul u teeŋ duu chei ba kisiŋ lɛ nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bul na-suu-la tiina lɛ duu sii kɔ ba tutuɔbaaniŋ. U sii mu.

Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛ nialiŋ a bul, “Ɛɛ nɛ la naabalimaba kisinniŋ bul di la ŋiŋaa chɛ-wiesii-la chɛɛŋ? Di la pipɛ niaa lɛ koo di la dudɔgisɛba? Di la laa niaa miisiŋ koo di la kpukpuba?” U si piɛsɛ ŋii, ba ŋaa fuii.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu na baaniŋ ba nyuŋ. U tuɔŋ chei a tiŋ ba digilaa si bi nii wiaa. Ŋii nɛ u bula pi na-suu-la tiina a bul, “Kɛŋ ŋ nisiŋ tiɛnɛ.” U kaa tiɛnɛ. U nisi-la fiɛlɛ a nagɛ u nagiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Farisii tiŋŋaa sii lii. Ba di Hɛrɔd niaa mu vuurɛ ŋii ba si jaŋ wuo ŋaa a kɛŋ Yesu a kpu.
Yesu ari u haritooroo sii a mu mugi-baliŋ niiŋ. Niaa yugɛ a lii Galilii tiŋteeŋ a tuto ba hariŋ. Dɔŋsuŋ ma lii Judiya tiŋteeŋ,
dɔŋsuŋ ma lii Jerusalɛm ari Idumiya tiŋteeŋ. Dɔŋsuŋ ma lii Jɔɔdaŋ fuo-la cholo. Dɔŋsuŋ ma lii Taya ari Saadɔŋ tiŋteeŋ. Niaa deeŋba kala fa nii Yesu wiaa a lii ba tasiŋ a kukɔ u teeŋ.
Ŋii nɛ u bula pi u haritooro-la di ba mu joŋ liiŋ daboro a kaa ku kii liiŋ niiŋ duu juu, di nialiŋ síu kaa yigi.
Yesu fa vaarɛ niaa a yugɛ. Ŋii wiaa nyanyal tiŋŋaa kala ku kɛŋ u baŋŋa lɛ aa chɛ di ba digu.
Di jiŋ-bɔŋŋɔɔ kɛŋ niaa dɔŋsuŋ nialiŋ tuɔŋ. Di ba nɛ na Yesu kala, ba yie ku tel u naasiŋ lɛ nɛ a chichiirɛ ari u nɛ ŋaa Wia Bie.
U bula piba ari siifiɛsiŋ di ba sí leŋe di wiiŋ deeŋ teeli leriŋ kala.
Yesu sii a mu lee-la si kɛŋ peelee a yirɛ u si cho nialiŋ kala, ba mu u teeŋ.
U bira liisɛ ba tuɔŋ niaa fii ari balia di ba nɛ hɛ u teeŋ. U liisɛba ŋii di ba ma mu bul Wia wiaa.
U piba doluŋ maa di ba wuo kikiri jiŋsiŋ niaa lɛ.
Nialiŋ fii ari balia yiraa nɛ ŋla: Saamɔŋ, Yesu nɛ hɛ Piita pu,
Zɛbidii bie Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ. Jɔɔŋ fa ŋaa Jeems ŋaana nɛ. Yesu kɛŋba kaa yirɛ Buanaajis. Yiri-la bubuɔŋ nɛ baaniŋ tiŋŋaa.
Ba ku-kaanaa ma nɛ ŋla: Aŋduru ari Filip ari Batolomi ari Matiu ari Tɔmas ari Jeems Alifiyas bie, ari Tadiyas ari Saamɔŋ Zɛlɔt
ari Judas Isikarɔt, nii-la si ku ŋaa zɛŋbɛ tiina a yallɛ Yesu. U liisɛ nialiŋ dɛrɛ aŋ miira mu dia.
Ŋii nɛ niaa bira ku hilimi. U di u haritooroo paala bi chiniŋ na di ba dii kudiilee.
Ŋii nɛ u taŋ niaa nii a sii lii di ba kɛnu aŋ bul, “Uu chɛ u nyaasɛ nɛ.”
Wia teniŋ kerichiba dɔŋsuŋ ma hɛ dimɛ. Ba lii Jerusalɛm nɛ a kɔ. Ba ma bul di jiŋ-bɔŋŋɔɔ kala kuoro ba síi yirɛ Bɛlizibul nɛ kɛnu. U nɛ pu doluŋ u kikiri jiŋsiŋ niaa lɛ ŋii.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu yirɛba a magɛ namagaba a pipiba a bul, “Ɛɛ nɛ Sitaani jaŋ wuo ŋaa a kiri u titia?
Di taŋ niaa nɛ hɛ dimɛ aŋ bi nii-bala kɛnɛ, ba taŋ jaŋ tel.
Di niaa nɛ bira bi nii-bala kɛnɛ, ba dia jaŋ tel.
Di Sitaani niaa saa bi nii-bala kɛnɛ, ba taŋ bi jaŋ chiŋ. U jaŋ tele dɛrɛ.
Nuu tuo si jaŋ juu ni-duoŋ dia a gaa u kiaa see duu kɛŋ ni-duo-la vɔɔ bil aŋ-na juu paa u kiaa.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bula pi niaa a bul, “Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, di niaa nɛ ŋaa haachɛba kala aŋ pɛ tuusɛ Wia joŋŋoo maa, Wia jaŋ wuo joŋba kala chɛba.
Ama di nuu nɛ tuusɛ Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la joŋŋoo, Wia bi jaŋ joŋo chɛu da. U tiina ŋaa haachɛ-la si maga di u suu nɛ. Wia jaŋ laa wii-la hɛ u tuɔŋ lɛ.”
Nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ fa bula ari jiŋ-bɔmuŋ nɛ kɛŋ Yesu. Ŋii nɛ tii u bul ŋii.
Muapilii Yesu naaŋ ari u ŋaanaa kɔ a chiŋ di-jaliŋ aŋ tiŋ niaa di ba yiru.
Di ni-daŋ hɔnɔ gollu chu. Ŋii nɛ ba bula pu a bul, “Ŋ naaŋ ari ŋ ŋaanaa nɛ chiŋ jeeŋ hariŋ aa chɛŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu miira piɛsɛba, “Kubɛɛ nɛ ŋaa mi naaŋ ari mi naaŋbiiriŋ?”
U miira beŋ nialiŋ si hɔnɔ gollu chu aŋ bula piba a bul, “Mi naaŋ ari mi naaŋbiiriŋ nɛ ŋla.
Nii-la kala síi ŋaa wialiŋ Wia si cho, u nɛ ŋaa mi ŋaana ari mi dihaala ari mi naaŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu miira mu hɔŋ Galilii muga-la niiŋ a didagɛ niaa. Niaa yugɛ a ku gollu chu. Ba si yuga ŋii nɛ, u sii mu juu liiŋ daboro tuɔŋ a hɔŋ liiŋ tuɔŋ. Ka nialiŋ hɔŋ muga niiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ u magɛ namagaba a dagɛba wiaa yugɛ. U namagaba-la dɔŋɔ nɛ ŋla: U si,
“Má jegile nii mi teeŋ. Baal kubala nɛ sie a kɛŋ u ku-doho kaa lii duu misɛ.
U síi misɛ ŋii, ku-doho-la dɔŋsuŋ tel woŋbiiŋ tuɔŋ. Diibiisiŋ ku tuɔsa dii.
Dɔŋsuŋ ma tuu tel kpaginyiliŋ nyuŋ. Hagila bi yuga, ka ba guu nyu. Ba naapoloo bi tiŋteeŋ jua. Wia pɔsɛ a ŋmooba ba suu, a tiŋ bɛɛ wiaa ba naapoloo bi tiŋteeŋ jua.
Dɔŋsuŋ ma tuu tel kpaginyiliŋ nyuŋ. Hagila bi yuga, ka ba guu nyu. Ba naapoloo bi tiŋteeŋ jua. Wia pɔsɛ a ŋmooba ba suu, a tiŋ bɛɛ wiaa ba naapoloo bi tiŋteeŋ jua.
Ku-doho-la dɔŋsuŋ ma tuu tel sɔsuŋ tuɔŋ a nyu. Sɔsu-la ma nyu a nyagɛba kpu. Ba bi wasa.
Ku-doho-la dɔŋsuŋ ma lii tel tiŋtee-zɔmuŋ lɛ a nyu a waa a wasɛ woruŋ. Dɔŋsuŋ hɛ biee mara ari fii fii, dɔŋsuŋ ma mahiŋ batori batori, dɔŋsuŋ ma zɔlɔ zɔlɔ.”
Yesu magɛ namaga-la dɛrɛ, ŋii nɛ u bul, “Digilaa tiŋŋaa, má wuoli ma digilaa a nii wiaa deeŋba.”
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ viiri. Aŋ ka Yesu duŋduŋa hɔŋ. U haritooroo ari nialiŋ si kpagɛ dimɛ, ba ku piɛsɛ namagaba-la bubuɔsaa.
Ŋii nɛ u bula piba a bul, “Ma niaa deeŋba nɛ Wia dagɛ u kuorii-la bubuɔŋ pa. Ama ni-kaanaa-na kala, namagaba nɛ u yie kaa didagɛba.
Ŋii nɛ ba yie jegili jegili aŋ bi ba bubuɔsaa wuo jiŋ, a bira nyilimi nyilimi aŋ bi kuŋ-kala ma wuo na. Di ba nɛ fa jiŋ ba bubuɔsaa, ba fa jaŋ birima to Wia, di u joŋ ba haachɛba chɛba.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛba a bul, “Ma bi namaga deeŋ bubuɔŋ jiŋ? Ɛɛ nɛ saa ma jaŋ ŋaa a jiŋ namagaba kala bubuɔsaa?” aŋ dagɛ namaga-la bubuɔŋ. U si,
“Baal-la síi du̱u kiaa, u nagɛ Wia niiŋ wiaa nɛ u kaa lii di u du̱u ŋii.
Kialiŋ si tel woŋbiiŋ lɛ nɛ ŋaa nialiŋ si yie nii Wia niiŋ wialiŋ. Di ba nii wialiŋ dɛrɛ, Sitaani yie guu kɔ a kɛŋ wii-la a liiri ba tuɔsaa lɛ.
Kialiŋ ma si tel kpaginyiliŋ nyuŋ nɛ ŋaa nialiŋ si yie nii Wia niiŋ wialiŋ a guu laa wialiŋ dii ari tuɔtɔruŋ.

Ama ba bi bɔyɛ kɛnɛ a nagɛ kialiŋ naapoloo si bi tiŋteeŋ jua. Ba jaŋ sɛi wii-la a tou mu magɛ ŋii. Di hɛɛŋ nɛ juuba, koo di ba to naasiŋ dudɔgisɛba a tiŋ wii-la wiaa, ba tuɔŋ lii wii-la lɛ. Ba joŋo ta.

Kialiŋ ma si tel sɔsuŋ tuɔŋ ma nɛ ŋaa nialiŋ si yie nii Wia niiŋ wialiŋ, ama dunia kiaa wiaa wiwalimɛba, ba cho di ba jigi aa chɛ kuŋ-kala. A tiŋ kiaa deeŋba wiaa ba bi sɛi di ba to wialiŋ. Wialiŋ bi doho kɛnɛ ba teeŋ.

Kialiŋ ma si tel sɔsuŋ tuɔŋ ma nɛ ŋaa nialiŋ si yie nii Wia niiŋ wialiŋ, ama dunia kiaa wiaa wiwalimɛba, ba cho di ba jigi aa chɛ kuŋ-kala. A tiŋ kiaa deeŋba wiaa ba bi sɛi di ba to wialiŋ. Wialiŋ bi doho kɛnɛ ba teeŋ.
Kialiŋ ma si tel tiŋtee-zɔmuŋ lɛ ma nɛ ŋaa nialiŋ si yie nii Wia niiŋ wialiŋ. Ba nii wialiŋ a laa hɛ ba tuɔsaa lɛ a kɛŋ doho, dɔŋsuŋ mara ari fii fii, dɔŋsuŋ mahiŋ batori batori, dɔŋsuŋ zɔlɔ zɔlɔ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bul, “Ŋ níi chɛ pulumuŋ a chol chaaniŋ ku juu dia, ŋ jaŋ kɛŋ gbaŋa a chu tɔɔ? Koo ŋ jaŋ joŋo kii godo bubuɔŋ? Ai, ŋ jaŋ joŋo kii kua nyuŋ duu chaanɛ.
Wu-faali tuo, see duu ku lii di-jaliŋ. Wii-kala si hɛ birimiŋ tuɔŋ ma jaŋ ku lii pulumuŋ.
Digilaa tiŋŋaa, má wuoli ma digilaa a nii.”
U bira bula piba a bul, “Má fiɛlɛ ma siaa woruŋ ari wialiŋ ma síi nii. Ŋii titia ma si to ma dɔŋsuŋ tiŋŋaa lɛ, ŋii titia nɛ Wia ma jaŋ joŋo toma lɛ.
Nii-la kala síi to Wia niiŋ wiaa, Wia jaŋ faasa pɛu lɛ duu to woruŋ. Nii-la ma si bi Wia niiŋ wiaa ka to, Wia bi jaŋ pɛu lɛ. U si pɛu lɛ mua-la maa, u jaŋ laa u kua.”
U bira bula piba a bul, “Wia kuorii-la nagɛ ari nia si sie a mu di u du̱u kiaa baga lɛ nɛ.
Taŋ biri u miira mu piŋ. Taŋ pul u bira sii. Tapulaa baŋmɛnɛ u sie di kialiŋ nyua a waa, ka u bi jiŋ ba si ŋaa ŋii a nyu.
Ba yie nyu ba titia lɛ a waa a hɛ nyuŋ a bii ba titia lɛ.
Ba bia, u ŋaa ba joŋ sia a kaa mu kuŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira piɛsɛba a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ la jaŋ joŋ Wia kuorii-la a magisɛ? Wu-bɛɛ nɛ la jaŋ kaa dagɛ u bubuɔŋ?
U nagɛ ku-doho kubala ba síi yirɛ masitad nɛ, ba yie joŋ a du̱u. Baa du̱u, di u bi wii maga. U nɛ muuro kii ku-doho-na kala si hɛ dimɛ.
Ba nɛ du̱u dɛrɛ, u nyu. U yie sii waa a ŋaa tia a kii baga ku-duuloo kala kala. U naakelee yugɛ. Diibiisiŋ yie ku sagɛu lɛ a saa ba dɛlliŋ dimɛ.”
Yesu magɛ namagaba a yugɛ a didagɛ niaa. U yie didagɛba a magɛ ŋii ba si jaŋ wuo laa a hɛ ba nyuŋ lɛ nɛ.
U yie bi sɛi duu bul wii-kala polli see u magɛ namaga. Ama ba di u haritooroo duŋduŋa nɛ hɔnɔ, u yie dagɛ namagaba-la bubuɔŋ a piba nɛ.
Chɛɛ-la titia didaaniŋ u bula pi u haritooro-la a bul, “Má leŋ di la chol muga cholo.”
Ba ta ni-daŋ-la kala ba viiri, aŋ ku juu liiŋ daboro-la u fa si hɔnɔ a kɛnu baa mu. Liiŋ daborusuŋ dɔŋsuŋ ma nɛ hɛ dimɛ a mumu.
Ŋii nɛ di pel-duo kubala suomo ŋiŋaa a ku ŋmoo liiŋ hɛ liiŋ daboro-la lɛ u chichɛ duu su̱.
Ama Yesu fa piŋ doŋ nɛ daboro-la hariŋ a yelli nyu-yelle. Ba ku chisu a bula pu a bul, “La kuhiaŋ, ŋ bi jiŋ di laa chɛ la suu nɛɛ?”
Ŋii nɛ u sii doŋ lɛ a kpia pel-la lɛ a bula pi muga-la maa duu fiɛla piŋ. Pel-la kɛrɛ, ka leriŋ kala ŋaa fuii.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛ u haritooro-la a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii fawulluŋ kɛŋma? Ma ha bi yarida ŋaa?”
Ŋii nɛ fawulluŋ kɛŋba woruŋ, ba pipiɛsɛ dɔŋɔ, “Kubɛɛ nɛ saa paala ŋaa nia deeŋ? Peliŋ ari mugisuŋ kala tuto u niiŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba sii chol muga cholo a ku yi Gɛrasa tiŋŋaa tiŋteeŋ a lii liiŋ daboro lɛ.
Ba lia di ba chiŋ, di baal nɛ ŋii, jiŋ-bɔmuŋ kɛnu.
U lii vaamaa tuɔŋ a kɔ.
Ba fa yie kɛŋ chɔrumɔɔ vɔbu a lɔl. Ba vɔbu u kaa kɛrɛ. Ba yie kɛnu hɛ kuruŋ maa, u ta kuru-la yɛrɛ aŋ sii mu hɔŋ vaamaa tuɔŋ. Nuu-kala bi doluŋ kɛnɛ duu wuo kɛnu.
Wiihɛyɛ ari titaŋiŋ kala u yie hɛ vaamaa tuɔŋ ari peelee nyuŋ a yie sii a duduurɛ. U duurɛ vaama-la tuɔŋ a chichiirɛ a kɛŋ tabiaa pipaasɛ u titia.
U si na Yesu duu hɛ di-bolii, u fá mu a chemu a kpirimi a chuɔlu.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi jiŋ-bɔŋ-la duu lii baal-la lɛ. Baal-la chiirɛ a bul, “Yesu, Wii-baliŋ Bie, bɛɛ nɛ ŋ chɛ di ŋ ŋaami lɛ? Mi joŋ Wia chuŋuŋ di ŋ sími dɔgisu!”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi jiŋ-bɔŋ-la duu lii baal-la lɛ. Baal-la chiirɛ a bul, “Yesu, Wii-baliŋ Bie, bɛɛ nɛ ŋ chɛ di ŋ ŋaami lɛ? Mi joŋ Wia chuŋuŋ di ŋ sími dɔgisu!”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsu a bul, “Ŋ yiriŋ nɛ bɛɛ?” U si, “Mi yiriŋ nɛ ku-kɛnɛ, bɛɛ wiaa la yuga nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ u sulu kiŋkɛŋ a bul duu sí leŋe di jiŋsi-la lii tiŋtee-la lɛ.
Di toonuŋ ma hɛ lee-la a yugɛ a didii kiaa peel-la nyuŋ.
Jiŋsi-la sul Yesu duu leŋ di ba mu juu toonu-la.
U sɛi. Ŋii nɛ ba lii baal-la lɛ a mu juu toonu-la. Toonu-la kala sii a fá lii peel-la nyuŋ tuu. Ba tuu tel muga tuɔŋ a nyua liiŋ a suu. Toonu-la fa yi bui balia.
Ŋii nɛ too-daara-la fá mu a kɛŋ doworo mu bula pi bagi-daaraa ari taŋ-la niaa kala. Ba sii ku lii Yesu teeŋ.
Baa kɔ, di baal-la jiŋ-bɔmuŋ fa si kɛnɛ, duu hɔnɔ a laalɛ gɛriŋ a kɛŋ yarifiɛlaa. Ba si na ŋii, fawulluŋ kɛŋba.
Nialiŋ fa si hɛ dimɛ a na wii-la si ŋaa baal-la ari toonu-la lɛ, ba bul wii-la pi nialiŋ.
Ba si nii ŋii, ba ku sul Yesu a bul duu lii ba tiŋteeŋ lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu mu duu juu liiŋ daboro. Baal-la jiŋsiŋ fa si kɛnɛ sulu a bul duu leŋ duu kɔ di ba mu.
Yesu bi sɛyɛ aŋ bula pu duu miira mu dia a bula pi u dia niaa wii-la kala la Tiina Wia si ŋaau lɛ, ari u si fáu nennige ŋii.
Baal-la miira mu Dɛkapɔlis tiŋteeŋ a bul wii-la kala Yesu si ŋaau lɛ. Niaa nii, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu miira mu juu liiŋ daboro a chol muga cholo a mu hɔŋ muga niiŋ. Niaa gire ku chu.
Ŋii nɛ baal kubala hɛ dimɛ. Baa yirɛ Jaaris. U fa ŋaa Wii-chuɔlɛ dia kuhiaŋ nɛ. Ŋii nɛ u na Yesu a tuu tel u naasiŋ lɛ
a sulu a bul, “Mi tolo níi wiilu a pina kikiiki duu suu. Mii chɛ di ŋ kɔ a joŋ ŋ nisiŋ daŋu lɛ, duu duori nɛ.”
Yesu sii to u hariŋ, ba mumu. Niaa ma sii tuto u hariŋ a gollu chu.
Baa mu di haal nɛ ŋii. Nyanyalii kubala nɛ kɛnu. U fa kɛŋ tiŋa nɛ deeŋ deeŋ jisiŋ fii ari balia.
U fa gɔllɔ ŋaa daalusuŋ kiŋkɛŋ a na hɛɛŋ woruŋ a paala chei u moribiee kala pɛi. Ka u nyanyalii-la wasa juu-u lɛ.
