U si nii Yesu wiaa nɛ, u ku to niaa tuɔŋ a biina u tuɔŋ lɛ, “Di mi digi u gɛriŋ maa, mi jaŋ duori.” Ŋii nɛ u piɛgɛ nialiŋ a mu chiŋ Yesu hariŋ a kɛŋ nisiŋ a digi u gɛriŋ lɛ.
U si nii Yesu wiaa nɛ, u ku to niaa tuɔŋ a biina u tuɔŋ lɛ, “Di mi digi u gɛriŋ maa, mi jaŋ duori.” Ŋii nɛ u piɛgɛ nialiŋ a mu chiŋ Yesu hariŋ a kɛŋ nisiŋ a digi u gɛriŋ lɛ.
U si digi u gɛriŋ lɛ ŋii, u tiŋa-la guu dɛrɛ. Ŋii nɛ u titia jiŋ ari u tiŋa-la dɛrɛ nɛ.
Ka Yesu ma jiŋ u tuɔŋ lɛ ari dol kubala nɛ liiu lɛ. U birimɛ nialiŋ teeŋ a piɛsɛba a bul, “Kubɛɛ nɛ digi mi gɛriŋ lɛ ŋii?”
Ŋii nɛ u haritooroo bul, “Ŋ bi na niaa si yuga ŋii a golluŋ chuu? Ka ŋ pipiɛsɛ di kubɛɛ nɛ digi ŋ gɛriŋ lɛ.”
Aŋ ka Yesu ha bibeŋ duu na nii-la si digu. Ama haal-la jiŋ wii-la si ŋaau lɛ nɛ. Ŋii nɛ u kɔ a chichel a tuu tel Yesu naasiŋ lɛ a bul wii-la kala pu.
Aŋ ka Yesu ha bibeŋ duu na nii-la si digu. Ama haal-la jiŋ wii-la si ŋaau lɛ nɛ. Ŋii nɛ u kɔ a chichel a tuu tel Yesu naasiŋ lɛ a bul wii-la kala pu.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu miira bula pu a bul, “Mi tolo, ŋ yarida nɛ ŋaa ŋ duori. Mu ari yarifiɛlaa. Nyanyalii-la bira bi jaŋ kɛniŋ.”
Yesu haa bul wiaa ŋii haal-la teeŋ di tiŋdaaraa lii kuhiaŋ Jaaris dia kɔ a bula pi Jaaris a bul, “Ŋ tolo-la suba nɛ, bira sí la kuhiaŋ-la walimu.”
Yesu nii ba si bul ŋii a bula pi Wii-chuɔlɛ dia kuhiaŋ Jaaris a bul, “Sí leŋe di ŋ bɔyɛ joŋ. Ŋaa mi yarida.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu sii a bi leŋe nuu-kala to u hariŋ see Piita ari Jeems ari u ŋaana Jɔɔŋ. Ba duŋduŋa nɛ to u hariŋ.
Ŋii nɛ ba ku yi Wii-chuɔlɛ dia kuhiaŋ-la dia. Baa kɔ di baa ŋaa goŋ aa ŋmoo niiŋ bagɛ bagɛ a yiyel.
U mu juu a piɛsɛba, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii maa ŋaa goŋ deeŋ kala? Bile bi suba. U piŋ doŋ nɛ.”
Ba kala miira china mumɔmu. Ŋii nɛ u kiriba ta ba lii, aŋ ka u kɛŋ bile nyimma ari u naaŋ ari u hariŋ niaa ba juu dia-la bile si pina.
Ba si juu dia-la ŋii, Yesu mu kɛŋ bile nisiŋ lɛ aŋ bul, “Talita kumi.” U bubuɔŋ nɛ: Haŋtolibie, mi si di ŋ sii!
Bile guu sii aa vɛŋ. Bile fa ŋaa jisiŋ fii ari balia nɛ. U ŋaa wu-kpuŋkpere ba lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bul ari siifiɛsiŋ di ba sí leŋe di nuu-kala nii wii-la, aŋ bul di ba ŋaa kudiilee pi bile duu dii.
Ŋii nɛ u lii dimɛ a mu u tiŋteeŋ. U haritooroo ma to mu.
Chɛ-wiesii-la chɛɛŋ u mu juu Wii-chuɔlɛ dia a didagɛ niaa. Ba si nii, ba jesiŋ kala hiriki a bul, “Ɛɛ nɛ u ŋaa a jiŋ wiaa deeŋba? Kubɛɛ nɛ pu wu-jimiŋ deeŋ? Ɛɛ nɛ u wuo ŋiŋaa wu-duoruŋ deeŋba?
La jimu, kapiŋta dee ŋii? Mɛɛri nɛ u naaŋ. Jeems ari Joozis ari Judas ari Saamɔŋ, ba ŋaa u ŋaanaa nɛ. U dihaalaa ma nɛ hɛ daha ŋla.” Ŋii nɛ ba na baaniŋ u nyuŋ.
Yesu bula piba a bul, “Nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, u yie mu lee-kala, ba zizilu nɛ, aŋ ka u jaŋ-niaa ari u dia-niaa siiŋ buu ka su̱.”
A tiŋ ba sí bi yarida kɛnɛ wiaa, u bi wu-duo kala wuo ŋaa lee-la, u ta joŋ u nisiŋ nɛ daŋ nyanyal tiŋŋaa baŋmɛnɛ lɛ nɛ ba duori.
U kperi Yesu ari ba si buu yarida ŋaa. Ŋii nɛ u sii a mu gɔllɛ tasiŋ a didagɛ niaa.
U yirɛ u haritooroo fii ari balia a hilimi a tiŋba balia balia a piba doluŋ di ba wuo jiŋ-bɔŋŋɔɔ. Ŋii nɛ u bula piba a bul,
“Ma sí kuŋ-kala kaa pɛ vɛŋ woŋbii-la, see ma daaŋtigisiŋ duŋduŋa. Ma sí kudiilee kaa mu. Ma bira sí sulli-gbaŋa ma koru. Ma sí moribiee ma joŋo hɛ ma gɛri-fesiniŋ lɛ. Ma sí gɛnniŋ tuŋ bulia ma laalu.
Ama má paa ma nɛŋtɛŋŋɛɛ hɛ a laalɛ gɛri-bala-bala aa vɛŋ.”
U bira bula piba a bul, “Di ma nɛ mua a juu taŋ kala, má juu dia-la niaa si cho ma wiaa a hɛ dii-bala lɛ halii di bua-la lɛ ma si jaŋ lii taŋ-la lɛ yi.
Di ma mu taŋ kala, di ba pɔ di ma sí juu a bi ma wialiŋ jegile nii, má kiele mu. Di ma lia, má kpesi ma naasiŋ hagila ta. Ba jaŋ jiŋ ari ba ŋaa wii nɛ a cheima.”
U tiŋba ŋii, ba lii a mu bul niaa lɛ di ba birimɛ a lii ba haachɛba lɛ.
Ba kiri jiŋsiŋ ma a yugɛ niaa lɛ, ba lii. Ba joŋ nuuŋ mua ma a bisa hɛ nyanyal tiŋŋaa lɛ ba duori.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu yiriŋ teeli lee-na kala. Kuoro Hɛrɔd ma nii u wiaa. Niaa dɔŋsuŋ si, “U nɛ ŋaa Jɔɔŋ, Wia lii-foori-la. Wia chisu suuŋ lɛ nɛ. Ŋii nɛ tii u kɛŋ doluŋ a ŋiŋaa wu-magilaa deeŋba.”
Ka dɔŋsuŋ ma si u nagɛ Ilaaja nɛ. Dɔŋsuŋ ma si, “U ŋaa nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ ari faafaa nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ ŋii.”
Kuoro Hɛrɔd si nii u wiaa u bul, “Jɔɔŋ nɛ ŋii. U nɛ nii-la mi si ŋaa ba keri u nyuŋ. U nɛ sii suuŋ lɛ ŋii.” Wii-la si tii u ŋaa ba keri u nyuŋ nɛ ŋla:
Hɛrɔd fa sie a mu jaa haal kubala. U yiriŋ nɛ Hɛrɔdias. U fa ŋaa u ŋaana Filip haala nɛ. U laa jaa.
Ŋii nɛ Jɔɔŋ fa bula pi Hɛrɔd, “Ŋ si kɛŋ ŋ ŋaana haala laa jaa ŋii, u bi woŋbiiŋ ŋaa.”
U si bul ŋii, Hɛrɔdias na baaniŋ u nyuŋ a chichɛ di ba kpu Jɔɔŋ.

Ŋii nɛ Hɛrɔd ŋaa ba kɛnu tɔ dia. Ama u na Jɔɔŋ duu ŋaa tuɔ-pul tiina a ŋiŋaa wialiŋ síi to woŋbiiŋ. Ŋii nɛ tii u fifáu a bibenu woruŋ a bi chɛ di ba kpuu. Wialiŋ kala Jɔɔŋ si bula kperu nɛ, ari ŋii kala u ha cho duu jegile nii wialiŋ u síi bul.
Kuoro Hɛrɔd chɛ-lulluŋ tapuluŋ nɛ bira yie. Ŋii nɛ u sii a ŋaa kudiilee yugɛ a kɛŋ u kuori-biisiŋ ari u laali-yuoro-hiasiŋ ari Galilii kuhiasiŋ kala, ba kala kɔ a hɔnɔ didii kiaa.
Ba hɔnɔ di Hɛrɔdias tolo nɛ ŋii. U ku juu gugua. Hɛrɔd ari nialiŋ kala bibeŋ a chou. Ŋii nɛ Hɛrɔd bula pu di ku-la-na kala u síi chɛ, u jaŋ pu.
U paala ŋmiɛsɛ a bul, “Ŋ síi chɛ ku-la-na kala, mi jaŋ piŋ. Ŋ níi chɛ mi tiŋteeŋ sɛŋpɛɛŋ dɔŋɔ a yi lebi maa, mi jaŋ pɔi a piŋ.”
Haŋtolibie-la sii lii a piɛsɛ u naaŋ, “Mi bul mii chɛ bɛɛ kuŋ?” Ŋii nɛ Hɛrɔdias si, “Bula pu a bul ŋŋ chɛ Jɔɔŋ Wia lii-foori-la nyuŋ nɛ.”
Tolo-la miirɛ lima lima a mu kuoru-la teeŋ a bula pu a bul, “Mii chɛ di ŋ keri Jɔɔŋ Wia lii-foori-la nyuŋ a hɛ pirata lɛ a kaa ku pimi.”
Kuoro si nii wii-la, u tuɔŋ kala chei. Ama u si ŋmiɛsa ŋii, niaa kala nii. U bira bi u niiŋ wuo birimɛ.

Ŋii nɛ di laali-yuoroo china a pɔ ba kuoro. U yirɛ ba dɔŋɔ duu mu keri Jɔɔŋ nyuŋ kaa kɔ. Laali-yuori-la sii a mu lee-la ba si kɛnu mu tɔ a keri u nyuŋ a hɛ pirata lɛ a kaa kɔ pi tolo-la. U laa a kaa mu pi u naaŋ.

Ŋii nɛ di laali-yuoroo china a pɔ ba kuoro. U yirɛ ba dɔŋɔ duu mu keri Jɔɔŋ nyuŋ kaa kɔ. Laali-yuori-la sii a mu lee-la ba si kɛnu mu tɔ a keri u nyuŋ a hɛ pirata lɛ a kaa kɔ pi tolo-la. U laa a kaa mu pi u naaŋ.
Jɔɔŋ haritooro-la si nii wii-la, ba sii kɔ a laa u ku-suuŋ a kaa mu hugi.
Yesu naŋzɔɔba saa sii a miira kɔ Yesu teeŋ a bula pu wialiŋ kala ba si ŋaa ari wialiŋ kala ba si daga.
Niaa dɔŋsuŋ yie lilii, ka dɔŋsuŋ ku jujuu. Yesu ari u haritooroo paala bi chiniŋ na di ba dii kiaa. Ŋii nɛ u bula piba a bul, “Má leŋ di la mu lee-la niaa si tuo di ma wiesi mua.”
Ba sii a juu liiŋ daboro a mumu niaa si tuo lee-la.
Niaa yugɛ a naba a wuo jiŋ di ba nɛ. Ŋii nɛ niaa lii tasiŋ yugɛ a fá mu lee-la Yesu fa síi mu a laa sipaaŋ yi dimɛ.
Ba ma kɔ a lii liiŋ daboro lɛ. Yesu si mu lii liiŋ daboro-la lɛ, u na ni-daŋ di ba hɔnɔ gbɛru. Nennige kala kɛnu. Nialiŋ nagɛ piesee si bi pie-daara kɛnɛ nɛ. U sii a dagɛba wiaa yugɛ.
Didaaniŋ ku yi, u haritooroo kɔ u teeŋ a bula pu a bul, “Leriŋ deeŋ ŋaa giriŋ nɛ. Ka wia fiɛla ŋla. Ta nialiŋ di ba mu tasiŋ ari bagisiŋ si kpagɛ daha a mu yɔɔ kudiilee a dii.”
Didaaniŋ ku yi, u haritooroo kɔ u teeŋ a bula pu a bul, “Leriŋ deeŋ ŋaa giriŋ nɛ. Ka wia fiɛla ŋla. Ta nialiŋ di ba mu tasiŋ ari bagisiŋ si kpagɛ daha a mu yɔɔ kudiilee a dii.”
Di u si, “Má mu chɛ kudiilee piba ba dii.” Ba piɛsu a bul, “Ŋŋ chɛ di la kɛŋ siidi bui balia a kaa mu yɔɔ kudiilee a kaa kɔ piba di ba dii?”
U piɛsɛba a bul, “Boroboro baŋmɛɛ nɛ hɛ dimɛ? Má mu na.” Ba mu aŋ miira ku bul, “Banɔŋ nɛ ari cheŋfilee balia.”
Ŋii nɛ u bul di nialiŋ kala tuu gulimo hɔŋ hɔŋ ya-fiɛliŋ nyuŋ.
Dɔŋsuŋ hɔŋ zɔlɔ zɔlɔ, dɔŋsuŋ ma mahiŋ balia ari fii fii.

Ŋii nɛ u joŋ boroboro-la banɔŋ ari cheŋfilee balia-la a wula beŋ wia nyuŋ aŋ lɔllɛ Wia aŋ kaa chɔgɛ a pi u haritooroo. Ba laa a kaa mu kpaa nialiŋ. U saa joŋ cheŋfilee balia-la maa a kaa chɔgɛ ŋii, ba kala dii.
Nuu-kala dii a vɔgɛ. Ka ba mu paa ku-kaanaa, boroboroba ari cheŋfilie-la si ka, a paa su̱ siŋsiŋ fii ari balia.
Nuu-kala dii a vɔgɛ. Ka ba mu paa ku-kaanaa, boroboroba ari cheŋfilie-la si ka, a paa su̱ siŋsiŋ fii ari balia.
Nialiŋ si dii kialiŋ, ba tuɔŋ baalaa fa ŋaa bui banɔŋ nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ u leŋ u haritooroo mu juu daboro a laa sipaaŋ duoro chol muga cholo a mu Bɛtisaada. Ka u ta ni-daŋ-la ba viiri.
U haritooroo mua, u mu jil peel kubala nyuŋ duu chuɔlɛ Wia dimɛ.
Wia tuu juu di liiŋ daboro-la hɛ liiŋ tutuɔbaaniŋ. Aŋ ka u duŋduŋa ha hɛ muga niiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bee na di peliŋ ka lu a pɔ di liiŋ daboro-la sí mu. Ba duori duori liiŋ daboro-la lɔl. Siipuuraa u sii a vɛŋ liiŋ nyuŋ a mumu a ku kpagɛba a chichɛ duu kieliba.
Ba nau duu vɛŋ liiŋ nyuŋ. Ba si nau, ba biina di ni-dima nɛ. Fawulluŋ kɛŋba, ba ŋmoo niiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ u guu bula piba a bul, “Má nyirɛ ma bɔyɛ. Mi-na nɛ. Ma sí leŋe di fawulluŋ kɛŋma.”
U saa ku juu ba teeŋ liiŋ daboro-la lɛ. Pel-la kɛrɛ. U ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere.
Ba fa na Yesu duu kɛŋ boroboro banɔŋ a kpaa niaa bui banɔŋ, ka ba ha bi u doluŋ jiŋ. Ba siaa ha bi suro.
Ŋii nɛ ba chol a ku yi taŋ kubala baa yirɛ Gɛnɛzarɛt a lii liiŋ daboro-la lɛ aŋ kaa vɔɔ liiŋ niiŋ.
Ba lii didɛrɛ, di niaa jima ari Yesu nɛ.
Ba mu duurɛ ba tiŋteeŋ kala a paa nyanyal tiŋŋaa ari ba bɔsunuŋ a kaa mu lee-na kala ba si nia di Yesu hɛ.
Lee-na kala Yesu si mua, ta-balaa koo ta-biisiŋ koo bagisiŋ, niaa yie paa ba nyanyal tiŋŋaa kaa juu yɔsuŋ tuɔŋ a sulu duu leŋ ba digi u gɛriŋ niipiniŋ lɛ. Di ba nɛ dige, ba yie duori nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ chɛɛ kubala nialiŋ ba síi yirɛ Farisii tiŋŋaa ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba dɔŋsuŋ si lii Jerusalɛm kɔ, ba kala sii gire kɔ Yesu teeŋ.
Ba kɔ di Yesu haritooroo dɔŋsuŋ hɔnɔ didii kiaa aŋ bi liiŋ sɔmɔ. Ba si u ŋii ŋaa disiŋ nɛ.
Farisii tiŋŋaa ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kala, ba bi kuŋ-kala ka dii, see di ba sɔŋ liiŋ, ari ba naabalimaba si dagɛba ŋii.
Di ba nɛ yɔɔ kiaa lii yɔbɔ ma kaa kɔ, ba bi dii, see di ba sɔŋ liiŋ. Ba kisinniŋ yuga. Ba kɛŋ woŋbii dɔŋ nɛ ba síi tiisi ba nyunyualusuŋ ari ba gbaŋsiŋ ari ba hɔɔŋ pupoyee kala maa.
Ŋii nɛ ba ku piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii ŋ haritooroo chichei la naabalimaba kisinniŋ lɛ? Bɛɛ nɛ tii ba bi liiŋ sɔmɔ aŋ didii kiaa?”
Ŋii nɛ u miira bula piba a bul, “Ma ŋaa kaŋfugi timma nɛ. Wialiŋ kala Azaaya fa síi bul, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ a tigɛma lɛ ŋaa wutitii nɛ. Ba ŋmuŋsɛ Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ ari u bul di Wia si,
‘Niaa deeŋba kɛŋ niiŋ nɛ a pipimi zile,
ka ba tuɔŋ liimi.
Ba yie chuɔlɛmi pɛi nɛ
aa dagɛ nuhuobiine wɛniŋ
aŋ bul di Wia nɛ bula.’
Nuhuobiine wɛniŋ nɛ maa to aŋ via Wia niiŋ wiaa.”
U bira si, “Ma kɛŋ wu-jimiŋ a via Wia wɛniŋ aŋ tuto ma naabalimaba woŋbiiŋ. Ma síi ŋaa ŋii, ma kiaa simaa?
Moosis fa ŋmuŋsa a bul ari Wia si di ŋ fá ŋ nyimma ari ŋ naaŋ, a bira ŋmuŋsɛ di nuu nɛ sii a bul wu-bɔmuŋ a tigɛ u nyimma koo u naaŋ lɛ, di ba kpu tiina.

Moosis fa ŋmuŋsɛ ŋii nɛ. Ama ma-na si di nuu nɛ kɛŋ kuŋ a magɛ duu joŋo pɛ u nyimma koo u naaŋ lɛ, tiina mu a bula piba, ku-la u fa si jaŋ joŋo pɛba lɛ ŋaa kuŋ nɛ baa yirɛ ‘Koobaŋ’. U bubuɔŋ nɛ: Wia nɛ tiiu. Ŋii wiaa u bi jaŋ joŋo piba.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bula piba a bul, “Ma bira bi sɛi di nuu ŋaa wii-kala pɛ u nyimma ari u naaŋ lɛ.
Ma yie ŋaa ŋii a via Wia niiŋ wiaa aŋ tuto ma naabalimaba woŋbiiŋ a bira joŋoo dagɛ ma haŋbiisiŋ maa. Wu-yiriba-la yuga nɛ ma síi ŋaa.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira yirɛ niaa ba kɔ. Ba si kɔ, u bula piba a bul, “Má kala jegili a nii woruŋ.
Kuŋ-kala síi tuu ŋ tuɔŋ bi disinniŋ kɛnɛ. Ama wialiŋ si hɛ ŋ tuɔŋ a kuu lii, ba nɛ kɛŋ disinniŋ. [
Digilaa tiŋŋaa, má wuoli ma digilaa a nii.”]
U si bul ŋii dɛrɛ, u mu juu dia aŋ leŋ nialiŋ. Ŋii nɛ u haritooroo ku piɛsu namaga-la bubuɔŋ.
Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba, “Ma ha bi wu-jimiŋ kɛnɛɛ? Ma bi jiŋ ari nuu nɛ dii kuŋ, u bi jaŋ wuo ŋaa u kɛŋ disinniŋ?
Ŋ nɛ dii kuŋ ŋii, u bi ŋ tuɔŋ ka tuu see ŋ luoruŋ, a bira to ŋ yaraa lii.” (U dagɛba ŋii ari kudiilee kisiŋ bira tuo.)
Ŋii nɛ u bul, “Wialiŋ kala si hɛ ŋ tuɔŋ a kuu lii, ba nɛ kɛŋ disinniŋ.
Ŋ tuɔŋ lɛ nɛ ŋ yie biinɛ wu-bɔŋŋɔɔ ŋaaniŋ a ŋiŋaa ba-chɔruŋ ari ha-chɔruŋ wu-ŋaalaa, a gigaa niaa kiaa, a bira kpukpu niaa, a chichɛ niaa haalaa,

a bira cho ŋ kɛŋ niaa kiaa lilaa, a ŋiŋaa wu-bɔŋ-na kala, a ŋmuŋmoo niaa puo, a ŋaa wialiŋ kala si bi maga di ŋ ŋaa. Ŋ yaraa ma bibieri niaa lɛ. Ŋ yie chichei niaa yiriŋ maa, a bibigisi ŋ titia lɛ, a ŋaa ni-yaari.
Wu-bɔŋŋɔɔ deeŋba kala yie lii ŋ tuɔŋ nɛ a kɛŋ disinniŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu sii a lii dimɛ a mu Taya ari Saadɔŋ tiŋteeŋ a mu juu faa dia kubala lɛ a bi chɛ di nuu-kala jiŋ u wiaa, ka ba via aŋ jiŋ.

Haal kubala nɛ hɛ dimɛ. U ŋaa nuhuɔru nɛ a lii Fɔniisia taŋ-la si hɛ Siiria tiŋteeŋ lɛ. U yiikoro ŋaa Giriik. Jiŋ-bɔŋ nɛ fa kɛŋ u tolo. Ŋii nɛ u nii Yesu wiaa a sii kɔ a tuu tel u naasiŋ lɛ a sulu duu kiri jiŋ-bɔŋ-la u bie lɛ.

Haal kubala nɛ hɛ dimɛ. U ŋaa nuhuɔru nɛ a lii Fɔniisia taŋ-la si hɛ Siiria tiŋteeŋ lɛ. U yiikoro ŋaa Giriik. Jiŋ-bɔŋ nɛ fa kɛŋ u tolo. Ŋii nɛ u nii Yesu wiaa a sii kɔ a tuu tel u naasiŋ lɛ a sulu duu kiri jiŋ-bɔŋ-la u bie lɛ.
Yesu piɛsu, “Ŋ nɛ kɛŋ haŋbiisiŋ, ŋ jaŋ joŋ ba kudiilee a pi va-biisiŋ? Ai, ŋ laa sipaaŋ ŋaa kudiilee pi ŋ haŋbiisiŋ nɛ di ba dii. Ba nɛ die aŋ ka, ŋ saa joŋo pi vahiŋ.”
Haal-la si, “Wutitii nɛ, mi Tiina. Ŋ bi jaŋ joŋ haŋbiisiŋ kudiilee a pi vahiŋ. Ama haŋbiisi-la síi dii kialiŋ, kialiŋ si tel tiŋteeŋ nɛ, vahi-la ma jaŋ paa dii.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi haal-la a bul, “A tiŋ ŋ si bul wiiŋ deeŋ wiaa, jiŋ-bɔŋ-la lii ŋ tolo lɛ nɛ. Mu dia.”
Haal-la viiri. U mua di u bile pina. Jiŋ-bɔŋ-la liiu lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu miira lii Taya tiŋteeŋ lɛ a mu to Saadɔŋ ari tasiŋ fii tiŋteeŋ a mu yi Galilii muga.
Ŋii nɛ di taŋiŋ hɛ dimɛ. Ba kɛnu kaa kɔ a sul Yesu duu joŋ u nisiŋ daŋu lɛ.
Yesu kɛnu kaa lii niaa tuɔŋ. Ba duŋduŋa balia hɔŋ. Ŋii nɛ u joŋ u neniee a kaa mu tuu u digilaa lɛ a tu naŋtuɔruŋ hɛ u neŋdelimiŋ lɛ,
aŋ beŋ wia nyuŋ aŋ faasa wiesi fir aŋ bul baal-la lɛ, “Ɛfata.” Ɛfata bubuɔŋ nɛ: Kaa suri.
Baal-la digilaa suri. U neŋdelimiŋ ma birimɛ. U bubul wiaa woruŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pi nialiŋ ari siifiɛsiŋ di ba sí wiiŋ deeŋ bula pi nuu-kala. Ŋii titia u sisi di ba sí wii-la bula pi niaa, ŋii titia nɛ ba ma fiɛsɛ sii a bul wii-la gaara bal.
Nialiŋ kala si nii wii-la, ba hiriki a bul, “Wii-na kala nɛ u ŋiŋaa woruŋ. U paala ŋaa taŋiŋ digilaa suri nɛ u ninii wiaa a bubul wiaa.”
Ni-daŋ bira ku hilimi bua kubala lɛ. Tapulii kubala, ba bira bi kudiilee kɛnɛ di ba dii. Ŋii nɛ Yesu yirɛ u haritooroo a bula piba,
“Mi beŋ niaa deeŋba, nennige kɛŋmi nɛ. Ba hɛ mi teeŋ tapulaa batori nɛ ŋla, ba bi kudiilee na di ba dii.
Di ba nɛ bi kuŋ-kala die, ka di mi bul di ba viiri, ba jaŋ mu yiegi woŋbiiŋ lɛ. Ba dɔŋsuŋ ma lii di-bolii nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ u haritooroo piɛsu, “Ɛɛ nɛ ŋ jaŋ ŋaa a na kudiilee di niaa deeŋba kala dii giriŋ deeŋ tuɔŋ?”
U piɛsɛba, “Boroboroba baŋmɛɛ nɛ hɛ dimɛ?” Ba si, “Kiaa balipɛ nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ u ŋaa nialiŋ tuu hɔŋ tiŋteeŋ. Ka u joŋ boroboroba-la balipɛ a lɔllɛ Wia, aŋ kaa chɔgɛ chɔgɛ, a pi u haritooroo di ba laa kpaa nialiŋ. Ba laa kpaaba.
Di ba kɛŋ cheŋfili-biisiŋ ma mua. U joŋba maa a chuɔlɛ Wia aŋ ŋaa u haritooroo laa kpaa nialiŋ.
Nuu-kala dii a vɔgɛ. Ka ba paa ku-kaaŋ-biisiŋ a su̱ siŋsiŋ balipɛ.
Nialiŋ fa si dii kialiŋ, ba yi bui banɛsɛ.
Ŋii nɛ u taba aŋ kɛŋ u haritooroo ba mu juu liiŋ daboro a mu Dalimanuuta tiŋteeŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Farisii tiŋŋaa dɔŋsuŋ sii kɔ aa chɛ di ba magisɛ Yesu a ku kɛŋ wiaa lilɛrɛ a bul, “Ŋ si kɛŋ doluŋ, ŋaa wu-magil di la na a jiŋ ari ŋ dol-la lii Wia nɛ.”
Yesu tuɔŋ chei. U faasa wiesi. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba, “Ma lɛɛlɛ niaa deeŋba, bɛɛ nɛ tii ma yie chichɛ di mi dagɛ mi doluŋ? Wutitii, mi bulaa pima, mi bi jaŋ ŋaa wu-magil kala di ma lɛɛlɛ niaa deeŋba na.”
Ŋii nɛ u leŋba aŋ miira juu liiŋ daboro a duoro chol muga cholo.
Yesu ari u haritooroo si duoro chol muga cholo ŋii, u haritooroo liisi ari ba yu ba kudiilee ta, aŋ ka boroboro kubala, u hɛ liiŋ daboro lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bul ari siifiɛsiŋ di ba pɔ ba titia lɛ ari Farisii tiŋŋaa ari Hɛrɔd lɛ. U di ba nagɛ si-buruŋ nɛ. Di ŋ joŋo hɛ kuŋ-kala lɛ, u yie puɔrɛ nɛ.
U si bul ŋii, ba hɔnɔ vuvuurɛ a bul, “La bi boroboro kɛnɛ, ŋii nɛ tii u bul ŋii.”
Yesu jiŋ ba síi vuurɛ wii-la a piɛsɛba, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii ma hɔnɔ vuurɛ a bul, ‘La bi boroboro kɛnɛ?’ Ma ha bi wu-jimiŋ kɛnɛɛ? Ɛɛ nɛ ma tuɔŋ dol ŋii?
Ma kɛŋ siaa nɛ, ba bi naa? Ma kɛŋ digilaa nɛ, ba bi nii? Ma bi wii-la liisee?
Mi joŋ boroboroba banɔŋ a chɔgɔ kpaa baalaa bui banɔŋ. Ma si paa ku-kaanaa, siŋsiŋ baŋmɛɛ nɛ ma paa su̱?” Ba si, “Siŋsiŋ fii ari balia.”
U bira piɛsɛba, “Mi si joŋ boroboroba balipɛ a chɔgɔ kpaa niaa bui banɛsɛ, ma si paa ku-kaanaa, siŋsiŋ baŋmɛɛ nɛ ma paa su̱?” Ba si siŋsiŋ balipɛ nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba, “Ma saa ha bi wu-jimiŋ kɛnɛɛ?”
Yesu ari u haritooroo bira ku yi taŋ kubala baa yirɛ Bɛtisaada. Ŋii nɛ niaa dɔŋsuŋ sii a kɛŋ nyuluŋ kubala a kaa kɔ a sul Yesu duu joŋ u nisiŋ a digu.
U kɛŋ nyuluŋ-la nisiŋ lɛ a lɛru lii taŋ-la tuɔŋ a tu naŋtuɔruŋ hɛ u siaa lɛ a joŋ u nisaa daŋu lɛ aŋ piɛsu di uu na leriŋ nɛɛ?
U beŋ leriŋ aŋ bul, “Mii na niaa nɛ, ama ba nagɛ tiisiŋ nɛ aa gɔllɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu miira kɛŋ u nisaa daŋ u siaa lɛ. Baal-la faasa chaarɛ siaa woruŋ a na kuŋ-kuŋ-kala woruŋ. U siaa bira nina.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu duu bira sí taŋ-la tuɔŋ juu, duu mu u jaŋ.
Yesu ari u haritooroo bira sii lee-la a mumu Sizariya Filipa tiŋteeŋ. Ba síi mu ŋii, Yesu piɛsɛ u haritooroo a bul, “Kubɛɛ nɛ niaa si di mi ŋaa?”

Ba si, “Dɔŋsuŋ si di ŋ ŋaa Jɔɔŋ nɛ, Wia lii-foori-la. Dɔŋsuŋ ma si di ŋ nɛ ŋaa Ilaaja, nii-la fa síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ. Dɔŋsuŋ ma si di ŋ nɛ ŋaa nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ dɔŋɔ nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira piɛsɛ u haritooroo maa a bul, “Ka ma maa, ma si mi ŋaa kubɛɛ nɛ?” Piita si, “Ŋ nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisa.”
Piita si bul ŋii, Yesu bula piba ari siifiɛsiŋ di ba pɔ di ba sí wii-la bula pi nuu-kala.

Ŋii nɛ Yesu didagɛ u haritooro-la a bul, “Mi-na, Nuhuobiine Bie, mi jaŋ na hɛɛŋ woruŋ. Kuhiasiŋ ari nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba, ba kala jaŋ viami aŋ ŋaa di ba kpumi. Di ba nɛ kpumi, mi jaŋ ŋaa tapulaa batori aŋ bira sii suuŋ lɛ.”
U chaasa bul wiiŋ deeŋ nɛ piba. Ŋii nɛ Piita kɛnu kaa suusa lii, a kpiau lɛ, a bul u teeŋ ari u sí ŋii bul, u bi woruŋ bula.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu birimɛ u haritooroo teeŋ aŋ kpia Piita lɛ a bul, “Sitaani, mu dimɛ. Wialiŋ ŋ síi bul, nuhuobiine woŋbiiŋ nɛ, Wia woŋbiiŋ dee.”
Ŋii nɛ u yirɛ u haritooroo ari nialiŋ kala di ba kɔ a bula piba a bul, “Di nuu-kala níi chɛ duu tomi, see duu via u titia woŋbiiŋ aŋ joŋ u daa-gɛsɛɛ baasɛ a tomi.
Nii-la kala síi chɛ duu laa u miisiŋ, u jaŋ via u miisiŋ ta. Ama nii-la si via u miisiŋ ta a tiŋ mi wiaa ari Wia wu-zɔmɔ-la wiaa, u jaŋ sɛnɛ laa u miisiŋ.
Di ŋ nɛ dii dunia kala aŋ bi miisiŋ kɛnɛ, bɛɛ kuŋ nyuurii nɛ ŋ na?
Dunia deeŋ lɛ, bɛɛ kuŋ nɛ saa ŋ jaŋ wuo kaa yɔɔ laa ŋ miisiŋ?

Ma lɛɛlɛ ni-bɔŋŋɔɔ deeŋba, ma yie fifá hiisiŋ a tiŋ mi wiaa ari mi wu-bulaa lɛ. Ama chɛɛ kubala mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie, mi jaŋ kɔ a chaanɛ, ari mi Nyimma si chaanɛ ŋii. Mi jaŋ kɛŋ Wia tiŋdaaraa di la kala kɔ. Bua-la lɛ nɛ, nii-la si fá mi hiisiŋ, mi ma jaŋ fáu hiisiŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bula pi u haritooro-la a bul, “Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, niaa dɔŋsuŋ hɛ dimɛ, ba bi jaŋ suu, see di ba na Wia kuorii-la china dɛrɛ ari doluŋ, ka di ba-na suu.”
Tapulaa balidu si ku bal, Yesu kɛŋ Piita ari Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ, ba duŋduŋa, a kaa mu jil peel-bal kubala nyuŋ. Ba beŋ ba sipaaŋ a na Yesu duu birima.
U gɛnniŋ kala pullɛ kiŋkɛŋ a tutul. Gɛri-chɛsɛru kala bi jaŋ wuo chɛsɛ gɛnniŋ di ba pulla nagɛ ŋii.
Ilaaja ari Moosis ku lii ba sipaaŋ a china bubul wiaa Yesu teeŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Piita bula pi Yesu a bul, “La kuhiaŋ, u ŋaa wu-zɔŋ nɛ ari la si hɛ daha. Leŋ di la hɛ lɛŋŋɛɛ batori, di ŋ kɛŋ dɔŋɔ, di Moosis ma kɛŋ dɔŋɔ, di Ilaaja ma kɛŋ dɔŋɔ.”
Fawulluŋ fa kɛŋba nɛ woruŋ. Ŋii nɛ tii u bul ŋii. U bi jiŋ wii-la kala u si jaŋ bul.
Ŋii nɛ duoŋbiliŋbaaniŋ ku tɔba. Ka yiikoro kubala lii duoŋbiliŋbaaŋ-la tuɔŋ a bubul, “Mi Bii-chooluŋ nɛ ŋla. Má jegile nii u teeŋ.”
Ba nii yiikoro deeŋ a miira daasɛ. Ba bi nuu-kala na see Yesu duŋduŋa.
Ba si lii peel-la nyuŋ kuu tuu, ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Mi bí chɛ di ma bul wii-la ma si na, see di mi-na, Nuhuobiine Bie sii suuŋ lɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba sɛi a kɛŋ wii-la ba tuɔŋ aŋ pipiɛsɛ dɔŋɔ, “U si jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ, u bubuɔŋ nɛ bɛɛ?”
Ŋii nɛ ba piɛsɛ Yesu, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii Wia teniŋ kerichiba bul ari Ilaaja nɛ jaŋ laa sipaaŋ kɔ, aŋ ka di Wia Bie-na kɔ?”

U bula piba a bul, “Wutitii, Ilaaja jaŋ sɛnɛ laa sipaaŋ kɔ a kɛŋ kuŋ-kala wasa bil. Ba saa ŋmuŋsa bil Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ a mu tigɛ Nuhuobiine Bie lɛ duu jaŋ na hɛɛŋ kiŋkɛŋ, di ba jaŋ benu a nagɛ ni-pɛi. Bɛɛ nɛ tii ba ŋmuŋsɛ ŋii?
Lɛɛlɛ mi jaŋ bula pima ari Ilaaja paala kɔ nɛ. Ba ŋaau ŋii kala ba síi chɛ. Ba fa ŋmuŋsɛ ŋii nɛ a tigɛu lɛ Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ.”
Ba si ku yi haritooroo ku-kaana-la di niaa yuga a hilimi dimɛ. Ba di Wia teniŋ kerichiba kɛŋ wiaa lilɛrɛ.
Nialiŋ si na Yesu duu kɔ, ba guu hiriki a sii fá a mu chemu a chuɔlu.
Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba, “Wu-bɛɛ nɛ ma hilimi ŋii a kaa lilɛrɛ?”
Nialiŋ dɔŋɔ bul, “La kuhiaŋ, mi bie nɛ mi kaa kɔ ŋ teeŋ. Jiŋ-bɔŋ nɛ kɛnu. U birimɛ taŋi.
U yie ku kɛnu u tuu tel tiŋteeŋ, naŋtuɔ-fuŋfuga tɔ u niiŋ, u chichaŋ u nyilaa a teriki. La saa sul ŋ haritooroo di ba kiri jiŋ-bɔŋ-la u lɛ, ama ba bi wuo kiri.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ma lɛɛlɛ niaa, ma bi yarida kɛnɛ. Ɛɛ nɛ mi jaŋ nyalimɛ a dieni ma teeŋ? Má kɛŋ bile kaa kɔ mi teeŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba kɛŋ bile kaa kɔ u teeŋ. Jiŋ-bɔŋ-la si ku na Yesu, u kɛŋ bile teriki, u tuu tel tiŋteeŋ a bibilimi, naŋtuɔ-fuŋfuga-la ku tɔ u niiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛ u nyimma, “Chɛ bɛɛ nɛ u suomiu lɛ?” U si, “U haŋbiiriŋ kala lɛ nɛ u suomi.
Bua dɔŋɔ u yie joŋu a lulo nyiniŋ lɛ ari liiŋ lɛ a chichɛ duu kpuu. Ŋ-na si wuo wii-na kala ŋiŋaa, fála nennige aŋ pɛla lɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu si di nii-la kala si ŋaa yarida, u jaŋ wuo ŋaa wii-na kala.
Ŋii nɛ bile nyimma sii chiŋ a faasa bubuŋsi, “Mi ŋaa yarida, ama u bi yugɛ. Pɛmi lɛ di mi yarida yugɛ.”
Ba si china bubul ŋii, niaa yuga a fá ku hilimi. Yesu ku na a bula pi jiŋ-bɔŋ-la ari siifiɛsiŋ a bul, “Jiŋ-taŋi, mi nɛ bula di ŋ leŋ bile. Pupɔ di ŋ maachie bira suu kɛŋ.”
Jiŋ-bɔŋ-la chiirɛ aŋ kɛnu teriki a ku leŋu, ka bile nagɛ duu suba. Nialiŋ jesiŋ kala bul di bile suba nɛ.
Ama Yesu mu kɛŋ u nisiŋ lɛ u sii chiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu ari u haritooroo juu dia. Ba luɔra piɛsu, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii la-na bi jiŋ-bɔŋ-la wuo kiri?”
U bula piba, “Nuu-kala bi jiŋ-bɔŋ-la si nagɛ ŋii wuo kire tita, see u chuɔlɛ Wia woruŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba sii lii lee-la a mu to Galilii tiŋteeŋ. Yesu bi cho di nuu-kala jiŋ lee-la u si hɛ,
bɛɛ wiaa uu dagɛ u haritooroo nɛ ari ba jaŋ kɛŋ u-na, Nuhuobiine Bie a hɛ niaa nisiŋ lɛ di ba kpuu, ka duu sii suuŋ lɛ tapulaa batori chɛɛŋ a kɛŋ miisiŋ.
Ama ba fa bi jiŋ wii-la u si bula bubuɔŋ aŋ fifá fawulluŋ di ba piɛsu.
Ŋii nɛ ba sii kɔ Kapɛnam. Ba si juu dia, Yesu piɛsɛ u haritooro-la a bul, “Bɛɛ kuŋ nɛ ma fa kaa lilɛrɛ woŋbiiŋ lɛ ŋii?”
Ŋii nɛ ba tɔrɛ ba niiŋ, bɛɛ wiaa ba fa kɛŋ ba tuɔŋ kuhiaŋ wiaa nɛ lilɛrɛ woŋbiiŋ lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu hɔŋ aŋ yirɛ u haritooro-la fii ari balia a bula piba, “Nii-la síi chɛ duu ŋaa ma tuɔŋ kuhiaŋ, see duu ku ŋaa ma tuɔŋ haŋbie a timaa pi ma kala!”
Ŋii nɛ u kɛŋ bii-bie a kaa ku bil ba tutuɔbaaniŋ a guoru aŋ bula piba a bul,
“Di nuu nɛ kɛŋ bii-bie deeŋ dɔŋɔ woruŋ a tiŋ mi wiaa, mi nɛ u kɛŋ woruŋ ŋii. Nii-la ma kala si kɛŋmi woruŋ, mi duŋduŋa dee u kɛŋ woruŋ ŋii. Nii-la si tiŋmi ma nɛ u kɛŋ woruŋ ŋii.”
Ŋii nɛ Jɔɔŋ bula pi Yesu a bul, “La kuhiaŋ, la na baal kubala duu kiri jiŋ-bɔŋŋɔɔ niaa lɛ ŋ doluŋ lɛ. La kiru duu sí ŋii ŋaa, bɛɛ wiaa u bi la dɔŋɔ ŋaa.”
Ama Yesu bula piba a bul, “Duu níi ŋaa ŋii, má bira síu kiru. Di nuu nɛ ŋaa wu-kpuŋkpere kala mi doluŋ lɛ, u chie bira bi jaŋ chei mi yiriŋ.
Nii-la kala si bi la hariŋ lia, u ŋaa la dɔŋɔ nɛ.
Wutitii mi bulaa pima, nii-la kala si joŋ gbaŋa ari liiŋ a pima a tiŋ ma síi tomi wiaa, u jaŋ laa u time.
Nii-la kala si na haŋbiisi-la síi tomi dɔŋɔ a nyisu duu ŋaa wu-bɔmuŋ, u maga di ba joŋ nɔmuŋ a vɔɔ laalɛ u baŋŋa lɛ a joŋu yuo hɛ muga tuɔŋ. Di ba nɛ ŋaa ŋii, u nɛ jaŋ kpia u si weye.
Di ŋ nisiŋ níi chɛ duu kɛniŋ hɛ haachɛ lɛ, kere ta. Ŋ si jaŋ juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ ari na-kuuŋ, u nɛ kpia ŋ si kɛŋ na-pilimee aŋ juu Wia nyiniŋ. Lee-la nyiŋ-la bi jaŋ disɛ. [
Lee-la naŋchuɔlaa jaŋ dii ŋ yaraa deeŋ deeŋ a bi jaŋ suu, ka nyiŋ-la ma bi jaŋ disɛ.]
Di ŋ naaŋ níi chɛ u kɛniŋ hɛ haachɛ lɛ, kere ta. Ŋ si jaŋ juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ ari naa-kuuŋ, u nɛ kpia ba si jaŋ joŋuŋ yuo hɛ Wia nyiniŋ lɛ ari naa-pilimee. [
Lee-la naŋchuɔlaa jaŋ dii ŋ yaraa deeŋ deeŋ a bi jaŋ suu, ka nyiŋ-la ma bi jaŋ disɛ.]
Di ŋ siiŋ níi chɛ duu kɛniŋ hɛ haachɛ lɛ, liisa ta. Ŋ si jaŋ juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ ari sii-togo, u nɛ kpia ba si joŋuŋ yuo hɛ Wia nyiniŋ lɛ ari siaa balia.
Lee-la naŋchuɔlaa jaŋ dii ŋ yaraa deeŋ deeŋ a bi jaŋ suu, ka nyiŋ-la ma bi jaŋ disɛ.
Wia jaŋ leŋ di ŋ na hɛɛŋ aŋ-na na wu-zɔmuŋ.
Yisiŋ sima, ama di u nɛ sɛbisɛ, ŋ bira bi jaŋ wuo ŋaa duu siŋ. Má leŋ di ma tuɔsaa siŋ, ari yisiŋ si sima ŋii, aŋ leŋ di ma kala kɛŋ nii-bala.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu sii a lii dimɛ a mu Judiya tiŋteeŋ a chol Jɔɔdaŋ fuo-la. Ni-daŋ bira hilimi u teeŋ. U bira dagɛba ari u si yie dagɛba ŋii.
Ŋii nɛ Farisii tiŋŋaa dɔŋsuŋ ma sii kɔ u teeŋ a chichɛ di ba magisu a piɛsu a bul, “Ŋ si via ŋ haala, u kɛŋ woŋbiiŋ nɛɛ?”
Yesu miira piɛsɛba, “Ɛɛ nɛ Moosis dagɛma di ma tuto?”
Ba bul, “Moosis si di baala níi chɛ u via u haala, duu laa sipaaŋ a ŋmuŋsɛ teniŋ a pi haal-la aŋ-na viau.”
Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ma tuɔŋ dolie, ŋii nɛ tii Moosis ŋmuŋsɛ ŋii pima.
Ama Wia si bugumo ŋaa dunia, nialiŋ u si ŋaa, ba ŋaa baal ari haal nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ baal-la jaŋ leŋ u nyimma ari u naaŋ dia [aŋ ka ba di u haala mɛrɛ dɔŋɔ lɛ].
Niaa deeŋba balia jaŋ kɛŋ chal-bala. Ba bira bi jaŋ ŋaa niaa balia, see kubala.
Nialiŋ saa Wia si kaa mɛrɛ dɔŋɔ lɛ, u bi maga di nuhuobiine kaa pɔrɛ.”
Yesu ari u haritooroo miira sii juu dia. Ŋii nɛ ba bira piɛsu wiiŋ deeŋ.
U bula piba, “Baal-la-na kala si via u haala aŋ bira jaa dɔŋɔ, u tiina ŋaa haal-la juu Wia haachɛ lɛ nɛ.
Di haala ma nɛ via u bala aŋ ma bira mu jaa baal dɔŋ, u ma ŋaa baal-la juu Wia haachɛ lɛ nɛ.”
Niaa sii kɔ Yesu teeŋ a kɛŋ ba haŋbiisiŋ kaa kɔ, duu joŋ u nisiŋ daŋba lɛ di Wia pɛba lɛ. Ŋii nɛ u haritooro-la kpiaba lɛ.
Yesu si na ŋii, u na baaniŋ u haritooro-la nyuŋ a bula piba a bul, “Má leŋ di haŋbiisi-la kɔ mi teeŋ. Ma síba kiru. Niaa deeŋba yiri nɛ hɛ Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.
Wutitii nɛ, mi bulaa pima, di ŋ bi Wia to a nagɛ haŋbie si yie to u nyimma ari u naaŋ ŋii, ŋ bi jaŋ wuo juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ u joŋ haŋbiisi-la a nɔgɛ, a joŋ u nisiŋ daŋba lɛ, a chuɔlɛ Wia pipiba di Wia pɛba lɛ.
Yesu bira sie duu vɛŋ woŋbiiŋ. Baal kubala fá ku kpirimi u sipaaŋ a piɛsu, “Mi kuhia-zɔmuŋ, ɛɛ nɛ mi jaŋ ŋaa a kɛŋ miisi-la si bi dɛrɛ?”
Yesu piɛsu, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii ŋ yirɛmi kuhia-zɔmuŋ? Nuu-kala bi zɔŋ see Wia duŋduŋa.

Na ŋ jiŋ wialiŋ Wia si leŋe ba ŋmuŋsa bil di niaa tuto. Ba nɛ ŋla: Sí niaa kpu, sí ŋ dɔŋɔ tiina haala chɛ, sí gaa, di ŋ ŋaa daŋsia wii lɛ, sí wiaa nyia. Sí nuu-kala kuŋ girima laa. Fifá ŋ nyimma ari ŋ naaŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ baal-la bula pi Yesu, “Mi kuhiaŋ, mi to wiaa deeŋba kala mi haŋbiiriŋ lɛ nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu nyilimi u siaa lɛ a chou aŋ bula pu, “Wu-bala nɛ ka, ŋ ha bi ŋaa. Joŋ ŋ kiaa kala yallɛ a joŋ moribie-la a pi summoo aŋ ku tomi. Ŋ nɛ ŋaa ŋii, ŋ jaŋ kɛŋ kiaa Wia-jaŋ lɛ.”
Yesu si bul ŋii, u ŋaa baal-la siaa biri, bɛɛ wiaa u kɛŋ kiaa nɛ woruŋ. U tuɔŋ chei, u sii viiri.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu beŋ niaa aŋ miira bula pi u haritooro-la a bul, “U ŋaa wu-duo nɛ ari nialiŋ si kɛŋ kiaa si jaŋ wuo juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.”
U bul ŋii, u haritooro-la hiriki. U saa miira bula piba a bul, “Mi naŋdɔŋsuŋ, u ŋaa wu-duo nɛ ari nialiŋ si kɛŋ kiaa si jaŋ juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.
U bi hɛi ari buŋtaŋŋa si jaŋ wuo to gɛri-hɛmiŋ buɔŋ lii ari u si hɛyɛ ŋii nii-la si kɛŋ kiaa si jaŋ wuo juu Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.”
Yesu si bul ŋii, u haritooro-la faasa hiriki a pipiɛsɛ dɔŋɔ, “U nɛ nagɛ ŋii, kubɛɛ nɛ saa Wia jaŋ laa ta?”
Yesu miira beŋba aŋ bul, “Wii-la si jaŋ kperi nuhuobiine, u bi Wia wuo kperi. Wia wuo wii-kala ŋaa nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita bula pu a bul, “Na, la-na leŋ la kuŋ-kala nɛ aŋ tuto ŋ hariŋ.”

Yesu bula pu a bul, “Wutitii nɛ, ma leŋ ma kiaa kala nɛ aŋ tutomi. Mi saa jaŋ bula pima, nii-la kala si jaŋ wuo leŋ u dia koo u naaŋbiiriŋ koo u naaŋ koo u nyimma koo u biiriŋ koo u bagisiŋ mi wiaa ari Wia wu-zɔmɔ-la wiaa,
u tiina jaŋ bira na diisiŋ ari naaŋbiiriŋ ari naaŋba ari biiriŋ ari bagisiŋ naaŋsiiŋ zɔlɔ dunia deeŋ lɛ. Ba ma jaŋ to u naasiŋ dudɔgisu. Di u nɛ ku suu, u ma jaŋ na miisi-la si bi dɛrɛ.
Ama kuhiasiŋ yuga si jaŋ birimɛ haŋbiisiŋ. Haŋbiisiŋ ma yuga si jaŋ birimɛ kuhiasiŋ.”

Yesu si bul ŋii di ba hɛ woŋbiiŋ lɛ nɛ aa mu Jerusalɛm. Yesu laa ba sipaaŋ. U haritooroo hiriki, fawulluŋ ma kɛŋ nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ síi to ba hariŋ. Ŋii nɛ Yesu kɛŋ u haritooroo duŋduŋa a suusa lii, a bula piba wii-la kala niaa si jaŋ ŋaau lɛ a bul,

“Má jegili mi teeŋ. Laa mu Jerusalɛm nɛ. Di la nɛ yi dimɛ, ba jaŋ kɛŋ mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie kaa mu pi nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba. Ba jaŋ dii mi sariya a bul di u maga di mi suu nɛ, aŋ kɛŋmi kaa mu hɛ nialiŋ si bi Ju̱u tiŋŋaa ŋaa nisiŋ lɛ di ba kpumi.
Ba jaŋ mɔŋmi a jaŋ tu naŋtuɔruŋ ma hɛmi lɛ. Ba jaŋ viirɛmi aŋ kpumi maa, ka di mi sii suuŋ lɛ tapulaa batori chɛɛŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ sii. Ba fa ŋaa Zɛbidii biiriŋ nɛ a mu Yesu teeŋ a bula pu a bul, “La kuhiaŋ, laa suluŋ di ŋ ŋaa wii nɛ a pila.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛba a bul, “Wu-bɛɛ nɛ maa chɛ di mi ŋaa pima?”
Ba bul, “Ŋ si jaŋ dii Wia kuorii-la a kɛŋ yiriŋ a hɔŋ ŋ kuori-kpasa nyuŋ, leŋ la ŋaa ŋ bubuɔŋ huhɔnnɔɔ, di dɔŋɔ hɔŋ ŋ na-diiŋ, di dɔŋɔ ma hɔŋ ŋ na-gua.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ma bi jiŋ ku-la ma síi chɛ. Ma jaŋ wuo nyalima na hɛɛ-la mi si jaŋ naa? Ma jaŋ wuo fo Wii-chuɔlɛ liiŋ ari ba si jaŋ fomi ŋii koo?”
Ba si, “Oo, la jaŋ wuo.” Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Wutitii nɛ ma bul. Hɛɛ-la mi si jaŋ na, u-na ma ma jaŋ na. Ba si jaŋ fomi Wii-chuɔlɛ liiŋ ŋii, ba jaŋ foma ma ŋii.
Ama mi na-diiŋ ari mi na-gua huhɔnnɔ-la, mi dee bi jaŋ tuɔsɛba. Wia nɛ jaŋ liisɛba di ba hɔŋ dimɛ.”
Yesu haritooroo fii-la si ka nii Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ si bul wii-la, ba na baaniŋ ba nyuŋ.

Ŋii nɛ Yesu yirɛ u haritooroo kala. Ba mu u teeŋ. U bula piba a bul, “Ma jiŋ nialiŋ si ŋaa nialiŋ si bi Ju̱u tiŋŋaa ŋaa kuoroo, a fa magɛ di ba beŋ niaa woruŋ, aŋ ka ba via aŋ hɔŋ ba nyuŋ. Ba kuhiasiŋ ma kɛŋba doluŋ.
Ama u bi maga di ma ŋiŋaa ŋii. Ma tuɔŋ nii-la síi chɛ u ŋaa ma kuhiaŋ, u maga duu nɛ tiŋ tiŋtiŋŋaa pipima.
Ma tuɔŋ nii-la síi chɛ u ŋaa ma tuɔŋ kuoro, u maga duu nɛ ŋaa ma tuɔŋ yomo.
Mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie, mi bi kɔ di mi chɛ niaa di ba tima pimi, mi kɔ di mi-na tima piba, a suu, a laa niaa miisaa yugɛ ta a piba nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba ku yi taŋ kubala baa yirɛ Jɛrikɔ. Ni-daŋ ku hilimi a toba. Ba kala kuu lii dimɛ di nyulima hɔŋ woŋbiiŋ niiŋ. U ŋaa sullu nɛ. U yiriŋ nɛ Batimeyas a ŋaa Timeyas bie.
U nia di Yesu si lii Nazarɛt níi kɔ. U si nii ŋii, u faasa yirɛ a bula pu a bul, “Yesu, Devit nihiŋ, fámi nennige.”
Niaa yuga a kpiau lɛ duu kɛŋ goŋ, ama u faasa yirɛ a kii ŋii a bul, “Yesu, Devit nihiŋ, fámi nennige.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu chiŋ aŋ bul di ba yiru duu kɔ. Ŋii nɛ ba yirɛ nyuluŋ-la a bula pu a bul, “Nyirɛ ŋ bɔyɛ aŋ sii kɔ. Uu yiriŋ nɛ.”
U si nii ŋii, u wuri u gɛri-baliŋ ta aŋ sii fula mu yi Yesu.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsu, “Bɛɛ kuŋ nɛ ŋ chɛ mi ŋaa a piŋ?” Ŋii nɛ u bula pu, “Mi kuhiaŋ, leŋ di mi siaa suri di mi nina.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Ŋ yarida nɛ ŋaa ŋ duori. Mumu.”
Ŋii nɛ u siaa guu suri, u tuto Yesu hariŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu ari u haritooro-la sii mumu Jerusalɛm. Ba ku yi Bɛtifagi ari Bɛtani diiriŋ, a ku yi peel kubala baa yirɛ Oliv.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu liisɛ u haritooroo balia a tiŋba a bula piba a bul, “Má mu taŋ-la si hɛ ma sipaaŋ. Di ma nɛ mua, ma jaŋ na kaku-bie di ba vɔɔ bil. Nuu-kala ha buu jila. Má puri a kaa kɔ.
Di ma níi puru, di ba piɛsɛma a bul di bɛɛ nɛ tii maa puri, má bul di ‘la Tiina níi chɛ. U nɛ si la puro kaa kɔ. La jaŋ miira kɛnu kaa kɔ lɛɛlɛ.’ ”
Ba to woŋbiiŋ bibal di ba vɔɔ kaku-bie a kii dia kubala boiŋniiŋ. Ba mu di ba puri.
Ba síi puri kaku-bie-la, di niaa dɔŋsuŋ chiŋ dimɛ a piɛsɛba, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii maa puri kaku-bie-la?”
Ŋii nɛ ba bul wialiŋ kala Yesu si si di ba bul. Ba si bul ŋii, ba leŋ ba puro mu.
Ba kɛŋ kaku-bie-la kaa mu pi Yesu a wuri ba gɛnniŋ a daŋ kaku-bie-la nyuŋ. Yesu jila hɔŋ.
Dɔŋsuŋ ma joŋ ba gɛnniŋ a jɛrɛ woŋbiiŋ lɛ. Dɔŋsuŋ ma keri pipaariŋ a ma kaa lii jɛrɛ woŋbiiŋ lɛ duu vivɛŋ.
Niaa dɔŋsuŋ hɛ u sipaaŋ. Dɔŋsuŋ maa to u hariŋ. Ba kala faasaa ŋaa goŋ a bubul, “Tabarikala! Wia jaŋ pɛ baala deeŋ síi kɔ la Tiina Wia doluŋ lɛ.
La naabalima Devit kuorii-la sii kɔ. Wia jaŋ pɛu lɛ duu kɔ. Má leŋ di la dɛnnɛ Wia.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu mu Jerusalɛm a mu juu Wia-dia a beŋ kialiŋ kala si hɛ dimɛ. U bene dɛrɛ di taŋ bire. Ŋii nɛ ba di u haritooro-la fii ari balia miira mu Bɛtani a mu chua dimɛ.
Taŋ si pula, ba sii lii Bɛtani a joŋ woŋbiiŋ mumu. Losuŋ kɛŋ Yesu.
U na tutogo duu mu chiŋ sipaaŋ a kɛŋ pipaariŋ. U mu yi u bubuɔŋ a biinɛ ari nɛnɛɛ hɛ dimɛ nɛ. U mu wula beŋ, di nɛnɛɛ tuo see pipaariŋ, bɛɛ wiaa ba nɛniŋ ha bi yie.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bul tia-la lɛ a bul, “A lii jiniŋ a kaa mumu, nuu-kala bira bi jaŋ dii ŋ nɛnɛɛ.” U haritooroo nii Yesu si bul ŋii.

Ŋii nɛ ba mu yi Jerusalɛm. Ba si yie, Yesu juu Wia-dia. Nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ hɛ dimɛ a yiyallɛ kiaa, dɔŋsuŋ ma yuyɔɔ kiaa. Yesu kiriba kala ta ba lii. Baalaa ma hɛ dimɛ a yiyɛrɛ moribiee. Yesu ŋmoo ba teebulba lo. Baalaa dɔŋsuŋ ma yallɛ kokosuŋ. U ŋmoo ba ma kpasinniŋ a lo.
U bi sɛyɛ di nuu-kala kɛŋ kiaa kaa ku to Wia-dia-la tuɔŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu dagɛba a bula piba a bul, “Ma bi liisɛ wialiŋ ba si ŋmuŋsa Wia teniŋ lɛɛ? Ba ŋmuŋsa di Wia si, u dia jaŋ ŋaa lee-la niaa si jaŋ chuchuɔlɛ Wia, aŋ ka ma-na miira kaa birimɛ gaari-dia.”
Nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba, ba kala nii wii-la u si bula. Ŋii nɛ baa chɛ woŋbiiŋ di ba to kpuu.
Wialiŋ Yesu si daga, niaa yuga a jegile nii, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere. Ŋii nɛ tii fawulluŋ kɛŋ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba. Ba chichɛ di ba kpuu.
Didaaniŋ si yie, Yesu ari u haritooroo lii taŋ-la lɛ di ba mu piŋ.
Chichuɔ-fiɛla ba joŋ woŋbiiŋ aa vɛŋ, a bira na tutogo-la duu kala suba a tuu kɛŋ u naapoloo pɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Piita liisi wii-la Yesu si bul tia-la lɛ a bula pi Yesu a bul, “La kuhiaŋ, bee na tia-la lɛ ŋ si kaliba hɛ, u suba nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Má ŋaa yarida ari Wia.
Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, di ma nɛ ŋaa Wia yarida a bi tuɔsaa balia kɛnɛ, ma jaŋ bul di peeliŋ sii mu tel muga tuɔŋ. U jaŋ ŋaa a pima.
Ŋii wiaa kialiŋ-na kala ma si chuɔlɛ Wia a susul, di ma nɛ kɛŋ yarida, ma jaŋ naba.
Bua-na kala di ŋ nɛ sii chiŋ a chuchuɔlɛ Wia, biina na di ma di nuu kɛŋ wii. Di u cho duu nagɛ ŋii ma kala, ŋ́ joŋo chɛu. Ŋ nɛ ŋaa ŋii, Wia si hɛ Wia-jaŋ lɛ, u ma jaŋ joŋ ŋ haachɛba chɛŋ. [
Ama di ŋ nɛ bi wiaa joŋo chɛ ŋ dɔŋsuŋ tiŋŋaa, ŋ Nyimma Wia si hɛ Wia-jaŋ lɛ, u ma bi jaŋ joŋ ŋ haachɛba chɛŋ.”]
Ba bira kɔ Jerusalɛm a mu juu Wia-dia. Yesu síi vɛŋ Wia-dia tuɔŋ ŋii, nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasiŋ, ba kala sii kɔ u teeŋ
a piɛsu a bul, “Dol bɛɛ nɛ ŋ kɛŋ a ŋiŋaa wiaa deeŋba? Kubɛɛ nɛ piŋ doluŋ ŋ ŋiŋaa ŋii?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Mi ma jaŋ piɛsɛma wu-bala. Di ma nɛ dagɛmi u bubuɔŋ, mi ma jaŋ dagɛma dol-la mi si kɛnɛ bubuɔŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba a bul, “Jɔɔŋ, Wia lii-foori-la doluŋ, u lii Wia teeŋ nɛɛ koo u lii nuhuobiine teeŋ nɛɛ? Má dagɛmi.”
Ba suomo kɛŋ wii-la lilɛrɛ dɔŋɔ lɛ aa bul, “Wu-bɛɛ nɛ laa chɛ di la bul? Di la nɛ bula pu a bul di Wia teeŋ nɛ u lii, u jaŋ piɛsɛla a bul, ‘Bɛɛ nɛ saa tii ma bi wialiŋ u si bula laa dii?’
La saa jaŋ wuo bul u lii nuhuobiinee teeŋ nɛɛ? Ai.” Fawulluŋ kɛŋba a tiŋ nialiŋ si chiŋ dimɛ wiaa. Niaa bula ari Jɔɔŋ fa sɛnɛ ŋaa nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ ba bula pi Yesu a bul, “La bi jiŋ.” Yesu ma bula piba a bul, “Tɔɔ, mi ma bi jaŋ dagɛma dol-la mi si kɛnɛ bubuɔŋ.”

Yesu bira magɛ namaga a piba a bul, “Baal kubala nɛ bil baga a chɔŋsɛ kiaa si kɛŋ nɛnɛɛ yugɛ a nagɛ chichuɛŋ. Ba yiyirɛ gireps. U saa ligɛ baga-la golli nɛ. U lu bua baga-la tuɔŋ di ba chagɛ tii-nɛnɛ-la liiŋ hihɛ, a saa lusuŋ nyuŋ dia ma a hɔnɔ pɔ. U paa niaa a hɛ u baga-la tuɔŋ di ba titiŋ. Ka u mu taŋ dɔŋ.
Tii-nɛnɛ-la bii, u tiŋ u dia tiŋtinnaa dɔŋɔ duu mu tiŋtinna-la teeŋ a laa tii-nɛnɛɛ kaa kɔ. U mu.
Ba kɛnu a ŋmobu aŋ leŋ u kɛŋ na-hilliŋ miira mu baga tiina teeŋ.
U bira miira tiŋ tiŋtinna-la dɔŋɔ. U ma bira mu. Ba kɛnu a ŋmobu a yagɛ u nyuŋ luri a jolimu.
U bira tiŋ tori, u bira mu. Ba kpuu. U tiŋ niaa yugɛ. Ba ŋaa ŋii titia nialiŋ ma lɛ. Ba ŋmoo dɔŋsuŋ aŋ kpu dɔŋsuŋ maa.
Nii-la si ka, u bii-chooluŋ nɛ ŋii. Ŋii hariŋ lɛ nɛ u timu. U biina u bie nɛ mua, ba jaŋ zilu. U ma bira mu.
Tiŋtinna-la si na bile, ba bula pi dɔŋɔ a bul, ‘Di baga-la tiina nɛ suba, bie deeŋ nɛ jaŋ dii u kiaa. Má kɔ di la kpuu. Di la nɛ kpuu, la nɛ jaŋ miira tii u kialiŋ.’
Ba kɛŋ bile a kpuu a joŋu yuo ta baga-la hariŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛba, “Ɛɛ nɛ baga-la tiina jaŋ ŋaa? U jaŋ kɔ a kpu tiŋtinna-la kala, aŋ joŋ baga-la a pi ni-tania.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛ nialiŋ si nii namaga-la, “Ma bi Wia teŋ-la karimaa a mu yi lee-la ba si bul ŋlaa?
‘Tiebii-la dii-saaraa si via,
u nɛ miira ku ŋaa tiebii-duoŋ ba si joŋo bil dia geŋtine.
La Tiina Wia tiŋtiŋŋaa nɛ ŋii.
U ŋaala wu-kpuŋkpere nɛ.’ ”
Yesu si bul ŋii, Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuhiasiŋ chichɛ di ba kɛnu kaa mu tɔ dia, bɛɛ wiaa ba jima ari u magɛ namaga-la a tigɛba lɛ nɛ. Ama ba fá nialiŋ si hɛ dimɛ. Ŋii nɛ tii ba leŋu aŋ viiri.
Ba miira mu aŋ tiŋ Farisii tiŋŋaa dɔŋsuŋ ari Hɛrɔd haritooroo dɔŋsuŋ di ba bira mu Yesu teeŋ a magisu a bɛrɛ kɛnu.

Ba kɔ u teeŋ a bula pu a bul, “La kuhiaŋ, la jima di ŋ kɛŋ wutitii nɛ. Ŋ sipaaŋ tuo nuu lɛ. Ŋ bi ni-bal síi ka fá. Ŋŋ dagɛ Wia woŋbii-titii nɛ. U ŋaa woŋbiiŋ nɛ di la tiŋ laŋpoo a pi Rom tiŋteeŋ kuori-baliŋ ba síi yirɛ Siiza koo? Dagɛla.
La time pu koo la sí pa?” Yesu jima nɛ di ba fugoo bul nɛ, ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii maa magisɛmi? Má kɛŋ moribii-biiŋ kaa kɔ di mi bee na.”
Ba kɛŋ dɔŋɔ kaa kɔ. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba, “Kubɛɛ nyuŋ nɛ hɛ dimɛ? Kubɛɛ yiriŋ ma nɛ ba tuuro hɛ moribii-la lɛ?” Ŋii nɛ ba bul di Siiza yiriŋ nɛ.
U bula piba a bul, “Tɔɔ, má joŋ Rom tiŋteeŋ kuori-bal-la kiaa pu aŋ joŋ Wia ma kiaa pu.” Yesu si bul ŋii, ba niiriŋ kala maa. Ba leŋu aŋ viiri.
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ ba síi yirɛ Sadusii tiŋŋaa, ba kɔ u teeŋ. Sadusii tiŋŋaa yie si di nuu nɛ suba, u bira bi sii. Ba piɛsu wiaa a bul,

“La kuhiaŋ, Moosis dagɛla Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ ari baala nɛ jaa haala, di haal-la ari baal-la nɛ bi bii lula, aŋ ka di baal-la suu, u maga di u ŋaana joŋ haal-la jaa nɛ. Di u lul biiriŋ pi u maala-la si suba, biiri-la jaŋ chiŋ u nyuŋ lɛ.
Naaŋbiiriŋ balipɛ nɛ fa hɛ dimɛ. Ba kala ŋaa baalaa nɛ. Ba naaŋ kubala, ba nyimma ma kubala. Ba kuhiaŋ jaa haala. Ba di haal-la bi bii lula, aŋ ka u suu.
Liamiŋ tiina joŋ haal-la jaa. Ba duu ma bi bii lula. Ka u ma suu. Torimuŋ tiina ma joŋ haal-la jaa. U ma ŋii titia nɛ.
Naaŋbiiri-la balipɛ kala nɛ jaa haal-la. U bi lula. Ŋii hariŋ lɛ nɛ haal-la ma titia suu.
Tapulii-la niaa si jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ, baalaa deeŋba balipɛ tuɔŋ, kubɛɛ nɛ jaŋ tii haal-la? Ba kala balipɛ nɛ jaau.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ma bi Wia teniŋ jiŋ. Ma ma bi Wia doluŋ jiŋ. Ŋii nɛ tii ma yeŋŋi.
Tapulii-la niaa si jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ, baalaa bira bi jaŋ jaa haalaa, haalaa ma bira bi jaŋ jaa balaba. Ba kala jaŋ nagɛ Wia tiŋdaaraa si hɛ Wia-jaŋ lɛ.”

Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Na ma piɛsɛmi nialiŋ si jaŋ sii suuŋ lɛ wiaa. Ma bi karimɛ wialiŋ Moosis si bula Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ, lee-la u fa si bul wiaa a tigɛ tii-bie síi dii nyiniŋ lɛɛ? Wia nɛ bula pu duu nɛ ŋaa Abiraham Wia ari Aizik Wia ari Jekɔb Wia. (Bua-la lɛ u si bul ŋii di Abiraham ari Aizik ari Jekɔb fa suba nɛ.)
Wiaa deeŋba u si bula, ba bubuɔsaa nɛ di Abiraham ari Aizik ari Jekɔb bira sii suuŋ lɛ nɛ a hɛ Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ. Wia bi jaŋ wuo ŋaa nialiŋ si suba Wia. U ŋaa ni-weyee Wia nɛ. Ma bi wii-kala jiŋ.”
Wia teniŋ kerichiba dɔŋɔ nia ba si kɛŋ wii-la lilɛrɛ. U kɔ ba teeŋ. U si na di Yesu chaarɛ wiaa siaa woruŋ, u piɛsu a bul, “Wialiŋ Wia si dagɛ niaa baa to, kubɛɛ nɛ ŋaa ba tuɔŋ wu-baliŋ?”
U bula piba a bul, “Ba bula pi Iziral niaa a bul, ‘Iziral niaa, má jegile nii mi teeŋ. La Tiina Wia duŋduŋa nɛ hɛ dimɛ.
Ŋ́ kɛŋ ŋ tuɔŋ kala ari ŋ tuɔbiinaa kala ari ŋ wii-wii-kala a cho ŋ Tiina Wia.’ Ba tuɔŋ ku-baliŋ nɛ ŋii.
Wu-liamiŋ ma nɛ ŋla: ‘Cho ŋ dɔŋɔ tiina ari ŋ si cho ŋ titia ŋii.’ Wialiŋ Wia si bula, wii-kala tuo a kii wiaa deeŋba baliamiŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Wia teniŋ kerichi-la bula pu a bul, “La kuhiaŋ, wutitii nɛ ŋ bul ŋii. Wia duŋduŋa nɛ hɛ dimɛ, kuŋ-kala bira tuo see Wia duŋduŋa.

Ŋ si jaŋ kɛŋ ŋ tuɔŋ kala ari ŋ tuɔbiinaa kala ari ŋ wii-wii-kala a cho Wia, a cho ŋ dɔŋɔ tiina ari ŋ si cho ŋ titia ŋii, u nɛ kpia ŋ si joŋ pusuŋ kpu a nyiga pi Wia, koo ŋ si joŋ kiaa dɔŋsuŋ a bile pi Wia.”
Yesu na di baal-la kɛŋ wu-jimiŋ. Ŋii nɛ u bula pu a bul, “Ma di Wia kuorii-la bi bol.” U si bul ŋii dɛrɛ, nuu-kala bira bi nyu-duoŋ kɛnɛ duu piɛsu wii-kala.
Yesu bira dagɛ niaa Wia-dia tuɔŋ a piɛsɛba, “Ɛɛ nɛ Wia teniŋ kerichiba jaŋ wuo bul ari Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisa, jaŋ ŋaa Devit nihi duŋduŋ nɛ?
Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la nɛ fa dagɛ Devit duu bul wiaa a tigɛ Kirisito lɛ. Ŋla nɛ u bul,
‘La Tiina Wia bula pi mi Tiina
duu hɔŋ u sɛmɛ, ni-duoŋ di-hɔnuŋ,
see duu yuo dii u diŋdɔŋŋɔɔ kala dɛrɛ.’
Devit titia yirɛ nia deeŋ u Tiina. Ɛɛ nɛ saa u jaŋ wuo ŋaa u nihi duŋduŋ?” Yesu síi bul wiaa, niaa yuga a jegile nii u teeŋ ari tuɔtɔruŋ.
Yesu bira dagɛba a bul, “Má kɛŋ ma titia woruŋ Wia teniŋ kerichiba lɛ. Ba yie gugɔllɛ yɔbɔ lɛ ari ba gɛri-duduosuŋ aa chɛ di niaa jujoŋba jirima a chuchuɔlɛba.
Ba yie chichɛ ni-balaa di-hɔnuŋ Wii-chuɔlɛ diisiŋ lɛ. Di ba nɛ yirɛba di ba ku dii kiaa, ba cho di ba hɔŋ ni-balaa di-hɔnɔɔ maa.
Ba yie fugo chuɔlɛ Wia didieni a kɛŋ yo-haalaa kiaa laa didii. Bua-la lɛ Wia si jaŋ dii ba sariya, ba nɛ jaŋ na hɛɛŋ a kii ba dɔŋsuŋ tiŋŋaa kala.”
Yesu mu hɔŋ lee-la niaa si joŋ ba moribiee bil a pipi Wia a nina ŋii ba síi hɛ. Nialiŋ si kɛŋ kiaa, ba faasa hihɛ moribiee.
Ŋii nɛ yo-haal kubala ma kɔ. U ŋaa summu nɛ a mu joŋ amiisiŋba balia a ma hɛ. Kɔbu nɛ ŋii.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu yirɛ u haritooroo a bula piba a bul, “Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, yo-haala deeŋ moribii-bie-la u si joŋo hɛ, u nɛ kii nialiŋ moribie-la kala.
Nialiŋ kala si joŋ moribiee a pi Wia, ba liisa aŋ ka nɛ. Aŋ ka u-na joŋ u summu moribiiŋ kala a hɛ, ku-la kala u si kɛnɛ nɛ ŋii.”
Yesu si lii Wia-dia ku lii, ŋii nɛ u haritooroo dɔŋɔ bula pu a bul, “Mi kuhiaŋ, na tiebie-la ba si kaa saa dia-la, ba zɔmɔ kiŋkɛŋ, jaŋ-la ma kala zɔŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Ŋ na ja-baliŋ deeŋ? Ba jaŋ ŋmoo jaŋ-la kala lo. Ba bi jaŋ leŋ di tiebii-bala ma ka daŋ u dɔŋɔ lɛ.”
Ba mu jil peel kubala baa yirɛ Oliv, a hɔŋ u nyuŋ, a bee nina ja-bal-la. Piita ari Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ ari Aŋduru luɔra piɛsu,
“Bua bɛɛ lɛ nɛ wiaa deeŋba jaŋ ŋaa? Bɛɛ kiaa nɛ la jaŋ na, ka wiaa deeŋba-na ŋaa?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Má kɛŋ ma titia woruŋ di nuu-kala sí ma nyisu.
Niaa jaŋ yugɛ a kɔ a joŋ mi yiriŋ hɛ ari ba nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, a nyisɛ niaa yugɛ.
Ma jaŋ nii ari laaliŋ hɛ daha a hɛ di-boluŋ maa. Di ma nɛ ku nii ŋii, ma sí leŋe di ma bɔyɛ joŋ. Wiaa deeŋba kala jaŋ ŋaa bal, ama dunia didɛriŋ ha dee ŋii.
Tiŋteeŋ dɔŋɔ niaa jaŋ sii a mu a yuo tiŋteeŋ dɔŋɔ niaa. Taŋ kuoro ari u niaa jaŋ sii giri a mu yuo kuoro dɔŋɔ ari u niaa. Tiŋteeŋ jaŋ zigili leree yugɛ. Losuŋ ma jaŋ juu. Hɛɛŋ di-suomuŋ nɛ ŋla.

Ama má kɛŋ ma titia woruŋ. Ba jaŋ kɛŋma kaa mu nialiŋ si yie hilime vuvuurɛ wiaa teeŋ di ba dii ma sariya. Ba jaŋ ŋmooma Wii-chuɔlɛ diisiŋ lɛ. Ma ma jaŋ chiŋ kuoroo ari taŋ kuhiasiŋ sipaaŋ a tiŋ mi wiaa a dii mi daŋsia.
Ba jaŋ laa sipaaŋ bul Wia wu-zɔŋŋɔɔ a pi niaa leriŋ kala aŋ ka di wiaa deeŋba-na ŋaa.

Di ba nɛ kɛŋma kaa mu di ba dii ma sariya, ma sí leŋe di ma bɔisiŋ joŋ wialiŋ ma si jaŋ bul lɛ a laa ma titia. Bua-la lɛ Wia jaŋ joŋ wu-jimiŋ a hɛ ma nyuŋ lɛ. Wii-la kala si kɔ ma nyuŋ, má bul. Ma dee bi jaŋ bul, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la nɛ jaŋ joŋo hɛ ma nyuŋ lɛ.
Naaŋbiiriŋ jaŋ kɛŋ dɔŋɔ a kaa mu pa di ba kpu. Nyimmaba ma jaŋ ŋaa ŋii ba biiriŋ lɛ. Biiriŋ ma jaŋ ŋaa ŋii a ma kɛsɛ ba nyimmaba ari ba naaŋba, a ma kaa mu pa di ba kpu.
Nuu-kala jaŋ bɛrɛma a tiŋ mi wiaa. Ama nuu-kala si nyalimɛ a mu dɛrɛ, Wia jaŋ laau ta.

Ma jaŋ na di ba joŋ ku-lɔruŋ a bil lee-la u si bi maga u hɛ. Kua deeŋ jaŋ ŋaa wu-bɔŋŋɔɔ. U jaŋ chei Wia yiriŋ. (Ma si jaŋ karimɛ wiaa deeŋba, ma jaŋ jiŋ ba bubuɔsaa.) Di ma na ŋii, má leŋ di nialiŋ si hɛ Judiya lɛ, di ba fá jil peelee nyuŋ a faa.
Di nuu-kala hɛ lusuŋ nyuŋ a nii wiaa deeŋba, di u nɛ ku tuu, duu sí u dia juu a chichɛ u paa u kiaa.
Di nuu nɛ hɛ baga lɛ a nii wiaa deeŋba, duu sí miira mu dia a chichɛ duu joŋ u gɛriŋ.
Nialiŋ si kɛŋ luoroo ari nialiŋ si nɔgɛ biiriŋ, oi, ba jaŋ na hɛɛŋ yugɛ.
Máa sul Wia di wiiŋ deeŋ sí yibiiniŋ ŋaa.
Wia si ŋaa dunia a ku lii jiniŋ, nuu-kala ha bi hɛɛŋ deeŋ na a nagɛ ŋii, nuu bira bi jaŋ na hɛɛŋ ŋii a kaa mu wuu.
Di Wia fa bi tapulia-la kere ta, ni-bala ma fa bi jaŋ ka. Ama nialiŋ Wia si liisa di baa tou, ba wiaa nɛ tii u keri tapulia-la ta.
Di nuu-kala nɛ bula piŋ di ŋ beŋ daha a na Kirisito-la, koo di ŋ beŋ dimɛ a nau, síu yarida ŋaa.

Niaa dɔŋsuŋ jaŋ sii fugo bul di ba nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisa. Dɔŋsuŋ ma jaŋ sii fugo bul di ba ŋaa nialiŋ síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ. Ba jaŋ ŋaa wu-magilaa ari wu-kpuŋkperisiŋ a chichɛ di ba nyisɛ nialiŋ Wia si liisa di baa tou.
Wiaa deeŋba kala mi laa sipaaŋ bula pima, ka di bua-la-na yi. Má kɛŋ ma titia woruŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bira bula piba a bul, “Tapulia-la hɛɛŋ deeŋ si kiele, taŋ jaŋ biri di taŋ nɛ pula maa. Chɛnɛ ma bira bi jaŋ pɔsɛ.
Chɛŋwulaa jaŋ lii wia nyuŋ ku tuu a titel. Ba jaŋ kiri wia nyuŋ kialiŋ kala si kɛŋ doluŋ di ba lii ba leree.
Ŋii lɛ nɛ ma jaŋ na mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie, di mi to duoŋbiliŋbaanaa tuɔŋ ku tuu. Mi jaŋ kɛŋ doluŋ yugɛ a chaanɛ.
Ŋii lɛ nɛ mi jaŋ tiŋ Wia tiŋdaaraa di ba mu dunia sɛmɛ-na kala a kɛŋ nialiŋ kala Wia si liisa di baa tou a hilimi.
Di ma na sɔjaamiŋ duu kuu tɔsɛ, ma jima ari liŋbaŋa yie nɛ.
Namaga deeŋ lɛ ma jaŋ gunnɛ wiaa. Di ma na wiaa deeŋba kala di baa ŋaa, ma jiŋ di mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie kpaga nɛ.
Wutitii mi bulaa pima, ma lɛɛlɛ niaa deeŋba si hɛ ma miisiŋ deeŋ lɛ bi jaŋ suu, ka wiaa deeŋba ŋaa bal.
Wia nyuŋ ari tiŋteeŋ kala jaŋ dɛrɛ, ama wialiŋ mi si bula bi jaŋ lɛl.
Ama nuu-kala bi jaŋ jiŋ chɛɛ-la wiaa deeŋba si jaŋ ŋaa. Wia tiŋdaaraa si hɛ Wia-jaŋ ma paala bi jaŋ jiŋ. Mi-na Wia Bie ma bi jaŋ jiŋ, see mi Nyimma duŋduŋa.
Má kɛŋ ma titia woruŋ a pɔ, bɛɛ wiaa ma bi wialiŋ si jaŋ ŋaa chɛɛ-la jiŋ.
U nagɛ baala si sie aa chɛ u vɛŋ woŋbiiŋ nɛ. Di u lii dia lɛ, u jaŋ dagɛ u tiŋtinnaa ba tiŋtiŋŋaa aŋ bula pi nii-la síi beŋ u dia maa duu pɔ woruŋ duu miira kɔ.
Má saa pɔ woruŋ, bɛɛ wiaa ma bi jiŋ chɛɛ-la dia-la tiina si jaŋ kɔ, di didaaniŋ nɛɛ, di tita-siesee nɛɛ, di siipuuraa nɛɛ, koo chichuɔŋ nɛɛ, ma bi jiŋ.
Má bibeŋ a pɔ woruŋ, di ŋii dee, u jaŋ guu kɔ di ma piŋ doŋ.
Wii-la mi si bulaa pima, u nɛ mi bulaa pi nuu-kala, má pɔ woruŋ.”

Tapulaa balia nɛ ka duu yi ba chɛ-bal-la: Diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele-la. Tapulii-la nɛ ba yie dii boroboro si bi si-buruŋ kɛnɛ. Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba, baa chɛ woŋbiiŋ di ba luɔra kɛŋ Yesu a kpu.
Ba bula di ba síu kɛŋ ba chɛ-bal-la chɛɛŋ, di ba nɛ ŋaa ŋii, niaa jaŋ ŋaa taawɛi.

U mu Bɛtani a hɔŋ Saamɔŋ dia lɛ a didii kiaa. Saamɔŋ fa ŋaa gbege nɛ aŋ ku duori. Uu dii kiaa di haal kubala ku juu a kɛŋ tulaali ari loŋ. U suɔra sima, u yalliŋ ma hɛyɛ. U kɛŋ loŋ-la suri a liisɛ nuu-la a bisa hɛ Yesu nyuŋ lɛ.
Ka nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ hɔnɔ gugurimɛ a pipiɛsɛ dɔŋɔ a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii haala deeŋ kɛŋ nuu-la a kaa chei ŋla?
Di ba nɛ fa yaara joŋ nuu-la a yallɛ, u fa jaŋ kii siidi bui balia di ba fa joŋo pi summoo.” Ba sii tutuusɛ haal-la.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Má leŋ haal-la. Bɛɛ nɛ tii ma wiwalimu? Wu-zɔŋ nɛ u ŋaami lɛ.
Ma di summoo jaŋ hɛ dimɛ bua-na kala lɛ. Bua-na kala lɛ nɛ ma chichɛ ma ŋaa wu-zɔmuŋ a pi summo-la, ma jaŋ wuo ŋaa, ama la di ma bi jaŋ hɛ dimɛ deeŋ deeŋ.
Haal-la ŋaa kukeri nɛ. U ŋaa wii-la kala u si jaŋ wuo ŋaa nɛ. U tisɛ mi yaraa di ba hugi nɛ, ka mi ha bi suba.
Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, dunia sɛmɛ-na kala ba si jaŋ wuo mu a bul Wia wu-zɔmɔ-la, ba jaŋ liisi haala deeŋ ma wiaa a bul.”
Ŋii nɛ Judas Isikarɔt sii. U ŋaa Yesu haritooro-la fii ari balia dɔŋɔ nɛ. U sii mumu nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ teeŋ duu kɛŋ Yesu yalla piba.
Ba si nii ŋii, ba tuɔŋ tɔrɛ. Ba bul ba jaŋ joŋ moribiee pu. A chiŋ bua-la lɛ u suomo chichɛ woŋbii-la u si jaŋ to a kɛŋ Yesu yalla piba.

Ba chɛ-bal-la tapul-buŋbuŋ ba si yie dii boroboro-la si bi si-buruŋ kɛnɛ aŋ kpu piese-la ba si yie kaa ŋaa gbiele-la kudiilee, Yesu haritooro-la sii a piɛsu, “Nii nɛ ŋ cho di la mu ŋaa diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele-la kudiilee di ŋ ku dii?”
Ŋii nɛ u tiŋ u haritooroo balia a bula piba a bul, “Má mu juu taŋ-la tuɔŋ. Di ma nɛ mua, ma jaŋ cheŋ baal kubala duu chuŋ nyuvie ari liiŋ. Má to u hariŋ.
Dia-na kala u si jua, má to juu bula pi dia-la tiina a bul, ‘La kuhiaŋ si, la piɛsiŋ di nii lɛ nɛ nuhuɔra dia hɛ di ba di u haritooroo juu a hɔnɔ dii diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele kudiilee?’
U jaŋ dagɛma dii-bal kubala. U ŋaa lusuŋ nyuŋ dia nɛ. Ba wasu kala. Lee-la nɛ ma jaŋ ŋaa kudiile-la.”
Ŋii nɛ u haritooro-la sii lii a mu taŋ tuɔŋ a na wialiŋ kala Yesu si bula piba di ba ŋaa wutitii a ŋaa diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele-la kudiilee ba dii.
Wia si jua, Yesu ari u haritooroo ku juu a hɔŋ a didii kialiŋ.
Ba síi dii kiaa ŋii, ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Wutitii, mi bulaa pima, ma niaa deeŋba síi dii kialiŋ, ma dɔŋɔ jaŋ joŋmi yallɛ. La duu nɛ pɛ dɔŋɔ a didii kiaa lɛɛlɛ.”
Ba si nii wii-la, ba tuɔŋ chei. Ba kala pipiɛsɛ kuŋ kuŋ. Dɔŋɔ yie piɛsɛ, “Mi nɛɛ?”
Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ma fii ari balia deeŋba tuɔŋ kubala nɛ, la kala nɛ chala kɛŋ boroboro tutuu gbaŋa-la tuɔŋ.
Mi-na, Nuhuobiine Bie, mi jaŋ suu ari ba si ŋmuŋsɛ ŋii a tigɛmi lɛ. Ama nii-la si joŋ mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie yallɛ, aa, u jaŋ na hɛɛŋ yugɛ. Ba fa si buu lula, u nɛ kpia.”
Ba si hɔnɔ didii kiaa, ŋii nɛ Yesu sii a joŋ boroboro a lɔllɛ Wia aŋ kaa chɔgɛ chɔgɛ, a joŋo pi u haritooroo, a bula piba a bul, “Má laa. Mi yaraa namia nɛ ŋii.”
Ŋii nɛ u bira joŋ nyunyuala maa ari siniŋ a lɔllɛ Wia aŋ joŋo piba. Ba kala nyua nyunyual-bala-la tuɔŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba, “Mi chaliŋ nɛ ŋii. Chaliŋ deeŋ wiaa nɛ tii Wia ta niiŋ ma teeŋ. Mi chaliŋ jaŋ jaasɛ ni-kɛnɛ wiaa, di Wia joŋ ba haachɛba chɛba.
Wutitii nɛ mi bulaa pima, mi bira bi jaŋ kɔ di mi nyua siniŋ deeŋ, see tapulii-la mi si jaŋ kɔ nɛ, mi jaŋ nyua si-faliŋ Wia kuorii-la tuɔŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ ba yii Wii-chuɔlɛ yiiliŋ a dɛrɛ aŋ sii lii a mu peel kubala baa yirɛ Oliv.

Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula piba a bul, “Ma kala jaŋ fá viiri. Ba ŋmuŋsɛ Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ di Wia jaŋ kpu pie-daara, aŋ ka piesee fá pisɛ. Ba si ŋmuŋsɛ ŋii Wia teŋ-la, wii-la jaŋ ŋaa. Ma kala jaŋ fá mi teeŋ aŋ leŋmi.
Wia jaŋ chisɛmi suuŋ lɛ. U nɛ chisɛmi, mi jaŋ laa ma sipaaŋ a mu Galilii.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita bula pi Yesu a bul, “Di ba kala fá maa aŋ leŋiŋ, mi-na bi jaŋ miirɛ ŋ hariŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bula pu a bul, “Wutitii nɛ, jiniŋ titaŋiŋ deeŋ, ŋ-na Piita, ŋ jaŋ bul naaŋsiiŋ butori ari ŋ bimi jiŋ, ka di ji-bele-na yel naaŋsiiŋ bulia.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita bul ari siifiɛsiŋ a bul, “La diŋ paala susuu maa, mi bi jaŋ bul ari mi biŋ jiŋ.” Ku-kaanaa ma kala bul ŋii.
Ŋii nɛ ba mu juu lee kubala baa yirɛ Gɛtisɛmani. Yesu bula pi u haritooroo di ba hɔŋ daha, ka u mu chuɔlɛ Wia aŋ kɔ.
U kɛŋ Piita ari Jeems ari Jɔɔŋ a kaa mu dimɛ. Yesu tuɔŋ kala chei. U tuɔŋ bi pina.
U bula pi u haritooroo a bul, “Mi tuɔŋ kala nɛ cheye a magɛ di mi suu. Má hɔnɔ pɔ daha.”
Ba hɔŋ. Ka u suusa mu sipaaŋ mua a tuu kpirimi tiŋteeŋ a sul Wia a bul duu nɛ kɛŋ woŋbiiŋ, duu sí leŋe di wii-la juu-u lɛ
a bira bul, “Mi Nyimma, ŋ jaŋ wuo ŋaa wii-kala. Liisɛ hɛɛ-la síi kɔmi lɛ. Ama mi-na ŋla tuɔtɔruŋ lɛ dee, ŋ-na tuɔtɔruŋ lɛ nɛ.”
U chuɔla dɛrɛ aŋ sii kɔ u haritooroo teeŋ di ba piŋ doŋ. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛ Piita a bul, “Ŋ pina nɛɛ? Ŋ bi doŋ muapilii ma wuo bɛrɛɛ a diene yi hawa kubalaa?
Má chuɔlɛ Wia a pupɔ di Sitaani sí wuo nyisɛma. Ma tuɔŋ lɛ ma cho di ma ŋaa wu-zɔŋŋɔɔ, aŋ ka ma bi doluŋ kɛnɛ.”
U bira mu a chuɔlɛ Wia a bira bul ŋii titia.
U miira kɔ di ba bira piŋ doŋ, bɛɛ wiaa doŋ kɛŋba nɛ woruŋ. Ba bi jiŋ ba si jaŋ bul wii-la kala a pu.
U miira mu torimuŋ aŋ ku piɛsɛba, “Ma ha pinaa wiesi nɛɛ? Má sii, bua-la yie nɛ. Ba jaŋ kɛŋ mi-na, Nuhuobiine Bie a pi haachɛ diiree.
Má sii, la mu. Nii-la si jaŋ joŋmi yallɛ ka kɔ nɛ.”

Yesu ha bi wiaa bula dɛrɛ, di Judas níi kɔ ŋii. U fa ŋaa Yesu haritooro-la fii ari balia dɔŋɔ nɛ. Niaa yugɛ a tuto u hariŋ. Dɔŋsuŋ kori tokobiee ari taŋguloo. Nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari ba taŋ kuhiasiŋ nɛ tiŋba, ba kɔ.
Zɛŋbɛ tiina-la fa pi nialiŋ magil nɛ a bul, “Nii-la mi si mu guori, u nɛ ŋii. Má kɛnu.”
Judas si yi lee-la Yesu si hɛ, u mu u teeŋ tegi tegi aŋ bul, “La kuhiaŋ!” aŋ guoru.
Ba kala guriku a kɛnu.
Ka niaa china bibeŋ. Ba tuɔŋ dɔŋɔ liisɛ u tokobiiŋ, a ta nuu digiliŋ keri. Nii-la fa ŋaa nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ dia-yoŋ nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu piɛsɛba a bul, “Mi ŋaa gaaru nɛɛ? Ma si kori tokobiee ari taŋguloo a kukɔ di ma kɛŋmii?
Na, tapulii-na kala la di ma nɛ yie hɛ Wia-dia lɛ, mi dagɛ Wia wiaa a pipima. Aŋ ka ma bi walima di ma kɛŋmi dimɛ. Ama wialiŋ kala ba si ŋmuŋsa Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ a tigɛmi lɛ, ba kala jaŋ ŋaa.”
Ŋii nɛ u haritooroo kala viau aŋ fá.
Ka bapuɔsi kubala baagɛ gɛri-bɔsɔ a tuto Yesu hariŋ a mumu. Baa walimɛ di ba kɛnu.
Ama u wuri gɛri-bɔsɔ-la a ta aŋ kɛŋ yaribiree a fá viiri.
Ba saa kɛŋ Yesu a kaa mu nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ teeŋ. Ba kɔ dimɛ di nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari ba Wii-chuɔlɛ hiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba kala hilime.
Ba kɛnu mumu ŋii, ka Piita daa tuto ba hariŋ a mu juu nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ kaala. U jua di nialiŋ síi pɔ kaala-la hɔnɔ wiwieni nyiniŋ. U mu pɛba lɛ.
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasi-la ari nialiŋ kala si yie hilime vuvuurɛ wiaa chichɛ di ba na Yesu si ŋaa wii-la chei di ba kpuu a chɛ chɛ wii ka.
Niaa yuga a nyia wiaa pu. Ama ba bul nii-liɛriŋ nɛ, ba bi nii-bala bula.
Ŋii nɛ niaa dɔŋsuŋ sii chiŋ a nyia wiaa pupu a bul,
“La nia ari Yesu si u jaŋ ŋmoo Wia-dia-la niaa si saa a lo aŋ bira wuo saa u dɔŋɔ tapulaa batori chɛɛŋ, di niaa dee bi jaŋ saa dia-la-na.”
Ama ba wialiŋ kala bi kubala ŋaa.
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ sii lii chiŋ nialiŋ tutuɔbaaniŋ a piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Ŋ bi nia niaa deeŋba si bul wialiŋ a tigɛŋ lɛɛ? Ŋ-na bi wii kɛnɛ ŋ jaŋ bul?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu tɔrɛ u niiŋ. U bi wii-kala bula. Ŋii nɛ baal-la bira piɛsu, “Ŋ nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisa? Ŋ nɛ Wia Biee?”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu bul, “Mi-na nɛ. Ma jaŋ na mi-na Nuhuobiine Bie di mi hɔŋ Wia sɛmɛ, ni-duoŋ di-hɔnuŋ, a to duoŋbiliŋbaanaa tuɔŋ a kuu tuu.”
U bul ŋii, baal-la kɛŋ u gɛnniŋ kaa kiɛsɛ aŋ bul, “U bi maga di la bira chɛ daŋsiaba.
Ma kala bi nia u si chei Wia yiriŋ ŋii? Bɛɛ nɛ ma biinɛ?” Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ kala bul di u cheye nɛ, u maga di ba kpuu nɛ.
Dɔŋsuŋ ma sii a tu naŋtuɔruŋ a hɛ u siaa lɛ aŋ vɔɔ u siaa tɔ a ŋmobu aŋ bula pu duu dagɛ nii-la si ŋmobu. Ŋii nɛ ka ba kɛnu kaa mu pi laali-yuoroo. Ba fallɛ u chaŋkpaŋŋaa lɛ.
Piita si hɔŋ kaala-la lɛ, ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiaŋ dia tiŋtinni-tolo kubala ku lii
a na Piita duu hɔnɔ wiwieni nyiniŋ. U benu woruŋ aŋ bula pu a bul, “Ŋ ma faa to Yesu hariŋ nɛ, baal-la si lii Nazarɛt.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita nyia wiaa a bul, “Mi bi Yesu jiŋ. Mi bi wii-la ŋ si paala bubul jiŋ,” aŋ sii lii chiŋ zawura tuɔŋ.
Piita si chiŋ dimɛ, ŋii nɛ tiŋtinni-tolo dɔŋɔ bira nau a bula pi nialiŋ si china kpagu a bul, “Baala deeŋ ma ŋaa Yesu haritooro-la dɔŋɔ nɛ.”
Piita bira nyia wiaa a bul duu dee. Muasuaa nialiŋ si chiŋ dimɛ ma bula pu a bul, “Wutitii nɛ, ŋ ma ŋaa ba dɔŋɔ nɛ, ŋ lii Galilii nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Piita ŋmiɛsɛ a bul, “Mi bi baala deeŋ jiŋ.”
U si bul ŋii dɛrɛ di ji-bele yele liamiŋ lɛ. Piita liisi wii-la Yesu si bula pu ari u jaŋ nyia wiaa a pu naaŋsiiŋ butori, ka di ji-bele-na yel naaŋsiiŋ bulia. U saa kɛŋ nyuŋ gurɛ a yiyel.

Ŋii nɛ taŋ-pul. Nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ ari ba taŋ kuhiasiŋ ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba ari nialiŋ kala si yie hilimi aa vuurɛ wiaa, ba kala ku hilimi a vuurɛ. Ba kɛŋ Yesu a vɔbu a kɛnu kaa mu Paalit teeŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Paalit piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Ŋ nɛ ŋaa Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro, koo?” Yesu bula pu a bul, “Oo, mi nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ bul wiaa yugɛ Yesu si ŋaa chei, ka u bi wii bula.
Ŋii nɛ Paalit bira piɛsɛ Yesu a bul, “Ŋ bi wii kɛnɛ ŋ si jaŋ bula pibaa? Bee na wiaa si magɛ ŋii ba bul di ŋ cheye.”
Yesu bira bi u niiŋ suro. Wii-la kperi Paalit.
Ba gbieli-bal-la nɛ yie-na kala Paalit yie liisɛ nialiŋ ba si kaa tɔ dia dɔŋɔ nɛ a ta, nii-la niaa si sula laa ta.
Di nialiŋ dɔŋsuŋ ma fa hɛ sarika lɛ. Ba fa ŋaa taawɛi nɛ a kpu niaa. Ba kɛŋba kaa mu tɔ dia. Ba dɔŋɔ yiriŋ nɛ Barabas.
Ŋii nɛ niaa yugɛ a gire mu Paalit teeŋ a bul duu ŋaa ŋii u si vɛnɛɛ ŋaa piba.
Paalit jima ari nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ yaraa bieri nɛ, ŋii nɛ tii ba kɛŋ Yesu a kɔ u teeŋ. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛ nialiŋ a bul, “Ma cho di mi liisɛ Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoru-la nɛ a pimaa?”
Paalit jima ari nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ yaraa bieri nɛ, ŋii nɛ tii ba kɛŋ Yesu a kɔ u teeŋ. Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛ nialiŋ a bul, “Ma cho di mi liisɛ Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoru-la nɛ a pimaa?”
Ŋii nɛ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ nyisɛ niaa hɛ di ba sɛi di ba liisɛ Barabas a ta aŋ leŋ Yesu.
Ŋii nɛ Paalit bira piɛsɛ nialiŋ a bul, “Aŋ ka baal-la ma síi yirɛ Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro, bɛɛ nɛ ma si mi kɛnu kaa ŋaa?”
Ŋii nɛ ba kala faasa kpia a bul, “Leŋ di ba kɛnu kaa kpaasa mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Paalit piɛsɛba a bul, “Wu-bɔŋ bɛɛ nɛ u ŋaa?” Ŋii nɛ ba faasa kpia a kii buŋbuŋ-la a bul, “Leŋ di ba kɛnu kpaasa mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.”
Paalit chɛ duu ŋaa di nialiŋ tuɔŋ tɔrɛ. U liisɛ Barabas aŋ leŋ ba viirɛ Yesu aŋ bul ba kɛnu kaa mu kpaasa mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.
Ŋii nɛ laali-yuoroo kɛnu kaa lii ba kuori-baliŋ dia kaala tuɔŋ a yirɛ ba laali-yuoroo dɔŋsuŋ kala. Ba kala ku hilimi.
Ŋii nɛ ba joŋ gɛri-fiaŋ a laalu a chɛ sɔsuŋ a kaa sua nyuŋ-chuulo a nagɛ kuoro nyuŋ-chuulo a joŋo chuu.
Ba saa tuu kpirimi u sipaaŋ a zilu a bul, “Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro, laa chuɔluŋ.”
Ba joŋ sekeliŋ a viirɛ u nyuŋ lɛ, a tu naŋtuɔruŋ ma a hɛu lɛ a tuu kpirimi a zilu.
Ba si mɔmu lɛ a dɛrɛ, ba wuri gɛri-fiaŋ-la aŋ paa u titia gɛnniŋ a laalu, a kɛnu kaa lii woŋbiiŋ di ba kɛnu kaa mu kpaasɛ daa-gɛsɛɛ nyuŋ.

Ba si ku lii ŋii di ba cheŋ baal kubala baa yirɛ Saamɔŋ. U jaŋ yiriŋ nɛ Siriini. U nɛ fa ŋaa Alɛkizaŋda ari Rufas nyimma. U lii baga a jujuu taŋ-la tuɔŋ. Uu kɔ ŋii, ba kɛnu a fugu u joŋ daa-gɛsɛ-la a baasɛ.
Ba kɛŋ Yesu kaa mu lee kubala, baa yirɛ Gɔligɔta. Yiri-la bubuɔŋ nɛ nyu-kuŋkogulo.
Ba si yi dimɛ, ba joŋ siniŋ a guoli tii-keliŋ kubala baa yirɛ mɛɛ lɛ a joŋo pu duu nyua. U via.
Di wia magɛ ji-looluŋ, ba kɛnu kpaasɛ a mɛrɛ daa-la nyuŋ. Ŋii nɛ ba tɔŋsɛ Yesu gɛnniŋ wiaa di ba kpaa, a jiŋ gɛri bɛɛ nɛ nuu-kala jaŋ laa.
Di wia magɛ ji-looluŋ, ba kɛnu kpaasɛ a mɛrɛ daa-la nyuŋ. Ŋii nɛ ba tɔŋsɛ Yesu gɛnniŋ wiaa di ba kpaa, a jiŋ gɛri bɛɛ nɛ nuu-kala jaŋ laa.
Ba si si Yesu ŋaa wialiŋ chei, ba ŋmuŋsa mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛ-la lɛ a bul, “Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro nɛ ŋla.”
Gaaraa balia ma nɛ ba kpaasɛ a pɛ Yesu lɛ. Dɔŋɔ hɛ Yesu na-diiŋ, dɔŋɔ ma hɛ u na-gua. [
Ba fa ŋmuŋsa bil Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ a bul di ba jaŋ kɛnu kaa pɛ haachɛ diiree lɛ. Lɛɛlɛ wiaa deeŋba kala sɛnɛ ŋaa.]
Ba si kpaasu mɛrɛ daa-gɛsɛ-la nyuŋ ŋii, nialiŋ si to dimɛ bibal, ba tutuusu aŋ kɛŋ ba nyuŋ chuchugisi a bul, “Oi, ŋ nɛ ŋaa nii-la si si ŋ jaŋ ŋmoo la Wia dia lo aŋ bira wuo saau tapulaa batori pɛgɛ.
Lii daa-la nyuŋ a laa ŋ titia ta.”
Nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasi-la ari Wia teniŋ kerichiba, ba ma sisieri Yesu lɛ a bulaa pi dɔŋɔ, “U wuo niaa laa tita nɛ aŋ bi u titia wuo laa ta.
U si si u nɛ ŋaa Kirisito, Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kuoro, leŋ duu lii daa-la nyuŋ ku tuu di la na a laa u wiaa dii.” Nialiŋ balia ma ba si kpaasa a pɛ Kirisito lɛ, ba ma tuusu.
Wia ku magɛ nyu-gbaŋa, leriŋ kala biri lim a mu yi didaaniŋ, ka leriŋ bira pullɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu faasa yirɛ u yiikoro lɛ a bul, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani.” U bubuɔŋ nɛ: “Mi Tiina Wia, bɛɛ nɛ tii ŋ joŋmi ta?”
Di niaa dɔŋsuŋ chiŋ dimɛ a jegile nii wialiŋ u si bula. Ŋii nɛ ba bula pi dɔŋɔ a bul, “Na Ilaaja nɛ u yiyirɛ ŋii.”

Nialiŋ dɔŋɔ fa si chiŋ dimɛ mu joŋ suosuo a kaa mu yuu siniŋ si nyala a joŋo tuu sekeliŋ lɛ, a kaa mu hɛ u niiŋ lɛ duu nyua. U si ŋaa ŋii, u bul, “Má leŋ la gbɛrɛ a na ari Ilaaja jaŋ ku soru daa-la nyuŋ koo.”
Ŋii nɛ Yesu faasa yirɛ aŋ wiesi u wiesi kati.
Patiisa nɛ fa hɛ Wia-dia tuɔŋ. Ba kaa kɛrɛ. U kiɛsɛ balia a chiŋ nyu-gbaŋa a kiɛsa ku tuu.
Ŋii nɛ di laali-yuoroo zɔlɔ kuhiaŋ kubala fa chiŋ Yesu sipaaŋ a pɔu. U si na Yesu duu wiesi u wiesi kati ŋii, u bul, “Wutitii, baala deeŋ sɛnɛ ŋaa Wia Bii nɛ.”
Haalaa dɔŋsuŋ ma fa chiŋ di-bolii a bibenu. Ba tuɔŋ Mɛɛri Magidaliŋ ari Saloomi ma fa hɛ dimɛ. Jeems ari Joozis naaŋ ma hɛ dimɛ. Ba fa kɛŋ Jeems kaa yirɛ bapuɔsuŋ nɛ.
Haalaa deeŋba kala faa to Yesu hariŋ nɛ a pipɛu lɛ Galilii lɛ. Haala-la ma fa si to Yesu hariŋ a kɔ Jerusalɛm, ba jesiŋ ma fa hɛ dimɛ.

Tapulii-la di ba ŋaa siri didaaniŋ a gbɛrɛ ba chɛ-wiesii-la, baal kubala ma fa hɛ dimɛ. U yiriŋ nɛ Josɛf. U lii Arimatiya nɛ. U fa ŋaa nialiŋ si yie hilimi a vuvuurɛ wiaa dɔŋɔ nɛ. Niaa jujoŋu jirima. U ma fa gbɛrɛ Wia kuorii-la nɛ duu kɔ. Ŋii nɛ didaaniŋ si yie, u kɛŋ nyu-duoŋ a mu Paalit teeŋ a sul Yesu ku-suuŋ.

Tapulii-la di ba ŋaa siri didaaniŋ a gbɛrɛ ba chɛ-wiesii-la, baal kubala ma fa hɛ dimɛ. U yiriŋ nɛ Josɛf. U lii Arimatiya nɛ. U fa ŋaa nialiŋ si yie hilimi a vuvuurɛ wiaa dɔŋɔ nɛ. Niaa jujoŋu jirima. U ma fa gbɛrɛ Wia kuorii-la nɛ duu kɔ. Ŋii nɛ didaaniŋ si yie, u kɛŋ nyu-duoŋ a mu Paalit teeŋ a sul Yesu ku-suuŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Paalit guu hiriki a pipiɛsɛ u titia, “Yesu daŋa suba nɛɛ?” Ŋii nɛ u yirɛ laali-yuoroo zɔlɔ kuhiaŋ-la a piɛsu, “Yesu daŋa suba nɛɛ?”
U bul, “Oo, u suba nɛ.” U si nii ŋii, u pi Josɛf woŋbiiŋ duu mu sori Yesu ku-suuŋ a kaa ku tuu tiŋteeŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Josɛf mu yɔɔ gɛripɛ-pula a kaa bɛu a joŋu hugi. U kɛnu kaa mu hugi buŋ ba si lɔsɔ lɛ. U bilimi tabii-baliŋ nɛ a tɔ bua-la niiŋ.
Mɛɛri Magidaliŋ ari Joozis naaŋ Mɛɛri ma hɛ dimɛ a na lee-la ba si joŋu hugi.
Ba chɛ-wiesii-la si dɛrɛ, Lahadi chɛɛŋ siipuuraa, Mɛɛri Magidaliŋ ari Jeems naaŋ Mɛɛri ari Saloomi mu yɔɔ tulaali di ba kaa mu a tisɛ Yesu ku-suuŋ.
Lahadi chɛɛŋ chichuɔŋ, wia si pɔsɔ, ba sii mu Yesu bua-la leriŋ.
Ba síi mu ŋii, ba pipiɛsɛ dɔŋɔ, “Kubɛɛ nɛ jaŋ wuo bilimi tabii-la ta bua-la niiŋ?”
Ŋii nɛ ba mu kpagɛ bua-la leriŋ di ba kɛŋ tabii-la suri bua-la niiŋ a bilime ta. Tabii-la fa yuga nɛ woruŋ.
Ŋii nɛ ba mu juu bua-la a na bapuɔsi-bie duu hɔŋ bua-la tuɔŋ na-diiŋ a laalɛ gɛri-pula. Ba hiriki.
Ŋii nɛ u bula piba a bul, “Ma sí fawulluŋ fá. Mi jima ari Yesu si lii Nazarɛt nɛ maa chɛ, nii-la ba si kpaasa mɛrɛ daa-la lɛ. U tuo daha. U sie nɛ. Má ku na lee-la ba si joŋu hugi.
Má mu a bula pi Piita ari Yesu haritooroo, ari Yesu jaŋ laa ma sipaaŋ a mu Galilii. Di ma nɛ mu dimɛ, ma jaŋ nau dimɛ ari u si bul ŋii pima.”
Ba hiriki a chichel a sii lii bua-la lɛ a fá. Fawulluŋ kɛŋba, ba bi wii wuo bula pipi nuu-kala.
Yesu sii suuŋ lɛ Lahadi chɛɛŋ siipuuraa nɛ. U si sie, u leŋe Mɛɛri Magidaliŋ nɛ laa sipaaŋ nau, nii-la lɛ u si kiri jiŋ-bɔŋŋɔɔ balipɛ ta.
Ŋii nɛ Mɛɛri sii a mu bula pi Yesu haritooroo wii-la si ŋaa. U mua di ba hɔnɔ yiyel.
Ŋii nɛ u bula piba ari Yesu sii suuŋ lɛ a hɛ u miisiŋ lɛ, di u-na nau. Ba si nii wii-la, ba bi laa dii.
Ŋii hariŋ baalaa balia sii lii a joŋ woŋbiiŋ aa mu taŋ dɔŋɔ. Ba síi mu ŋii, Yesu bira to woŋbiiŋ dɔŋɔ a kɛŋ u titia ku dagɛba.
Ŋii nɛ ba miira ku bula pi Yesu haritooro-la ku-kaanaa wii-la si ŋaa. Ba bi laa dii.

Ŋii hariŋ nɛ Yesu haritooro-la fii ari kubala hɔnɔ didii kiaa. Baa dii di Yesu nɛ ŋii. U kpiaba lɛ a tiŋ ba tuɔŋ si dolie wiaa ari ba si bi laa dii ari nialiŋ si si ba nau duu sii suuŋ lɛ, di ba bul wutitii nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ u bula piba a bul, “Má mu dunia sɛmɛ-na kala a bul Wia wu-zɔmɔ-la a pi nuu-na kala.
Nii-la kala si laa mi wiaa dii a leŋ ba fou Wii-chuɔlɛ liiŋ, Wia jaŋ laau ta, ama nii-la si bi mi wiaa laa dii, Wia jaŋ joŋ cheeriŋ pu chɛɛ-la u si jaŋ dii dunia niaa kala sariya.
Wu-magilaa deeŋba nɛ ma jaŋ wuo na a jiŋ nialiŋ si laa mi wiaa dii. Ba nɛ ŋla: Ba jaŋ wuo kikiri jiŋ-bɔŋŋɔɔ mi doluŋ lɛ. Ba jaŋ wuo bubul yiikori-yiriba.
Ba jaŋ wuo kukori diŋŋaa, a nyua daalusuŋ síi kpu niaa, ka u bi jaŋ ŋaaba wii-kala. Ba jaŋ wuo joŋ ba nisaa a daŋ nyanyal tiŋŋaa lɛ di ba duori.”
La Tiina Yesu si bul wialiŋ dɛrɛ, Wia joŋu a kaa mu Wia-jaŋ, u hɔŋ Wia sɛmɛ, ni-duoŋ di-hɔnuŋ.
Ŋii nɛ u haritooroo sii lii a mu lee-na kala a bubul Wia wiaa. La Tiina Wia pɛba lɛ ba mu a ŋiŋaa wu-magilaa, di nialiŋ jiŋ wialiŋ ba síi bul ŋaa wutitii nɛ. Ami.]
Luke: Mi-na Luuk nɛ ŋmuŋsɛ teniŋ deeŋ a pipi ŋ-na mi naŋdɔŋɔ Tiafilas. Niaa yuga a hɛ ba doluŋ a ŋmuŋsɛ wialiŋ kala si ŋaala lɛ. Ba ŋmuŋsɛ wialiŋ kala niaa si bula pila. Ba nɛ na wiaa deeŋba kala a suomi buŋbuŋ kala, a ma bul Wia niiŋ wiaa a pipi niaa.

Mi-na Luuk nɛ ŋmuŋsɛ teniŋ deeŋ a pipi ŋ-na mi naŋdɔŋɔ Tiafilas. Niaa yuga a hɛ ba doluŋ a ŋmuŋsɛ wialiŋ kala si ŋaala lɛ. Ba ŋmuŋsɛ wialiŋ kala niaa si bula pila. Ba nɛ na wiaa deeŋba kala a suomi buŋbuŋ kala, a ma bul Wia niiŋ wiaa a pipi niaa.
Mi kuhiaŋ, mi jegile nii wiaa deeŋba woruŋ a gunnɛ ba kala ma woruŋ. U ŋaa wu-zɔŋ nɛ di mi ŋmuŋsɛ wialiŋ kala a piŋ.
Mi ŋmuŋsaa piŋ di ŋ wuo jiŋ ari wialiŋ kala ba si dagiŋ ŋaa wutitiiba nɛ.

Baal kubala nɛ fa hɛ dimɛ. Baa yirɛ Zakaraya. U fa ŋaa nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia dɔŋɔ nɛ. Bua-la lɛ di ba kɛŋ nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kala kaa kpaa leree mara ari banɛsɛ nɛ. Baal kubala ma fa hɛ dimɛ. U fa ŋaa kuhiaŋ lee-la Zakaraya fa si hɛ nɛ. U yiriŋ nɛ Abija. Zakaraya haala ma yiriŋ nɛ Ɛlizabɛt. U ma fa lii nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia doho niaa tuɔŋ nɛ. Aarɔŋ fa ŋaa u nihiliɛrɛ. Bua-la lɛ di Hɛrɔd nɛ fa ŋaa Judiya tiŋteeŋ kuoro.
Zakaraya ari u haala kala fa ŋaa tuɔ-pul timma nɛ. Ba kala balia fa to Wia niiŋ wialiŋ kala nɛ woruŋ.
Ɛlizabɛt fa ŋaa ha-piri nɛ, ba bi bii kala lula, aŋ ka ba di u bala Zakaraya ma kala hiɛsɛ.

Ŋii nɛ Zakaraya ari u niaa tapuluŋ yi di ba tiŋ tiŋtiŋŋaa nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia si vɛnɛɛ ŋaa. Ba síi tiŋ ba tiŋtiŋŋaa ŋii, ba yie tɔŋsɛ di ba jiŋ nii-la ba si jaŋ liisɛ duu juu Wia-dia. Ba si ŋaa ŋii, Zakaraya dii a juu Wia-dia. Ŋii nɛ u hɛ nyiniŋ a nyigɛ tii-keliŋ tulaali a pi Wia, Wia koruŋ lɛ.

Ŋii nɛ Zakaraya ari u niaa tapuluŋ yi di ba tiŋ tiŋtiŋŋaa nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia si vɛnɛɛ ŋaa. Ba síi tiŋ ba tiŋtiŋŋaa ŋii, ba yie tɔŋsɛ di ba jiŋ nii-la ba si jaŋ liisɛ duu juu Wia-dia. Ba si ŋaa ŋii, Zakaraya dii a juu Wia-dia. Ŋii nɛ u hɛ nyiniŋ a nyigɛ tii-keliŋ tulaali a pi Wia, Wia koruŋ lɛ.
U si jua ŋii, nialiŋ si ka, ba hɛ kaala lɛ a chuchuɔlɛ Wia.
Zakaraya si nyigɛ nyiniŋ ŋii, di Wia tiŋdaara kubala kɔ u teeŋ a chiŋ koru-la sɛmɛ na-diiŋ.
Zakaraya nau a chichel. Fawulluŋ kɛnu.
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bula pu a bul, “Zakaraya, sí leŋe di fawulluŋ kɛniŋ. Wialiŋ ŋ si sul Wia teeŋ, u joŋo piŋ nɛ. Ŋ haala Ɛlizabɛt jaŋ lul baal. Ŋ jaŋ hɛ u yiriŋ Jɔɔŋ.
Ŋ tuɔŋ jaŋ faasa tɔrɛ. Ni-daŋ ma tuɔŋ jaŋ tɔrɛ u lulluŋ wiaa.
U jaŋ ŋaa ni-bal Wia teeŋ. U bi jaŋ nyunyua si-duoruŋ. Ba si lulu bua-la lɛ, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la jaŋ hɛu lɛ woruŋ a kaa mu deeŋ deeŋ.
U jaŋ wuo ŋaa di Iziral tiŋŋaa yugɛ a birima to ba Tiina Wia.

U jaŋ ŋaa Wia tiŋtinnu a kɛŋ doluŋ ari Ilaaja fa si kɛŋ doluŋ ŋii. (Ilaaja fa ŋaa nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ.) U jaŋ wuo ŋaa di biiriŋ ari ba nyimmaba kala miira siŋ. U ma jaŋ wuo ŋaa di nialiŋ si bi Wia niiŋ wiaa ka to, di ba birimɛ a to tuɔ-pul tiŋŋaa woŋbiiŋ a leŋ di niaa ŋaa siri di ba Tiina kɔ di ba tou.”
Ŋii nɛ Zakaraya piɛsɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la a bul, “Ɛɛ nɛ mi jaŋ wuo ŋaa, a jiŋ di wialiŋ ŋ si bula ŋaa wutitii? Mi ŋaa ba-nihiaŋ nɛ, mi haala ma ŋaa ha-nihiaŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bula pu a bul, “Mi yiriŋ nɛ Gebiral a hɔŋ Wia sɛmɛ. U nɛ tiŋmi di mi ku bul wu-zɔmuŋ deeŋ a piŋ.
Wialiŋ mi si bula piŋ jaŋ ku ŋaa, aŋ ka ŋ bi laa dii. Ŋii wiaa ŋ bira bi wiaa jaŋ wuo bul, see tapulii-la si yie di wiaa deeŋba mi si bula piŋ ŋaa.”
Wia tiŋdaari-la síi bul wiaa Zakaraya teeŋ ŋii, nialiŋ si gbɛrɛ Zakaraya kaala tuɔŋ bi jiŋ wii-la si tii u didieni ŋii Wia dia-la tuɔŋ. U kperiba.

Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la viiri, aŋ ka Zakaraya ku lii kaala nialiŋ teeŋ. U bi wiaa wuo bula piba. Ŋii nɛ u kɛŋ u nisaa a bul wiaa ba teeŋ. U si bi wiaa wuo bubul ŋii, ba jiŋ ari u na wiaa ari duosoo tuɔŋ Wia-dia-la tuɔŋ nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Zakaraya tiŋtiŋŋaa tapulaa dɛrɛ Wia-dia-la lɛ. U miira mu u dia.
U bi diene, ka u haala Ɛlizabɛt kɛŋ luoruŋ. U si kɛŋ luoruŋ ŋii, u bi dia lɛ lia chɛŋsiŋ banɔŋ
a bul, “Wia diene aŋ lɛɛlɛ pɛmi lɛ ŋla. U tɔ mi hiisiŋ nɛ dunia lɛ.”
Ɛlizabɛt si kɛŋ luoruŋ u chɛŋsiŋ balidu lɛ, Wia bira tiŋ u tiŋdaara Gebiral duu mu Galilii tiŋteeŋ taŋ kubala baa yirɛ Nazarɛt.
U timu duu kɛŋ tiŋdaariŋ a kaa mu pi tolo kubala ha si bi baal jiŋ baa yirɛ Mɛɛri. U faa chɛ duu jaa baal kubala nɛ baa yirɛ Josɛf. Josɛf fa ŋaa kuoro Devit doho nuu nɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la kɔ u teeŋ a chuɔlu aŋ bula pu a bul, “Wia cho ŋ wiaa a pɛŋ lɛ woruŋ.”
Mɛɛri si nii wialiŋ Wia tiŋdaari-la si bula pu, fawulluŋ kɛnu. U kɛŋ wialiŋ u si bula bubuɔŋ bibiinɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bula pu a bul, “Mɛɛri, Wia cho ŋ wiaa, sí leŋe di fawulluŋ kɛniŋ.
Ŋ jaŋ kɛŋ luoruŋ a lul baal. Ŋ jaŋ hɛ u yiriŋ Yesu.
U jaŋ ŋaa ni-bal. Ba jaŋ kɛnu yirɛ Wii-baliŋ Bie. Wia jaŋ ŋaa duu dii kuoruŋ ari u naabalima Devit fa si dii kuoruŋ ŋii.
U jaŋ dii kuoruŋ Jekɔb doho niaa tuɔŋ a kaa mu wuu. U bi jaŋ dɛrɛ da.”
Ŋii nɛ Mɛɛri bula pi Wia tiŋdaari-la a bul, “Mi ha bi baal jiŋ. Ɛɛ nɛ saa wiiŋ deeŋ jaŋ wuo ŋaa?”
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bula pu a bul, “Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la jaŋ hɛŋ lɛ. Ŋ jaŋ kɛŋ luoruŋ Wia doluŋ lɛ. Ŋii wiaa bile jaŋ ŋaa Tuɔ-pul Tiina. Ba kɛnu yiyirɛ Wia Bie.
Na ŋ naaŋbie Ɛlizabɛt si hiɛsa ŋii. Ba si u bi bii wuo lul, aŋ ka u kɛŋ luoruŋ u chɛŋsiŋ balidu nɛ ŋla.
Wia kɛŋ doluŋ. U jaŋ wuo ŋaa wii-kala.”
Ŋii nɛ Mɛɛri bula pu a bul, “Mi ŋaa Wia tiŋtinnu nɛ. Leŋ di wialiŋ ŋ si bula pimi, di ba ŋaa.” Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la tau aŋ viiri.
Ŋii nɛ Mɛɛri sii lima lima a mu duu chuɔlɛ Ɛlizabɛt u jaŋ lɛ. U fa hɛ Judiya tiŋteeŋ lɛ nɛ. Peelee nɛ golli lee-la chu.
U si yi dimɛ, u mu juu Zakaraya dia a mu chuɔlɛ u haala Ɛlizabɛt.
U laa Mɛɛri chuɔlaa. U si laa ŋii, bile si hɛ u luoruŋ lɛ sii birimɛ. Ŋii nɛ Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la ku hɛ Ɛlizabɛt lɛ woruŋ.
U faasa bula pi Mɛɛri a bul, “Wia pɛŋ lɛ a kii haalaa kala. Wia ma jaŋ pɛ bile ŋ si jaŋ lul lɛ.
Mi ma ŋaa kubɛɛ nɛ, Wia Bie naaŋ kɔ duu chuɔlɛmi?
Mi si laa ŋ chuɔlaa ŋii, bile si hɛ mi luoruŋ lɛ tuɔŋ ma tɔrɛ. U sii fuful.
Ŋ ma laa dii ari wialiŋ Wia si bula piŋ jaŋ ŋaa wutitiiba. Ŋii wiaa ŋ tuɔŋ jaŋ tɔrɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ Mɛɛri bula pu a bul,
“Mi tuɔŋ tɔrɔ nɛ. Mi didɛnnɛ Wia.
Wia nɛ ŋaa mi Laataara. Ŋii nɛ tii mi jujuɔsɛ.
Mi ŋaa u tiŋtinni-bii nɛ, u liisi mi wiaa.
A lii lɛɛlɛ a kaa mu, nuu-kala jaŋ kɛŋmi yiyirɛ tuɔtɔrɛ tiina.
Wia ŋaa Wii-bal nɛ a ŋaa wu-kpuŋkperisiŋ mi lɛ.
U ŋaa Tuɔ-pul Tiina nɛ.
Uu fá nialiŋ kala síi fáu, nennige,
doho-na kala lɛ nɛ.
U kɛŋ u na-duo-la kaa tiɛnɛ
a ŋmoo babii-balaa a ŋaa ba wu-ŋaala-la kala pugi.
U kiri ni-balaa ba kuori-kpasinniŋ nyuŋ
aŋ ka ni-biisiŋ hɔŋ.
U joŋ ku-zɔŋŋɔɔ a pi summoo
aŋ kiri nialiŋ si kɛŋ kiaa ba kɛŋ na-hilliŋ miirɛ.
U fa bil niiŋ nɛ a pi la naabalimaba
duu jaŋ pɛ u tiŋtinnaa Iziral tiŋŋaa lɛ. Wii-la u fa si bula ku ŋaa wutitii. U pɛba lɛ.
U fa fá Abiraham nennige.
U saa jaŋ fá u doho niaa kala ma nennige a kaa mu wuu.”
Mɛɛri si bul wialiŋ dɛrɛ, u hɔŋ Ɛlizabɛt teeŋ a yi chɛŋsiŋ batori nɛ, aŋ-na miira mu dia.
Ŋii nɛ Ɛlizabɛt lulluŋ yi. U lul baal.
U si lul ŋii, u dɔŋsuŋ tiŋŋaa ari u naaŋbiiriŋ nii ŋii Wia si fáu nennige. Ba tuɔŋ kala tɔrɛ, ba jujuɔsɛ.
Bile si yi tapulaa chori di ba keri u peniŋ aŋ hɛ u yiriŋ. Ba faa chɛ di ba joŋ u nyimma Zakaraya yiriŋ nɛ hɛ pu.
Ŋii nɛ u naaŋ via aŋ bul di ba hɛ Jɔɔŋ pu.
Nihiasi-la bula pu ari ba bi naaŋbii kala kɛnɛ u yiriŋ dii Jɔɔŋ.
Ŋii nɛ ba kɛŋ nisaa bul wiaa pi u nyimma a piɛsu di yiri bɛɛ nɛ uu chɛ duu hɛ pu.
Zakaraya ŋaa ba kɛŋ daa-bori-bie kaa kɔ duu ŋmuŋsɛ bile yiriŋ a piba. Ba joŋo pu. U ŋmuŋsɛ daa-boro-la lɛ di bile yiriŋ nɛ Jɔɔŋ. Ba karimɛ. Ba si karimɛ a na bile yiriŋ, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere.
Zakaraya si ŋaa ŋii dɛrɛ, u bira suomi a bubul wiaa a didɛnnɛ Wia.
Nialiŋ fa si hɛ dimɛ a na wii-la si ŋaa, fawulluŋ kɛŋba. Ba kɛŋ wii-la lii a bula gaarɛ Judiya tiŋteeŋ sɛmɛ-na kala, lee-la peelee si gollo chu.
Nialiŋ kala si nii ŋii, ba kɛŋ wii-la bibiinɛ ba tuɔsaa lɛ aa bul, “Bie deeŋ saa jaŋ ŋaa kubɛɛ nɛ?” Ba na ari Wia doluŋ hɛu lɛ nɛ. Ŋii nɛ tii ba bul ŋii.
Ŋii nɛ Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la ku hɛ Zakaraya lɛ, u bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ a bul,
“Má leŋ di la dɛnnɛ Wia, Wia-la Iziral tiŋŋaa síi to.
U kɔ duu pɛ u niaa lɛ nɛ a laaba ta.
U liisɛ ni-duoŋ nɛ pila duu kɔ laala ta.
U lii Devit doho niaa tuɔŋ nɛ.
Faafaa kala nɛ Wia to u nialiŋ fa síi bul wiaa u Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ, a bula pila
ari u jaŋ laala ta la diŋdɔŋŋɔɔ
ari nialiŋ kala si bɛrɛla nisiŋ lɛ.
U ma bula ari u jaŋ fá la doho niaa nennige, a liise yi wii-la u fa si bula pi la naabalimaba.
U fa bula pi la naabalima Abiraham a ŋmiɛsɛ
ari u jaŋ laala ta la diŋdɔŋŋɔɔ nisiŋ lɛ
a pila woŋbiiŋ di la kɛŋ nyu-duoŋ a tima pu.
U fa bula pi la naabalima Abiraham a ŋmiɛsɛ
ari u jaŋ laala ta la diŋdɔŋŋɔɔ nisiŋ lɛ
a pila woŋbiiŋ di la kɛŋ nyu-duoŋ a tima pu.
Ŋii lɛ nɛ la jaŋ wuo to a kɛŋ tuɔ-pula u teeŋ,
la miisiŋ kala lɛ.”
Zakaraya si bul wiaa deeŋba dɛrɛ, u bul wiaa a pi u bie ma a bul,
“Ŋ-na mi bii, ŋ jaŋ ŋaa nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wii-baliŋ Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ.
Ŋ jaŋ laa la Tiina-la si jaŋ kɔ sipaaŋ
a wasɛ woŋbiiŋ bilu lɛ.
Ŋ ma jaŋ bula pi nialiŋ si ŋaa siri di ba tou, di Wia joŋ ba haachɛba chɛba aŋ laaba ta.
Wia kɛŋ zile aŋ fifá niaa nennige.
U jaŋ laala ta a leŋ di la hɔŋ pulumuŋ tuɔŋ.
Puluŋ-la jaŋ lii Wia-jaŋ a pɔsɛ hɛ nialiŋ kala si hɔŋ birimiŋ tuɔŋ a faa chɛ di ba suu.
U jaŋ dagɛla woŋbii-la si kɛŋ yarifiɛlaa di la to.”
Ŋii nɛ bile sii waa a hɛ yaraa a kɛŋ doluŋ ari wu-jimiŋ. U mu hɛ giri-bine tuɔŋ a mu yi tapulii-la u si kɛŋ u titia kaa ku lii dagɛ Iziral tiŋŋaa.
Baal kubala nɛ fa hɛ dimɛ, baa yirɛ Ɔgasitas. U nɛ fa ŋaa Rom tiŋŋaa kuori-baliŋ. Bua-la lɛ u bul di ba diisɛ u tiŋteeŋ niaa. Ba ha bi ŋii ŋaa, see lɛɛlɛ nɛ ba ŋaa ŋii.
Ba si bugumo diisɛ niaa ŋii, baal kubala nɛ fa chiŋ kuori-baliŋ nyuŋ Siiria tiŋteeŋ lɛ. Baa yirɛ Kiriinias.
Ŋii nɛ nuu-kala mu u jaŋ di ba diisu dimɛ.
Josɛf ma sii Nazarɛt Galilii tiŋteeŋ lɛ a mu Judiya tiŋteeŋ, a mu juu taŋ kubala baa yirɛ Bɛtilɛhɛm. Lee-la nɛ ba fa lul kuoro Devit. Josɛf fa ŋaa kuoro Devit doho nuu nɛ. Ŋii nɛ tii u mu dimɛ.
Ba di Mɛɛri kala mu dimɛ. Mɛɛri fa ŋaa nii-la si si u jaŋ jaau nɛ, ka u kɛŋ luoruŋ.
Ba si yi Bɛtilɛhɛm, ba hɔŋ dimɛ. Ŋii nɛ Mɛɛri lulluŋ yi,
aŋ ka ba bi leriŋ na nuhuɔraa dia-la lɛ di ba juu. Ŋii nɛ tii ba mu juu ja-dia. Dimɛ nɛ Mɛɛri lul u bii-buŋbuŋ, baal, a kɛŋ gɛriŋ a bɛu a joŋu bil yaŋ nyuŋ.
Bua-la lɛ pie-daaraa nɛ fa hɛ tiŋtee-la sɛmɛ dɔŋɔ a hɛ yaŋ tuɔŋ a chua dimɛ titaŋiŋ aa beŋ ba piesee.
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaara kubala kɔ ba teeŋ. U si kɔ ŋii, Wia pulumuŋ chaana hɛba lɛ. Fawulluŋ kɛŋba.
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la bula piba a bul, “Ma sí leŋe di fawulluŋ kɛŋma. Mi kɛŋ wu-zɔŋŋɔɔ nɛ kɔ di mi bula pima. Nii-la kala si nii wu-zɔmɔ-la, u tuɔŋ jaŋ tɔrɛ.
Titaŋiŋ deeŋ ba lul ma Laataara nɛ Devit jaŋ lɛ. Baa yiru la Tiina Kirisito, nii-la Wia si liisa.
Ŋla nɛ ma jaŋ wuo to jiŋ. Di ma mu dimɛ, ma jaŋ na bile di ba kɛŋ gɛnniŋ bɛu a joŋu bil yaŋ nyuŋ.”
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaaraa yugɛ a guu lii a pɛ Wia tiŋdaari-la lɛ a yii yiilaa a dɛnnɛ Wia a bul,
“Má leŋ di la dɛnnɛ Wia si hɛ Wia-jaŋ lɛ.
Wia ma tuɔŋ tɔrɛ nialiŋ si hɛ tiŋteeŋ lɛ nɛ. Ba ma jaŋ na yarifiɛlaa.”
Ŋii nɛ Wia tiŋdaara-la miira mu Wia-jaŋ. Ka pie-daara-la bula pi dɔŋɔ a bul, “Má leŋ di la mu Bɛtilɛhɛm a na wii-la la Tiina Wia si to u tiŋdaaraa lɛ a bula pila.”
Ba sii fá lima lima a mu na Mɛɛri ari Josɛf. Ba naba aŋ na bile maa di u piŋ yaŋ nyuŋ.
Ŋii nɛ pie-daara-la bula pi bile naaŋ ari u nyimma wialiŋ Wia tiŋdaara-la si bula piba a tigɛ bile lɛ.
Nialiŋ kala si nii ŋii, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere.
Mɛɛri laa wiaa deeŋba kala a hɛ u nyuŋ lɛ a kaa bibiinɛ.
Ŋii nɛ pie-daara-la miira mu ba pie-daaliŋ. Baa mu a yiyii yiilaa a didɛnnɛ Wia. Wialiŋ kala Wia tiŋdaara-la si bula piba, ba naba.
Bile si yi tapulaa chori, ba keri u peniŋ aŋ hɛ u yiriŋ. Ba hɛ Yesu pu, yiri-la Wia tiŋdaari-la fa si daga bua-la lɛ Mɛɛri fa ha si bi luoruŋ kɛnɛ.
Wialiŋ Moosis fa si ŋmuŋsa bil di niaa tuto dɔŋɔ nɛ ŋla:
“Di baal ari u haal nɛ lul ba bii-buŋbuŋ, duu nɛ ŋaa baal, u maga di ba mu piisɛ ba disinniŋ ta nɛ.”
Moosis fa bira ŋmuŋsa bil Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ di nuu-na kala nɛ lul u bii-buŋbuŋ, di bile nɛ ŋaa baal, duu joŋo pi Wia. Ŋii nɛ Josɛf ari Mɛɛri ŋaa ŋii. Ba sii joŋ bile a kaa mu Jerusalɛm a joŋu pi Wia.
Wialiŋ Moosis fa si ŋmuŋsa bil di niaa tuto dɔŋɔ nɛ ŋla:
“Di baal ari u haal nɛ lul ba bii-buŋbuŋ, duu nɛ ŋaa baal, u maga di ba mu piisɛ ba disinniŋ ta nɛ.”
Moosis fa bira ŋmuŋsa bil Wia teniŋ tuɔŋ di nuu-na kala nɛ lul u bii-buŋbuŋ, di bile nɛ ŋaa baal, duu joŋo pi Wia. Ŋii nɛ Josɛf ari Mɛɛri ŋaa ŋii. Ba sii joŋ bile a kaa mu Jerusalɛm a joŋu pi Wia.
Ba bira ŋmuŋsa di ba kpu kokosuŋ balia maa a pi Wia. Ŋii nɛ Josɛf ari Mɛɛri sii mu Wia-dia di ba ŋaa ŋii.
Bua-la lɛ baal kubala nɛ fa hɛ Jerusalɛm lɛ, baa yirɛ Simiaŋ. U fa ŋaa ni-zɔŋ nɛ a fifá Wia a fa gbigbɛrɛ di Wia laa Iziral tiŋŋaa ta. Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la ma hɛu lɛ woruŋ.
Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la fa bula pu ari u bi jaŋ suu see duu na Kirisito, nii-la Wia si jaŋ liisɛ duu kɔ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu nyimma ari u naaŋ juu Wia-dia a joŋu pi Wia aŋ pɛ ŋaa ŋii Wia niiŋ wiaa si bula ŋii nɛ. Di Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la kɛŋ Simiaŋ ma ku juu Wia-dia.
Simiaŋ na bile a laau a hɛ u nisaa lɛ aŋ dɛnnɛ Wia a bul,
“Mi Tiina, ŋ leŋ di wialiŋ ŋ si bula pimi sɛnɛ ku ŋaa.
Ŋ si ŋaa ŋii, leŋ di mi-na ŋ tiŋtinna na woŋbiiŋ a suu ari yarifiɛlaa.
Mi sɛnɛ na nii-la si kɔ duu laa dunia niaa ta nɛ.
Ŋ timu duu kɔ nuu-kala teeŋ nɛ, di nuu-kala nau.
Bie deeŋ jaŋ nagɛ pulumuŋ a dagɛ nialiŋ si bi Ju̱u tiŋŋaa ŋaa woŋbiiŋ, ka di ŋ niaa Iziral tiŋŋaa ma na.”
Simiaŋ si bul ŋii dɛrɛ, wialiŋ u fa si bula a tigɛ bile lɛ ŋaa bile nyimma ari u naaŋ wu-kpuŋkpere.

Ŋii nɛ Simiaŋ chuɔlɛ Wia piba duu pɛba lɛ aŋ bula pi u naaŋ a bul, “Wia liisɛ ŋ bie deeŋ duu ku dɔgisɛ nialiŋ si bi u wiaa laa dii, aŋ ma laa nialiŋ si laa u wiaa dii ta Iziral tiŋŋaa tuɔŋ. Wia ta bie deeŋ duu ŋaa magil nɛ. Niaa yugɛ jaŋ joŋ ba hariŋ yiau.
Ka ba tuɔbiinaa jaŋ lii di-jaliŋ.” Ŋii nɛ u bira bula pi Mɛɛri a bul, “Ŋ titia tuɔŋ jaŋ chei woruŋ ŋ bile wiaa a nagɛ ba si joŋ sia tɔbuŋ.”

Haal kubala ma nɛ fa hɛ dimɛ. U yiriŋ nɛ Ana. U fa ŋaa nii-la síi bul wiaa, Wia Diŋ-zɔŋ-la doluŋ lɛ nɛ. U nyimma ma yiriŋ nɛ fa Fanuwɛl a lii Asa doho niaa tuɔŋ. U fa ŋaa ha-nihiaŋ nɛ. U fa jaa bala jisiŋ balipɛ nɛ ka u suu.
U bala si suba, u hɔnɔ a ŋaa yo-haal nɛ jisiŋ mahiŋ banɛsɛ ari banɛsɛ. Bua-na kala lɛ u yie vɛnɛɛ mu Wia-dia wiihɛyɛ ari titaŋiŋ kala. U yie vɔɔ niiŋ dimɛ aŋ pɛ chuɔlɛ Wia.
Simiaŋ fa síi bul wiaa pipi Mɛɛri ŋii, di Ana ma ku juu. U na bile a dɛnnɛ Wia aŋ bul wiaa a tigɛ bile lɛ a pi nialiŋ kala fa si gbɛrɛ di Wia laa Jerusalɛm niaa ta.
Mɛɛri ari Josɛf si ŋaa wialiŋ kala Wia si si di ba ŋaa Jerusalɛm lɛ a dɛrɛ, ba miira mu Galilii tiŋteeŋ a mu ba jaŋ Nazarɛt.
Bile waa a kɛŋ doluŋ a kala ŋaa wu-jimii. Wia pɛu lɛ.
Jina-na kala Yesu nyimma ari u naaŋ yie mu Jerusalɛm di ba gbieli diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele.
Yesu si ŋaa jisiŋ fii ari balia, ba di u nyimma ari u naaŋ mu diisiŋ kieliŋ gbiele-la Jerusalɛm lɛ, ari ba si vɛnɛɛ ŋaa ŋii.
Gbiele-la si dɛrɛ, ba miiraa mu dia, ka Yesu ha hɛ hariŋ. U naaŋ ari u nyimma bi jiŋ.
Ba fa biina ari u hɛ ba nialiŋ si miira mu ba jaŋ tuɔŋ nɛ. Ba suomo chichɛu ba naaŋbiiriŋ ari ba naŋdɔŋsuŋ tuɔŋ. Ba vɛŋ deeŋ deeŋ wia tuu juu a chɛu ka.
Ba si chɛu ka, ba miira mu Jerusalɛm a bene chichɛu dimɛ.
U tapulaa batori chɛɛŋ nɛ ba nau Wia-dia lɛ, di ba di Ju̱u tiŋŋaa kerichiba hɔnɔ. Uu jegili wialiŋ ba síi bul aŋ pɛ pipiɛsɛba wiaa maa.
Nialiŋ kala si hɛ dimɛ a nii u síi chaarɛ wiaa siaa ari wu-jimiŋ ŋii, u ŋaaba wu-kpuŋkpere.
U nyimma ari u naaŋ si nau, u ŋaaba ma wu-kpuŋkpere. Ŋii nɛ u naaŋ piɛsu, “Mi bii, bɛɛ nɛ tii ŋ ŋaala ŋla? La di ŋ nyimma gɔllɔ chɛŋ ka nɛ.”
Ŋii nɛ u piɛsɛba a bul, “Bɛɛ nɛ tii ma gɔllɔɔ chɛmi? Ma bi jiŋ ari mi jaŋ hɛ mi Nyimma dia lɛɛ?”
Ama ba fa bi wii-la u si bula piba bubuɔŋ jiŋ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu ari u nyimma ari u naaŋ miira mu Nazarɛt a hɛ dimɛ. Ba si hɛ dimɛ, u to ba niiŋ woruŋ. U naaŋ laa wialiŋ kala si ŋaa a hɛ u tuɔŋ lɛ aa biinɛ.
Ŋii nɛ Yesu waa, u wu-jimiŋ ma puŋa pɛ. Wia chou, niaa ma zizilu woruŋ.

Ŋii nɛ Wia ta Zakaraya bie Jɔɔŋ duu mu bul Wia wiaa pi niaa giri-bine tuɔŋ. U si suomo ŋii, Rom tiŋteeŋ kuori-baliŋ Tabiiras dii kuoruŋ u jisiŋ fii ari banɔŋ nɛ ŋii. Pɔŋsɔs Paalit ma fa chiŋ kuori-baliŋ nyuŋ Judiya tiŋteeŋ lɛ. Hɛrɔd ma fa bibeŋ Galilii tiŋteeŋ. U naaŋbie Filip ma fa bibeŋ Ituriya ari Takɔnaatis tiŋteeŋ. Baal-la ba síi yirɛ Lasiinias ma níi beŋ Abiliini tiŋteeŋ. Anas ari Kayafas ma nɛ fa ŋaa nialiŋ si kpu pusuŋ pipi Wia kuhiasiŋ Jerusalɛm lɛ.

Ŋii nɛ Wia ta Zakaraya bie Jɔɔŋ duu mu bul Wia wiaa pi niaa giri-bine tuɔŋ. U si suomo ŋii, Rom tiŋteeŋ kuori-baliŋ Tabiiras dii kuoruŋ u jisiŋ fii ari banɔŋ nɛ ŋii. Pɔŋsɔs Paalit ma fa chiŋ kuori-baliŋ nyuŋ Judiya tiŋteeŋ lɛ. Hɛrɔd ma fa bibeŋ Galilii tiŋteeŋ. U naaŋbie Filip ma fa bibeŋ Ituriya ari Takɔnaatis tiŋteeŋ.
